notes: As of now there's not a simple way to delete your account. You have to contact their team, your account will be quickly deleted upon request.

name: CryEngine
notes: Go to your dashboard, click 'Delete your account' and confirm.
notes_it: Vai alla tua dashboard, fai clic su 'Delete your account' e conferma.

name: Crypton.sh
notes: Scroll down the page, click at "Delete My Account", type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Delete Account".
notes_tr: Sayfanın altına gidin, "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Şifrenizi girin ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna basarak işleminizi onaylayın.
notes_pt-BR: Role a página para baixo, clique em "Delete My Account", digite sua senha e clique em "Delete Account" para confirmar a exclusão da sua conta.

name: CryptoPanic
notes: Click on 'Yes, send confirmation email', and you should receive an email to delete your account.

name: CryptoVoucher
notes: Just click the close account button in the account settings

name: CryptPad
notes: Scroll down to the red 'Delete your account' button and then select 'OK (enter)'
notes_tr: Aşağı kaydırın ve kırmızı "Hesabınızı Silin" tuşuna tıklayın. Ardından "Tamam" seçeneğine tıklayın

name: Crytek
notes: You can delete your account by navigating to the profile settings or e-mailing them

name: cTrader
email_body: Please delete my cTrader account that uses the e-mail XXXXX and the passport is YYYYY.
notes: You need to contact customer support and they will ask for very sensitive information such as your passport number.

name: Cubeast
notes: Select "Remove Account," confirm your email, then select "DELETE MY ACCOUNT."

name: CubieCloud
notes: Send an email asking to delete your account, providing your private id and other evidence.
notes_pt-BR: Envie um e-mail pedindo para deletar sua conta, enviando deu id privado e outras provas.

name: Curriculum
notes: There's no way to delete an account. The maximum that can be done is to hide the curriculum.
notes_pt-BR: Não há uma forma de remover a conta. O máximo que pode ser feito é deixar o currículo oculto.

name: CurseForge
notes: Send a support ticket from the email associated with your account and include the following information: your account username; a screenshot of you logged in to account settings / authors dashboard.

name: Cursor
notes: Follow the link. Expand the "Advanced" section. Click "Delete Account".

name: Curve
notes: They cannot delete your account immediately as they are obliged by the Money Laundering Regulations 2017 to keep your data for 5 years after you stop using Curve.
notes_tr: Curve'u kullanmayı bıraktıktan sonra, 2017 Kara Para Aklama Yönetmeliği uyarınca verilerinizi 5 yıl süreyle saklamakla yükümlü olduklarından hesabınızı hemen silemezler.

name: Cutout
notes: Go to My Dashboard, then Account Settings to delete your account.

name: CV online
notes: Request account removal by sending an email to them from the same email address appearing on your CVs.

name: CVS Pharmacy
notes: They allow account deletions under the CCPA, but only for California residents. However, the way they check your location is simply a ZIP code of your choosing. You can input any California ZIP (ex. 94102) and they will allow you to delete your account. Visit the linked page, and select 'CA residents: request or delete personal information.' Enter any California ZIP code, then click 'Delete my info and account', and finally 'Yes, delete my info and account'.

name: Cybrary
notes: Go to "Delete Your Account ⮕ Delete Account".
notes_tr: "Hesabınızı Silin" sayfasına girin ardından "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna basın.
notes_pt-BR: Vá para "Delete Your Account ⮕ Delete Account".

name: CZC
notes: You have to fill out a form. (BUT IT'S ONLY IN CZECH)

name: DaFONT
notes: Send a private message to [Rodolphe](http://www.dafont.com/fr/profile.php?user=1).
notes_it: Dovrai mandare un messagio privato a [Rodolphe](http://www.dafont.com/fr/profile.php?user=1)

name: DagsHub
notes: You first need to delete/transfer all your repositories. After that you can visit the linked page and delete your account.

name: The Daily Wire
notes: Click "Delete Your Data" and enter the verification code the company sends to your account email.

name: Dailymotion
notes: Type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Delete account".
notes_tr: Şifrenizi girin ve işleminizi onaylamak için "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pt-BR: Digite sua senha e clique em "Delete account" para confirmar a exclusão da sua conta.

name: danwin1210.me
notes: You can either disable or remove your account. After removal, username is free to be taken again.

name: Dashlane
notes: After entering the email address and selecting a reason for deletion, you will receive a security code by email. Enter the security code. After that, the account will be irretrievably deleted.
notes_tr: E-posta adresinizi girip "Neden ayrılıyorsunuz" sorusuna cevap seçmeniz gerekir. Bu adımı onaylamak için e-postanıza gelecek olan güvenlik kodunu forma girmeniz gerekir. Bittikten sonra hesabınız silinecektir.
notes_de: Nach Angabe der E-Mail-Adresse und der Auswahl eines Grunds der Löschung, erhält man per Mail einen Sicherheitscode. Dieser wird im Löschformular eingetragen und abgeschickt. Danach wird der Account unwiederbringlich gelöscht.

name: data.gouv.fr
notes: On your profile page, click on the arrow next to the "Edit" button, in the top right of your screen, then on "Delete my profile"
notes_fr: Sur la page de votre profil, cliquez sur la flèche située à côté du bouton "Éditer", en haut à droite de votre écran, puis sur "Supprimer le profil"

name: DataCamp
notes: Click the red 'delete account' button at the bottom.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altında kırmızı "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna basın.

name: DataQuest
notes: Click the red 'delete account' button

name: dbrand
notes: Contact customer support to request account deletion.
notes_pt-BR: Contacte o suporte ao cliente para requerer deleção da conta.

name: Deadspin
notes: Fill out the form using the email address of your account and click on the verification link that is sent.

name: Decathlon India
notes: Send them a deletion request from the linked contact form and remember to mention your decathlon.in registered email there. After some hours of submitting the request their support representative will email you asking for your confirmation to have your decathlon account permanently deleted. Alternatively, you can email them.
email_body: Please delete my decathlon.in account and erase all data associated with it.

name: DeepL
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Deezer
notes: If you signed up via Google/Facebook setup a Deezer password at [https://www.deezer.com/password/reset](https://www.deezer.com/password/reset) and click the confirmation link you'll get via mail. If you have your Deezer password, open your account settings. Click 'Delete my Account' at the bottom of the page. Enter your Deezer password and confirm the deletion in the confirmation mail.
notes_tr: Eeğer Google/Facebook hesabı ile kayıt olduysanız, şifre oluştur bağlantısından Deezer şifresi oluşturun ve e-postanıza gelecek olan onay bağlantısına tıklayın. Eğer Deezer şifreniz varsa, "Hesap Ayarları" kısmına girin. Sayfanın altındaki "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Deezer şifrenizi girin ve e-postanıza gelecek olan onaylama bağlantısı ile onaylayın.
notes_de: Wenn du dich mit Google/Facebook registriert hast, fordere unter [https://www.deezer.com/password/reset](https://www.deezer.com/password/reset) ein Deezer-Passwort an und bestätige einen Link, den du per Mail erhältst. Wenn du ein Deezer-Passwort hast, öffne deine Konto-Einstellungen und klicke unten auf 'Mein Konto löschen'. Gib dort dein Deezer-Passwort ein und bestätige das Löschen in der Bestätigungsmail.

name: Deliveroo
notes: At the bottom of the account page is the option to permanently deactivate your account. It is unclear if your data will be retained after this so you may wish to contact dpo@deliveroo.com to exercise your right to erasure under UK GDPR.

name: Delivery Code
notes: Go to My Account and select Edit Profile and then Delete Account. A confirmation e-mail will be sent to the address on file with a link you must visit.
notes_tr: Hesabım'a girin ve Profili Düzenle menüsüne girin. Ardından "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. E-posta adresinize gelecek olan onay bağlantısını ziyaret etmeniz gerekir.

name: Delta Airlines (SkyMiles)
notes: You can not delete your account on the site. You must use the linked form. Then select SkyMiles ⮕ Update SkyMiles Account and request them to close your account.
notes_tr: Site üzerinden hesabınızı silemezsiniz. Verilen bağlantıdaki formu kullanmanız gerekir. Ardından SkyMiles'i seçip, "SkyMiles Hesabını Güncelle" tuşuna basın ve ardından hesabınızı kapatmanızı talep edin.
notes_fr: Vous ne pouvez pas supprimer votre compte sur le site. Vous devez utiliser le formulaire lié. Ensuite, sélectionnez SkyMiles ⮕ Mise à jour compte SkyMiles et de leur demander de fermer votre compte.

name: DelugeRPG
notes: There is no way to delete an account. Inactive accounts are deleted automatically after 15 months.

name: Demiplane
notes: You must submit a support ticket to request account closure.

name: Depop
notes: Select 'I want to delete my account' in the support request page.

name: Depositphotos
notes: Enter live chat in the other department and request cancellation of your account or if it is not available use the contact form.
notes_tr: Diğer departmanda canlı sohbete girin ve hesabınızın iptal edilmesini isteyin veya mevcut değilse iletişim formunu kullanın.
notes_it: Entra in live chat nel reparto altro e richiedi la cancellazione del tuo account o se non è disponibile utilizza il modulo di contatto.

name: Deutsche Post
notes: Fill out the form to request erasure.

name: DEV
notes: Go to your 'Settings'. On the left select 'Account'. Click 'Delete Account', and follow the instructions sent via email to confirm.
notes_tr: "Ayarlar" sayfanıza girin. Sol taraftan "Hesap" seçeneğini seçin. "OAuth İlişkilerini Kaldır" ve e-posta ile "Hesap Silmeyi Talep Et" yöntemlerini uygulayabilirsiniz.

name: DeviantArt
notes: All your data is ereased immediately, except comments which will remain. Accounts can be reactivated within 30 days. After that, Accounts can't be reactivated.
notes_tr: Tüm verileriniz anında silinir, fakat yorumlarınız kalmaya devam eder. Hesabınız 30 gün içinde tekrar aktifleştirilebilir. 30 günün sonunda, hesaplar yeniden etkinleştirilemez.
notes_fr: Toutes vos données seront effacées immédiatement. Les comptes peuvent être réactivés pour 30 jours. Après ce periode, ils ne peuvent pas être réactivés.
notes_de: Alle Daten werden sofort gelöscht. Accounts können innerhalb von 30 Tagen reaktiviert werden. Nach dieser Zeitspanne können sie nicht mehr wiederhergestellt werden.
notes_it: Tutti i dati saranno immediatamente cancellati. L'account potrà essere riattivato entro 30 giorni, dopodichè non sarà piu recuperabile.
notes_pt-BR: Todos os dados são apagados imediatamente. Contas podem ser reativadas em até 30 dias, após este prazo não poderão mais ser recuperadas.
notes_ca: Totes les seves dades son esborrades inmediatament. Els comptes poden ser reactivats abans de 30 dies, després d'aquest termini no podrà ser reactivat.
notes_es: Todos tus datos son borrados inmediatamente. Todas las cuentas pueden ser reactivadas antes de 30 días, después de ese plazo no podrá ser recuperada.
notes_pl: Wszystkie Twoje dane zostana natychmiast usunięte. Jeśli zmienisz zdanie, możesz reaktywować swoje konto w ciągu 30 dni.

name: DevITjobs
notes: Click on the 'Log in here' button. After logging in, go to 'Account', then 'Delete Account'. You will be redirected to write to the support email. Account gets deleted within 48 hours.

name: DHL
notes: Under 'Kundenkonto', click on 'Konto löschen'.

name: diasp.eu (Diaspora)
notes: Click close my account and confirm with your password.
notes_tr: "Hesabımı Kapat" tuşuna tıklayın ve şifrenizi girerek onaylayın.
notes_fr: Cliquez sur fermez mon compte et confirmer avec votre mot de passe.
notes_it: Clicca chiudi il mio account e conferma inserendo la tua password.
notes_de: Klicke auf 'close my account' und bestätige dies mit deinem Passwort.
notes_pt-BR: Clique em 'close my account' e confirme com sua senha.
notes_ca: Cliqui a 'close my account' i confirmi-ho amb la seva contrasenya.
notes_es: Haz clic en 'close my account' y confirmelo con tu contraseña.
notes_pl: Kliknij 'close my account' i potwierdź podając swoje hasło.

name: Dice
notes: Go to your 'Settings'. Scroll to the bottom to find the 'Delete Account' section.
notes_tr: "Ayarlar" kısmına girin. Sayfanın altında "Hesabı Sil" bölümünü bulun.

name: DiceCloud
notes: There are no settings on the website to delete your account and the contact form is never answered.

name: dict.cc
notes: Account data will be deleted; the user name will be blocked to prevent reuse.
notes_tr: Hesap verileri silinecek; kullanıcı adı ise yeniden kullanımı önlemek için engellenecektir.

name: Dictionary.com
notes: Account data will be deleted along with all the saved data and words. You fill find the detele button at the bottom of the page.

name: Didsoft
notes: Create a ticket on the website, or email them.

name: Digg
notes: Go to "Settings ⮕ Delete my account".
notes_tr: "Ayarlar" "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna basın.
notes_pt-BR: Vá para "Settings ⮕ Delete my account".

name: Digio
notes: There is no delete button and talking to the customer support gets you nowhere, they only understand you want to cancel the bank account or the credit card, but not remove the login information.
notes_pt-BR: Não há botão para excluir a conta e falar com o atendimento ao cliente não resolve, eles só sabem deletar a DigioConta ou cancelar o cartão Digio, mas não entendem sobre remoção do login.

name: DigitalOcean
notes: Click in the checkbox "Purge all of my account data" and confirm your action by clicking "Deactivate Account".
notes_tr: "Tüm hesap verilerimi sil" onay kutusunu seçin ve "Hesabı Devre Dışı bırak" tuşuna basarak işleminizi onaylayın.
notes_pt-BR: Marque a opção "Purge all of my account data" e clique em "Deactivate Account" para confirmar a exclusão da sua conta.

name: Diigo
notes: Scroll down the page, click at "I'd like to delete my account.", type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Confirm Delete".
notes_tr: Sayfanın altına gidin, "Hesabımı silmek istiyorum" tuşuna tıklayın. Şifrenizi girin ve "Silmeyi Onayla" tuşuna basarak işleminizi onaylayın.
notes_pt-BR: Role a página para baixo, clique em "I'd like to delete my account.", digite sua senha e clique em "Confirm Delete" para confirmar a exclusão da sua conta.

name: Discord
notes: Account deletion will not delete your messages, which you must do manually (Automating this process is possible using projects such as Undiscord). If you're a server owner, you'll need to either [delete the server](https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/213595197-How-do-I-delete-a-server-), or [transfer ownership](https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/216273938-How-do-I-transfer-server-ownership-) for account deletion to succeed. Account deletion takes 15 days on average (You can restore your account in this time).

name: Discourse
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Disney+
notes: Your Disney+ account is different from your Disney account. Deleting your Disney+ account will not delete your Disney account.

name: Displate
notes: Click the "Deactivate account" button.

name: Disroot
notes: Go to the home page, click the user icon then press 'Delete my Account', nobody will be able to use the same username after deletion.

name: distill.io
notes: Click the button to delete the account.

name: Divize
notes: Click on "Delete" and confirm by clicking on "Yes, Delete it!".

name: DLH
notes: Complete the captcha and press the button to request account deletion. An email will be sent to you to confirm such action.

name: DLive
notes: In settings scroll to the bottom, click the delete account button and enter your password. Your account will be deleted in 30 days.

name: Do IT
notes: E-mailing them is a deadend even after waiting for several weeks.

name: DocHub
notes: Log in, under "Account" click "Delete my Account".

name: Docker
notes: Log in, under account settings find and use "Deactivate Account".

name: DocMorris
notes: Contact customer service using their web contact form and ask them to delete your account.

name: DocuSign
notes: Follow the instructions at the linked support page; directions vary depending on account type and privileges.
notes_tr: Verilen bağlantıdaki destek sayfasındaki yönergeleri izleyin; yönergeler, hesap türüne ve izinlerine göre değişiklik gösterebilir.

name: Dollskill
notes: Email customer service and they will reply once that is complete.
email_subject:
Hello
, please delete the account associated to this email. My phone number is XXXXXXXX and I would like all data associated to my account to be removed.

name: DonationAlerts
notes: Press "Delete account" under the "Account removal". Your account will be deleted within a month.

name: Doodle
notes: In your Doodle account select 'Delete Doodle account' at the bottom of the page.
notes_tr: Doodle hesabınızda sayfanın altındaki "Doodle Hesabını Sil" tuşuna basın.
notes_de: Wähle 'Doodle Konto löschen' unten in den Konto-Einstellungen.

name: DoorDash
notes: You will need the phone tied to your account to receive the 2FA code.

name: Douyin
notes: You can log out of your account at 'Me'⮕'≡'⮕'Settings'⮕'Account and Security'⮕'Cancel Account'. However, your account has to meet the conditions linked.

name: DOWN
notes: You can delete it in the settings page
notes_tr: "Ayarlar" sayfasından silebilirsiniz

name: Dr. Martens
notes: Send an email stating that you want them to close your account. Include: full name on account, full billing address and registered email address. Once they confirm deletion it may take 7-10 days to take effect.

name: Drawabox
notes: Send an email from the address associated with the account you'd like to delete.

name: Draxlr
notes: Contact customer support to request account deletion. They should respond and will delete any personal information, database credentials and result caches that you have provided along with your account within 4 working days.

name: DreamHost
notes: Contact customer support using the customer service form or privacy contact email.

name: Dreamstime
notes: Click on the "Delete account" link towards the bottom of the page and then confirm your action in the opened pop-up. Accounts can be deleted only if you have no activity registered (uploads, downloads, comments,blogs etc).

name: Dreamwidth
notes: Changing your account status to Deleted will immediately hide your profile and journal from other users, but your account will not be removed for 30 days.
notes_tr: Hesap durumunuzu Silindi olarak ayarlarsanız profiliniz diğer kullanıcılardan anında gizlenir fakat hesabınız 30 gün içinde kaldırılmayacaktır.

name: DriveThruRPG
notes: Submit a request asking for the deletion of your account providing your username

name: Drivvo
notes: On the app, open the 'Menu' ⮕ 'My Account' ⮕ tap the three dots on the upper right corner, click 'Delete Account' and confirm.

name: Drizly
notes: Fill out the form and/or email them through their contact page: https://drizly.com/contact-us. They will email you promptly to let you know that your account has been deleted.

name: Dronebase
notes: Contact support to find out if you can delete your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silip silemeyeceğinizi öğrenmek için desteğe başvurun.

name: Drop (Massdrop)
notes: Log into your Drop account and submit a Support ticket on drop.com/support. Under Reason for Contacting Support, select Account inquiries.

name: Droplr
notes: Click at "Delete Account", type your email address and confirm your action by clicking "Delete".
notes_tr: "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın, e-posta adresini yazın ve işleminizi onaylamak için "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pt-BR: Clique em "Delete Account", digite seu e-mail e clique em "Delete" para confirmar a exclusão da sua conta.

name: Dropmark
notes: Personal accounts can be deleted from the "Danger Zone" section at the bottom of your [Account page](https://app.dropmark.com/account). Note: Before deleting your personal account, you must first [transfer ownership](https://support.dropmark.com/article/53-transferring-collection-ownership) or [delete all collections](https://support.dropmark.com/article/20-deleting-a-collection) owned by your account.
notes_tr: Kişisel hesaplar, hesap sayfasının alt kısmında bulunan "Tehlikeli Bölge" bölümünden silinebilir. Not: Kişisel hesabınızı silmeden önce, hesabınızda bulunan koleksiyonları silmeniz veya sahipliği devretmeniz gerekir.

name: DTF
notes: Log into your account. Click on your profile picture in the top right corner (bottom right on mobile), then on "Настройки". Select "Основные". There click on the blue "удалить свой аккаунт" link at the bottom. Type your deletion reason and press the red "Удалить" button, then the red "Подтвердить" button.
notes_ru: Войдите в свой аккаунт. Нажмите на свой аватар в правом верхнем углу (или в левом нижнем на телефоне), затем на "Настройки". Выберите "Основные". Там нажмите на синюю ссылку "удалить свой аккаунт" внизу страницы. Введите причину удаления и нажмите на красную кнопку "Удалить", а потом на красную кнопку "Подтвердить".

name: Dunkindonuts
notes: Click Personal Information, Click Delete My Account, Confirm ‘Yes, I want to proceed’, Reason for deleting your account, Choose ‘Other’, Type: I want to delete all of my private information. Then check both boxes if you agree. First box asks: Check here if you would like Dunkin’ Donuts to delete all of the personal information we have collected from you (subject to permitted exceptions). Second box: I understand that by deleting my information, I will no longer be able to use my DD Perks Account and will forfeit any accrued Perks Rewards. Then click Next, Then confirm by clicking ‘Delete My Account’.  Then you will get a confirmation page that says: Thank you for your request, this confirms that your account has been deleted! You then get an email that says it can take 48 hours to update.

name: Duo
notes: Delete all applications, users and other administrators in the Admin Panel according to the [support article](https://help.duo.com/s/article/2162), then contact support via email.
notes_pt-BR: Apague todos os aplicativos, usuários e outros administradores no Painel de Aministrador, de acordo com [o artigo do suporte](https://help.duo.com/s/article/2162), depois contate o suporte via e-mail.

name: Duolicious
notes: Log into your account. Go to the "Profile" tab. Scroll down and press "Delete My Account". Type "delete" then press "Done".

name: Duolingo
notes: Scroll down and click "ERASE PERSONAL DATA". You will receive an e-mail in which you have to click the link after "Delete my data link:". This confirms the erasure of your personal data and account.

name: Duotrope
notes: You must submit a support ticket to request account deletion.

name: Dwell
notes: It’s not possible to delete an account, you can either remove or replace your contact information with bogus details.
notes_tr: Hesabı silmek mümkün değildir, fakat iletişim bilgilerinizi silebilir veya sahte bilgilerle değiştirebilirsiniz.

name: Dwolla
notes: Dwolla accounts cannot be deleted, only disabled. To request deactivation of your account, contact support via email.
notes_tr: Dwolla hesapları silinemez, sadece devre dışı bırakılabilir. Hesabınızın devre dışı bırakılmasını talep etmek için, e-posta ile desteğe başvurun.
notes_pt-BR: Contas Dwolla não podem ser excluídas, apenas desativadas. Para solicitar a desativação da sua conta, entre em contato com o suporte via e-mail.

name: Dynadot
notes: Deletion can only be done via email. First, you must make sure the account has no active services from Dynadot (domains, VPS or Email Hosting, SSL certificates, Website Builders, etc.). Active domains must be deleted (this takes up to 30 days), or moved to another account/registrar. Once all services have been removed, send an email to accounts@dynadot.com from your email in which the account is registered under.

name: e-Técély
notes: On your profile page, click on "Supprimer mon compte".
notes_fr: Sur votre page de profil, cliquez sur "Supprimer mon compte".

name: e621
notes: Even though there is a delete option, the site states it will only change your account to a generic name and lock it. Your contributions (submissions, comments, etc) will remain.

name: EA Games / Origin / Electronic Arts
notes: Contact customer services to request deletion.
notes_tr: Silme talebi için müşteri hizmetleriyle iletişime geçin.
notes_fr: Contactez le support pour demander la suppression du compte.
notes_it: Contatta il sistema clienti per cancellarti.
notes_de: Kontaktiere den Support um die Löschung zu beantragen.
notes_pt-BR: Contate a assistência ao cliente e peça que sua conta seja deletada.
notes_ca: Contacti amb assistència al client i demani que es clausuri el seu compte.
notes_es: Contacta con asistencia al cliente y pide que se cierre tu cuenta.
notes_pl: Skontaktuj się z obsługą techniczną i poproś o usunięcie konta.

name: EasyEDA
notes: Log into easyeda.com first, then click on the provided URL. Type 'DELETE' into the input box and click the Delete button.
notes_tr: İlk olarak easyeda.com sitesine giriş yapın, verilen bağlantıya tıklayın. Çıkan kutuya 'DELETE' yazın ve "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_it: Sciogli o trasferisci i tuoi team e progetti prima di eliminare il tuo account. Anche i tuoi account LCSC e JLCPCB verranno eliminati!

name: easyfundraising
notes: Click on 'account' on the top right, then click 'Manage your data'. Click 'Learn more' under 'Delete your account and information' section. You will be prompted to enter your password.

name: easyJet
notes: You have to fill out the Data protection request form on their website, providing your identification.
notes_tr: Kimlik bilgilerinizi sağlayarak web sitelerindeki Veri Koruma talep formunu doldurmanız gerekir.

name: EatStreet
notes: Though you can deactivate your account under "My Account", in order to permanently delete your account, you must contact support and request deletion at: customer.service@eatstreet.com.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı "Hesabım" sayfası altından iptal edebileceğiniz gibi, hesabınızı kalıcı olarak silmek için desteğe başvurup hesabınızı silmek istediğinizi söylemeniz gerekir.

name: EBANX
notes: Customer support says that EBANX accounts can't be deleted, as the information about user transactions (e.g: payments) may be necessary in the future for, according to them, "legal obligations and legitimate interests".
notes_tr: Müşteri desteği, EBANX hesaplarının silinemeyeceğini söylüyor, çünkü kullanıcı işlemleri (örneğin: ödemeler) ileride onlara göre 'yasal yükümlülükler ve meşru menfaatler' için gerekli olabilir.
notes_pt-BR: O suporte ao cliente diz que contas EBANX não podem ser excluídas, pois as informações sobre as transações realizadas pelo usuário (exemplo: pagamentos) podem ser futuramente necessárias para, segundo eles, "legítimos interesses e obrigações legais".

name: eBay
notes: Hover over name on top left, click 'Account settings', click 'Close account' under the Account preferences column, then scroll down and click 'Close account and delete my data'. Select why you are leaving from drop down and continue. Click on checkmark and then click the left button to close your account. If you want an extra safety measure, replace all of your personal info with fake info before closing the account.
notes_tr: Hesap silme işleminden önce birkaç anket sorusu sorulacaktır.
notes_fr: Quelques questions d'opinion sera demandées avant la suppression du compte.
notes_de: Ein paar Fragen werden dir vor dem Löschen gestellt.
notes_it: Ti sarà chiesto di compilare qualche questionario prima che l'account sia eliminato
notes_pt-BR: Algumas perguntas serão feitas antes de deletar sua conta.
notes_ca: Se us realitzarà un petit qüestionari abans d'esborrar el compte.
notes_es: Se le hará un pequeño cuestionario antes de borrar la cuenta.
notes_cs: Zeptají se vás na několik anketových otázek před smazáním účtu.
notes_ru: До удаления учетной записи вам будут заданы несколько вопросов.

name: eBonus
notes: After submitting a contact form, they will ask for confirmation using email. After confirmation, account deletion takes 30 days.
notes_tr: Bir iletişim formu gönderdikten sonra, e-posta kullanarak onay isteyeceklerdir. Onaylandıktan sonra hesap silme işlemi 30 gün sürer.

name: Economist
notes: There are two ways to contact this website, such as calling a phone number that is based on where you reside, or use the live chat.

name: Edabit
notes: On the website, click on your avatar, click on Settings, click Account, and hit the 'Delete Account' button

name: Edizioni Simone
notes: Contact support via email and request your account to be deleted.
notes_it: Contatta l'assistenza via e-mail e richiedi l'eliminazione del tuo account.

name: Edpuzzle
notes: Scroll the bottom of the linked page and click 'Delete account'. Student accounts can only be deleted by request of a school teacher or administrator, or after 18 months of account inactivity. See their support article for more information: https://support.edpuzzle.com/hc/en-us/articles/4407364156557-How-Do-I-Delete-My-Account-

name: Edraw Software
notes: You need to contact Edraw Software support through their support center.
notes_es: Debes contactar al soporte de Edraw Software a través de su centro de soporte.

name: eDreams
notes: Click on "I want to delete My Account".
notes_tr: "Hesabımı silmek istiyorum" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pt-BR: Clique em "I want to delete My Account".

name: Educaplay
notes: You must go to your profile, click on Account Settings and then on Delete Account
notes_es: Tienes que ir a tu perfil, hacer clic en Configuración de cuenta y luego en Eliminar cuenta
notes_pt-BR: Acesse o perfil, clique em Account Settings e logo em seguida em Delete Account
notes_pt-PT: Acesse o perfil, clique em Account Settings e logo em seguida em Delete Account

name: Edvisors/ScholarshipPoints
notes: Go to the URL and fill out the form with the information associated with your account. Edvisors will respond with a confirmation email. Click the enclosed link and fill out the next form. Between a few hours and 45 days later, Edvisors should send a confirmation email that your account has been deleted.

name: EdX
notes: Go to the account deletion page and select Delete Account. If you have logged in through a social media account, you'll first have to unlink them, reset your password then delete the account.

name: Electroneum
notes: Contact the customer support using the form or via email and request the deletion of your account.
notes_it: Contatta l'assistenza clienti tramite il form o via email e richiedi la cancellazione del tuo account.

name: Element
notes: Go to "All Settings" scroll all the way down, and click on Deactivate Account.
notes_tr: "Tüm Ayarlar" kısmına girin ve aşağı doğru kaydırın, ardından "Hesabı Devre Dışı bırak" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Elevate
notes: You must send an e-mail to hello@elevateapp.com requesting deletion. You will then receive a response from support asking for feedback and to confirm the deletion. The next e-mail you receive from support will notify you that your account has been deleted.
notes_tr: Silme talebinde bulunmak için bir e-posta göndermelisiniz. Ardından, destek ekibinden geri bildirim isteyen ve silme işlemini onaylayan bir yanıt alacaksınız. Destek biriminden alacağınız bir sonraki e-posta, hesabınızın silindiğini size bildirecektir.
notes_fr: Il faut que vous demandez la suppression de votre compte dans un e-mail que vous envoyez à hello@elevateapp.com. Vous recevrez une réponse qui demande à la fois vos impressions de l'appli et une confirmation de la suppression. L'e-mail prochain que vous recevrez vous notifiera la suppression de votre compte.

name: Elfster
notes: Go to 'Account Settings' and scroll to the very bottom to see an option to delete your account.

name: Ello
notes: Quoted from Ello: Go to your Settings page and click the “Delete Account” link. Once you delete your account neither you, nor we, can recover it. Also note that your username may become available for another person to use.
notes_tr: Ello'dan alıntı: Ayarlar sayfanıza gidin ve "Hesabı Sil" bağlantısını tıklayın. Hesabınızı sildiğinizde ne siz ne de biz onu kurtaramayız. Ayrıca, kullanıcı adınızın başka bir kişinin kullanması için uygun hale gelebileceğini unutmayın.
notes_de: Zitiert von Ello: Besuchen Sie Ihre Einstellungen und klicken Sie auf “Konto löschen“. Sobald Ihr Konto gelöscht ist, können weder Sie, noch wir ihn wiederherstellen. Beachten Sie auch, dass Ihr Nutzername möglicherweise für eine andere Person verfügbar sein wird.

name: elmah.io
notes: Click the Delete Account button to remove your user account.

name: Elpais
notes: Complete the form, they will send you an email where you must respond indicating the identity document.
notes_tr: Formu doldurun, size kimlik belgesiyle yanıt vermeniz gereken bir e-posta gönderecekler.
notes_es: Complete el formulario, le enviarán un correo electrónico donde deberá responder indicando el documento de identidad.

name: Elsevier
notes: Fill out the form with your Account name, Email and a reason for deletion request.

name: Emby
notes: To delete your account, you must [log into the community](https://emby.media/community/index.php?/login/) (not the app).

name: Empik
notes: Send an e-mail asking for the deletion.

name: Engadget
notes: Scroll down to the bottom of the page and click 'Delete Account'.

name: enjin
notes: Scroll down and click on 'Delete Account'.

name: enjoei
notes: Scroll down on the configurations of your profile and click on 'Delete Account'. An e-mail will be sent for you to confirm the deletion by clicking a link.
notes_pt-BR: Nas configurações da sua conta, vá até o fim da página e clique 'Excluir conta'. Um e-mail será enviado para que confirme a exclusão da conta através de um link..

name: Enphase
notes: Scroll down on your account page and click on 'Delete Account'.

name: Envato
notes: You have to send them a request to delete the account using the contact form.
notes_tr: İletişim formunu kullanarak kendilerine hesap silme talebi göndermeniz gerekir.

name: Epic Games
notes: Log in to your account. On the "General Info" page, scroll to the "Delete Account" section, request deletion and follow the steps.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın. "Genel Bilgi" sayfasından, aşağı kaydırın ve "Delete Account" kısmından hesabınızın silinmesini talep edin ve gösterilen adımları uygulayın.

name: Epidemic Sound
notes: Follow the link to the contact form by follwing the link in "If you still want to delete your account please contact us by clicking here.". In the contact form choose "My account" from the dropdown.

name: Epik
notes: Log in to your account. Start a new chat with customer support and request the deletion of your account and personal data. Make sure you have your customer support PIN on hand.
notes_nl: Log in op je account. Begin een nieuwe chat met de klantenservice en vraag of je account en persoonlijke gegevens verwijderd kunnen worden. Zorg dat je je klantenservice PIN bij de hand hebt.

name: Epoch Times
notes: Send a request to customer support demanding for the deletion of your account.

name: eProject.me
notes: Send an e-mail asking for the deletion.
notes_tr: Silmeyi talep etmek için e-posta gönderin.

name: eRepublik
notes: Create new Game Support ticket to request account removal.
notes_tr: Hesap kaldırma talebinde bulunmak için yeni Oyun Desteği talebi oluşturun.

name: ESPN
notes: At the bottom of the account settings page there is a Remove Account button
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfasının altında "Hesabı Kaldır" tuşu bulunuyor

name: EteSync
notes: It will send a Deletion verification email, follow the link there to delete your account.

name: eToro
notes: At the bottom of the page, click the button to close your account, select the reason for your deletion and continue to confirm it.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altında, "Hesabını Kapat" düğmesini tıklayın, silme nedeninizi seçin ve devam ederek onaylayın.

name: Etsy
notes: Click on 'Request deletion of your data' and then 'Yes, I'm sure'. You'll receive an e-mail with a link to finish the process.
notes_tr: "Verilerinizin silinmesini talep edin" tuşuna ve ardından "Evet, eminim" seçeneğine tıklayın. İşlemi bitirmek için bağlantı içeren bir e-posta alacaksınız.

name: Even
notes: Head to the account information page (Profile ⮕ App settings ⮕ Account info) and click on "Delete your Even account & data".

name: Eventim
notes: Search for Account, select question 'How can I delete my account', then click on 'This answer was not helpful'. A ticket will be opened.
notes_tr: Hesap sayfasına girin, "Hesabımı nasıl silebilirim" sorusunu seçin ve ardından "Bu cevap yardımcı olmadı" seçeneğini tıklayın. Bir destek talebi açılacaktır.

name: Everand
notes: Follow the instructions from this link.
notes_ru: Следуйте инструкциям по этой ссылке.

name: Evernote
notes: Sign in to account settings, click 'Account Status', click 'Close your Evernote Account', read carefully and accept.
notes_tr: Hesap ayarlarınıza girin, "Hesap Durumu" tuşuna ve ardından "Evernote Hesabınızı Kapatın" tuşuna tıklayın, dikkatli okuyun ve kabul edin.

name: EVGA
notes: Submit form to request deletion, open confirmation link from e-mail.

name: Evite
notes: Go to the URL, select 'Delete My Info' as the request type, and fill out the form with your account information. Open the email they send you and confirm. Wait a few days while they review your request. You should eventually receive email confirmation that your account was deleted, after which your login credentials will no longer work.

name: Exclusive Car Registry
notes: Click Profile icon ⮕ Show Menu ⮕ Security ⮕ Delete Profile ⮕ Type CONFIRM ⮕ Click Delete account button ⮕ Email Sent ⮕ Click DELETE ACCOUNT button.

name: Exercism
notes: Login and click 'Delete my Account'. Then click again on the next page to confirm deletion.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın ve "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Ve bir sonraki sayfada tekrar tıklayarak silmeyi onaylayın.

name: Exophase
notes: They delete your account in 72 hours and it also includes the forum account attached, but the posts are kept and *not* anonymized. You must keep your connected services attached during this time so they can be fully removed by an admin. Your connected services (Playstation, Xbox etc) also cannot be added to a future account without contacting a staff member.

name: Expedia
notes: Contact support via the live chat or the contact form and request the deletion of your account.
notes_tr: İletişim formunu veya canlı desteği kullanarak müşteri hizmetlerine başvurun ve hesabınızın silinmesini talep edin.
notes_de: Kontaktiere den Support über den Live Chat oder das Kontaktformular und fordere die Löschung deines Kontos.

name: Experian
notes: You have to call or email them. They respond to email quickly, however, so it is not that painful.

name: Experian UK
notes: Head to 'Your Subscriptions' and click the 'Close your Experian Account' button. This will cancel any subscriptions and closes your account.

name: Expo
notes: On the settings page, scroll down to the bottom of the page and follow the steps under 'Delete your account'.

name: ExpressVPN
notes: You must either go through live support on the support page and specifically request the deletion of your account or write an e-mail from the registered address. Either way you will probably be asked to confirm again by mail.
notes_de: Auf Englisch kannst du entweder den Support Chat explizit um die Löschung deines Accounts bitten, oder eine Email von der zum Account gehörenden Adresse schicken. Wie du auch vorgehst wirst du vermutlich aufgefordert werden die Löschung per Mail zu bestätigen.
email_body: To whom it may concern,%0D%0A%0D%0AI am reaching out to you to request the cancellation and deletion of the ExpressVPN account attached to this Email address and its data as I am no longer using the service.%0D%0A%0D%0ABest Regards

name: EZsniper
notes: You have to fill in the contact form with the appropriate details, then in the body request for the deletion of your account and all data attached.

name: Facebook
notes: While you can delete your account easily, some of the data including messages, are there to stay forever, just as stated in the website's privacy policy.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı kolayca silebilirsiniz, ancak mesajlar dahil bazı veriler, web sitesinin gizlilik politikasında belirtildiği gibi sonsuza kadar kalacaktır.
notes_fr: Bien que vous puissiez supprimer votre compte facilement, quelques données y compris les messages restent pour jamais, comme déclaré dans le politique de confidentialité.
notes_it: Mentre puoi eliminare il tuo account facilmente, qualche dato come le chat o i messaggi di gruppo rimarranno nei loro database, come scritto sul loro sito nella pagina Privacy
notes_de: Während du deinen Account leicht löschen kannst, bleiben einige deiner Daten dauerhaft. z.B. Chat- und Gruppennachrichten. Dies ist so in den Datenschutzbestimmungen bestimmt.
notes_pt-BR: Você pode deletar sua conta facilmente, porém dados de conversas ficarão armazenados para sempre, como explicitado na Privacidade do site.
notes_ca: Podeu esborrar el compte fàcilment. Tanmateix, algunes dades -com el xat o missatges en grup- són desades per sempre, tal com s'explica en els termes de privadesa del lloc.
notes_es: Aunque puedes borrar la cuenta facilmente, algunos de los datos como el chat o mensajes en grupo son guardados para siempre, como se explica en los Terminos de privacidad del sitio.
notes_pl: Możesz usunąć swoje konto, ale zgodnie z polityką prywatności wszystkie dane razem z wiadomościami zostaną w bazie danych na zawsze.
notes_cs: Přestože je jednoduché si smazat svůj účet, nějaké data včetně zpráv tam zůstanou navždy, jak je napsáno v Zásadách ochrany osobních údajů.
notes_ru: Хотя вы можете легко удалить свой аккаунт, некоторые данные, включая сообщения, останутся навсегда, это указано в политике конфиденциальности веб-сайта.

name: Facebook Messenger
notes: If you logged in with your Facebook account, you can just delete that account. If you registered using your phone number, go to your account settings and tap on Delete Your Account and Information.

name: Faceit
notes: See ['How do I get my personal details deleted on FACEIT?'](https://support.faceit.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001449004-How-do-I-get-my-personal-details-deleted-on-FACEIT-)
notes_tr: Aşağıdaki makaleye göz atın.

name: Fairphone
notes: Need to email privacy@fairphone.com and ask for your account to be deleted. Takes around 14 working days for the account to be deleted.

name: FamilySearch
notes: Go into your account settings and then click "Delete Account" at the bottom of the page.

name: Fanatical
notes: Visit the linked page and click 'Delete Account'.

name: Fandom Wikia
notes: Click on 'Close my account'. Disables the account but cannot delete user data completely. Retains user contributions and username is not released.
notes_tr: "Hesabımı Kapat" tuşuna tıklayın. Hesabı devre dışı bırakır ancak kullanıcı verisini tamamen silmez. Kullanıcı katkılarını korur ve kullanıcı adı serbest bırakılmaz.

name: FanFiction
notes: On the linked page, copy the provided code and send it to support@fanfiction.com using the email you registered with. Staff will respond and delete your account within 24 hours.

name: FastWeb
notes: Go to the URL and log in with your credentials. Go to 'My Account' ⮕ 'Account' and select 'Delete My Account'. Answer 'Yes' to the prompt. FastWeb will immediately log you out, and your credentials will no longer work.

name: FaucetPay
notes: Accounts cannot be deleted by the users, they can only be suspended by writing at Customer Support

name: Fauna
notes: In the Fauna dashboard, create a new database named 'delete-request-{today's date in DDMMYYY}'. Then open a support ticket to request deletion.

name: FDM Group
notes: Send an email to them.

name: FedEx
notes: You will be asked to upload photo ID after the initial form submission. Alternatively, you can call customer service to have your user ID deleted.

name: Fedora
notes: Create a new issue and ask for your account to be deleted.

name: FeedBin
notes: At the bottom of the linked page, click 'Cancel Account'.

name: Feedly
notes: Log in and click the 'Delete Account' button.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_de: Melde dich an und klicke auf den 'Account löschen' Button.

name: Ferox Hosting
notes: You have to create a ticket regarding account deletion and you will be asked to prove ownership of the account.
notes_tr: Hesap silme ile ilgili bir destek talebi oluşturmanız gerekir ve hesabın sahipliğini kanıtlamanız istenir.

name: Fever
notes: On the app, tap 'profile' at the bottom right, then the gear icon at the upper right, scroll to the end and click 'Delete Account'. State the reason why and confirm. Deletion is immediate

name: Fidélité TCL
notes: On your profile page, go to "Confidentialité", then "Supprimer mon compte".
notes_fr: Sur votre pasge de profil, allez sur "Confidentialité", puis "Supprimer mon compte".

name: Figma
notes: Log in, click on your profile picture in the top right of the header, click on 'Settings', scroll down to the accout section, click on 'Delete account', re-enter your account password, type 'delete my account' into the dialog box, and click on 'Delete account'.

name: Filen.io
notes: The deletion option is at the bottom of the second tab of the user settings page when logged in.

name: Fin.do
notes: Request account deletion via the contact form.
notes_ru: Запросите удаление аккаунта через форму обратной связи.
notes_uk: Зробіть запит видалення акаунту через форму зворотнього зв'язку.

name: Finanzblick
notes: Click on your username (top left) ⮕ click on 'Profileinstellungen' ⮕ 'Account löschen'. All data is fully erased.
notes_tr: Kullanıcı adınıza tıklayın (sol üst) ve ardından "Profil Ayarları" "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Tüm veriler tamamen silinecektir.
notes_it: Clicca sul tuo username (in alto a sinistra) ⮕ clicca su 'Profileinstellungen' ⮕ 'Account löschen'. Tutti i dati saranno cancellati.
notes_de: Klicke auf deinen username (oben rechts) ⮕ klicke auf 'Profileinstellungen' ⮕ 'Account löschen'. Alle Daten sind augenblicklich gelöscht.
notes_pt-BR: Clique em seu usuário (topo esquerdo) ⮕ clique em 'Profileinstellungen' ⮕ 'Account löschen'. Todos os seus dados serão completamente apagados.
notes_ca: Cliqui al seu usuari (adalt esquerra) ⮕ cliqui a 'Profileinstellungen' ⮕ 'Account löschen'. Totes les seves dades seràn eliminades.
notes_es: Haz clic en tu usuario (arriba a la izquierda) ⮕ haz clic en 'Profileinstellungen' ⮕ 'Account löschen'. Todos tus datos serán eliminados.

name: FinnishPod101.com
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Finviz
notes: One must contact customer support via email or contact form to request account deletion.
email_body: Please delete my account registered with this email address.

name: Firefox
notes: “Cancel your account” link at the bottom of the page.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altındaki "Hesabınızı İptal Edin" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_fr: Cliquez le lien « Cancel your account » au bas de la page.
notes_it: “Cancel your account” in fondo alla pagina.
notes_pt-BR: Link “Cancel your account” no final da página.
notes_ca: “Cancel your account” al final de la pàgina.
notes_es: “Cancel your account” al final de la página.
notes_pl: Kliknij “Cancel your account” na dole strony.

name: Fitbit
notes: From the dashboard website, click 'Settings', then scroll down and click 'Delete Account'. You'll receive an e-mail with the link for the actual deletion.
notes_tr: Kontrol paneli web sitesinde, "Ayarlar" tuşuna tıklayın, ardından aşağı kaydırın ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Asıl silme işlemi için bağlantı içeren bir e-posta alacaksınız.

name: FitnessSyncer
notes: Login, click profile link, scroll down to delete and confirm.

name: Fiverr
notes: Log-in, go to the link and make the request to **deactivate account**

name: Fixer.io
notes: Go to your account page, click 'delete account' at the bottom.

name: FixMyCar
notes: You must contact support.

name: Flat
notes: Log-in, go to the link and click the **Delete my account** button

name: Flathub
notes: Log in to your account, go to the linked page, click "Delete account" and confirm the deletion.
notes_ru: Войдите в свой аккаунт, перейдите на указанную страницу, нажмите "Удалить аккаунт" и подтвердите удаление.

name: Flaticon
notes: Scroll down to the bottom of the linked page and click 'Close my account'.

name: Flattr
notes: Type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Permanently delete account".
notes_tr: Şifrenizi girin ve işleminizi onaylamak için "Kalıcı Olarak Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pt-BR: Digite sua senha e clique em "Permanently delete account" para confirmar a exclusão da sua conta.

name: Fleek
notes: Log in to your account, go to the linked page, scroll to the bottom and click "Delete account" and confirm the deletion.

name: Flightradar24
notes: According to their Terms and Conditions, you must email them to delete your account.

name: Flip
notes: Scroll down to the bottom of the page and click 'Delete Account'.

name: Flixster
notes: Email privacy@flixster-inc.com and ask to have your account deleted.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesini talep etmek için onlara e-posta gönderin.

name: Flo Health
notes: Contact support using the linked form or by email and request account deletion.

name: Floatplane
notes: Click the 'Delete Account' button and type your password. Your account will be deleted in 2 weeks.

name: Floor Plan Creator
notes: Click the 'Delete Account' button and confirm your selection.

name: Flowkey
notes: You need to send an email requesting to delete your account.

name: Fluid UI
notes: The easiest way is to log into your account, start the support chat in the bottom right corner and ask for account deletion. You can also contact the support by email.

name: FMOD
notes: On the linked page under Profile select 'To delete your account, click here'.

name: Foap
notes: Account deletion requires contacting customer support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.

name: FogBugz
notes: The account retention period depends on the type of account you have.

name: Follett
notes: Scroll to the bottom and click the correct form or send an email.
email_body: Please delete my data from all Follett services under my email address XXXXXX.

name: Followlike
notes: On "Delete Sites or Account" section, click the red 'Delete account'.

name: Font Awesome
notes: Near the bottom of the linked page, click the red 'Delete Account' link. Confirm your password, then click 'Delete Account' again. If you have Font Awesome Pro, canceling your subscription will also start the process of deleting your account.

name: FontStruct
notes: On the linked page choose the 'Delete Everything' option, confirm your password and click 'Delete Account'.

name: Foodmaxx
notes: Contact customer service using the linked form and request account deletion, or call 1-800-692-5710.

name: Fooducate
notes: Log into your profile, fill out reason (optional), click Delete

name: ForeverMissed
notes: Use the contact form to ask customer service to delete your account.

name: forward2me
notes: You need to contact support to delete your account and personal information.

name: Fotka
notes: To delete your account, you must not post anything for at least three days.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için en az 3 gün boyunca bir şey paylaşmamak zorundasınız.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte, ne postez rien pendant 3 jours.
notes_it: Per eliminare il tuo account, non devi pubblicare niente per almeno tre giorni.
notes_de: Um deinen Account zu löschen, schreibe nichts für mindestens drei Tage.
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar sua conta, você deve postar nada por pelo menos três dias.
notes_pl: Aby usunąć swoje konto, nie możesz dodawać żadnych treści przez co najmniej trzy dni.
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte no ha de pujar res en 3 dies.
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta no debes subir nada por lo menos 3 días.

name: Framer
notes: You have to email the support to delete the account. They take a few hours to respond.

name: France Identité
notes: Enter your document number then a deletion code received by e-mail to delete your account.
notes_fr: Entrez votre numéro de document puis un code de suppression reçu par e-mail pour supprimer votre compte.

name: Franz
notes: Navigate to the bottom of the profile page where you have the option to delete your account.

name: FREAKHOSTING
notes: Create a ticket to the Billing department and request your account to be deleted.

name: FreeBitco.In
notes: This website does not provide options that allow the user to delete their account.
notes_tr: Bu web sitesi, kullanıcının hesabını silmesine izin veren seçenekler sunmamaktadır.
notes_pt-BR: Este website não disponibiliza opções que possibilitem ao usuário excluir sua conta.

name: FreeCodeCamp
notes: You'll need to access your account settings; it's under a section labeled Danger Zone
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfasına ulaşmanız gerekir; "Tehlikeli Bölge" kısmının altında bulunuyor

name: FreeDNS
notes: It is impossible to delete your FreeDNS account. However, your account automatically gets tagged as "dormant" if you are using the free plan and haven't logged in for 6 months. When your account is dormant, all of your domains get temporarily suspended until you log back in and activate them again.

name: Freejam
notes: Visit the Account page, click "Delete account", type your username and confirm.
notes_it: Visita la pagina Account, fai clic su "Elimina account", digita il tuo nome utente e conferma.

name: Freelancer
notes: Click Close My Account in Account settings from above link. Complete the short survey, and click Close my account.
notes_tr: Verilen bağlantıdaki "Hesap Ayarları" sayfasından "Hesabımı Kapat" tuşuna tıklayın. Kısa bir anket tamamlayın ve "Hesabımı Kapat" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Freeletics
notes: After choosing to delete your account, a confirmation e-mail will be sent with a link you must visit.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı kapatmayı seçtikten sonra, onaylama bağlantısını içeren bir onaylama e-postası alacaksınız.

name: Freenom
notes: This website does not provide options that allow the user to delete their account.
notes_tr: Bu web sitesi, kullanıcının hesabını silmesine izin veren seçenekler sunmamaktadır.
notes_pt-BR: Este website não disponibiliza opções que possibilitem ao usuário excluir sua conta.

name: Freesound
notes: You cannot delete your account yourself if you have sounds uploaded to your account. In their own words: "Because you have sounds on freesound, deleting your user is not a trivial task. As such, we ask you to please [contact the administrators via the Contact Form](https://freesound.org/contact/). They will help you with the deletion of your account....". Alternatively - you can go through all your sounds, delete them one-by-one, and then delete your account.
notes_tr: Eğer hesabınızda yüklenmiş sesler varsa hesabı kendi başınıza silemezsiniz. Sitenin kendi söyleriyle: 'Freesound'da kendi sesleriniz olduğundan olayı, hesabınızı silmek önemsiz bir iş değildir. Bu nedenle, lütfen iletişime geçmenizi rica ederiz. Hesabınızı silmenize yardım edecekler...'. Alternatif olarak, yüklediğiniz tüm sesleri bulup teker teker silebilirsiniz, ardından hesabı silebilirsiniz.

name: Freshdesk
notes: On the top tab, click 'Admin' then 'Account', at the bottom, and search for the 'cancel my account' on the right. It is not really deleted, just closed.
notes_tr: Yukarıdaki sekmede, "Yönetici" tuşuna ardından "Hesap" ve son olarak sayfanın sağ altında "Hesabımı İptal Et" tuşunu bulun. Hesap aslında silinmeyecek, sadece kapatılacak.

name: Freshping
notes: Go to https://DOMAIN.freshping.io/settings/account (replace DOMAIN with your Freshping domain), scroll to the bottom of the page and press the "Delete account" button, then "Yes, Proceed" on the pop-up.
notes_pt-BR: Navegue para https://DOMINIO.freshping.io/settings/account (substitua DOMINIO com o seu domínio do Freshping), no final da página encontrará um botão para apagar a conta, confirme no pop-up que aparece em seguida.

name: Frontend Mentor
notes: Click the 'Delete Account' button and type your username.

name: Fruux
notes: You will need to go to Account setting and click delete account
notes_tr: Hesap ayarlarına girip, hesabı sil tuşuna basın

name: Function of Beauty
notes: You will need to request account deletion throught chat or email.

name: Funimation
notes: In the Submit a Request form, under "How can we help you?," choose "Subscription”, then "Cancel or Delete Account", and enter a brief description of your request in the “Description” field.

name: Fur Affinity
notes: Click the "Send Account Deletion Confirmation Email" button, which will trigger a mail with a deletion link
notes_de: Klicke auf den "Send Account Deletion Confirmation Email" Knopf, dies löst eine Mail mit einem Löschlink aus

name: Furbase
notes: At the bottom of the account management page, check the "Delete User Account" box and submit
notes_de: Am Ende der Account-Management Seite die Checkbox "Benutzerkonto kündigen" anhaken und absenden

name: FutureLearn
notes: Scroll down to the bottom of the page and click 'Delete my account'.

name: G2A
notes: You will find a delete account button under 'My Account' ⮕ 'Account details' click it and accept, you will then receive an email requiring you to confirm the account deletion. Confirm it, then your account will be deleted if you do not login in the next 14 days.

name: Gab Social
notes: Under "Account Settings" there is an option to delete your account. Enter your password and press "Delete Account"

name: Gadu-Gadu
notes: You will find option to remove your account under Profile - My Account tab, after log in. Removed GG account number is going back to available numbers for new users.
notes_tr: Giriş yaptıktan sonra "Profil" "Hesabım" sekmesinden hesabı silme seçeneğini bulacaksınız. Kaldırılan GG hesap numarası, yeni kullanıcılar için mevcut numaralara geri döner.
notes_pl: Po zalogowaniu się do konta w zakładce Moje konto - Profil znajduje się opcja usuń konto. Usunięty numer GG wraca do puli numerów dostępnych dla nowych użytkowników.

name: Gaijin Entertainment
notes: If you want to suspend your account on the Gaijin website, please press the "Delete account" link in your account's settings, or proceed directly through the "Confirm account deletion" link. After following the instructions from the letter, your account will be suspended.
notes_ru: В случае, если вы хотите приостановить доступ к аккаунту на сайте Store.gaijin.net, проследуйте по ссылке "Удалить аккаунт" в настройках вашего профиля, либо сразу перейдите по ссылке на страницу подтверждения удаления аккаунта.

name: GAINSFIRE
notes: Open the App on your phone, navigate to your settings and select "Delete account" at the very bottom of the page.

name: galaxy
notes: Navigate to the "delete your account" section of the "danger zone" in your account settings and follow the instructions. If you have published any games, you must delete them before you can proceed with account deletion. Games can be deleted within their edit page.

name: Galaxy Play
notes: Check the "confirm" checkbox and click "Delete account". Enter PIN code sent to your phone number. Your account will now be locked, logged out on all devices and will be permanently deleted after 14 days

name: Game Tracker
notes: Scroll down in the account manager and click on close account button. The account will be deleted 30 days after closing it.
notes_fr: Descendez dans les paramètres, cliquez sur le bouton close account, votre compte sera alors définitivement supprimé dans un délai de 30 jours.
notes_pt-BR: Desça na página da conta e clique em 'close account'. A conta será deletada definitivamente após 30 dias.

name: GameFAQs
notes: To delete your account, first close it with the provided link, after that you will be able to delete it on the same page.

name: Gameforge
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: GameFront
notes: Although the site claims to allow account deletion, it was not functional at the time of writing, instead returning a 500 status code (Internal Server Error). They claim that they will refuse to delete accounts through any other means.

name: Gamefroot
notes: Account deletion requires contacting the developer. The privacy policy references a non-existent deletion link.
email_body: Please delete my GameFroot account registered under this email address, and opt me out from receiving any marketing communications.

name: GameGleam
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.

name: Gamehag
notes: Going to the bottom of the page and clicking on 'Delete Account' will only hide it, after deleting an account you can log back in and click recover even after years. E-mail does not work.
notes_bg: Когато изтриете акаунт, той може да бъде върнат като влезете пак дори след години. Имейлът им не работи.

name: GameJolt
notes: They only accept requests from the email address on your account.
email_body: Please delete my GameJolt account under this email address.

name: Gamespot
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: GameStop
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Garena
notes: Accounts can only be deleted by opening a ticket to their support team.
notes_tr: Hesaplar, destek ekibine bir talep gönderilerek silinebilir.

name: Garmin
notes: Select the DELETE YOUR DATA option under the DATA MANAGEMENT section. Deletion process will be started and an email is sent upon finishing.

name: GasBuddy
notes: GasBuddy is unresponsive to account deletion requests, but you can try submitting a support ticket anyway using the linked form. If you're a California resident, you can submit a request to have your personal information deleted. You may be asked to submit more personal information to verify your identity.

name: Gauges
notes: Contact support and request they delete your account.
notes_tr: Desteğe başvurun ve hesabınızı silmeyi isteyin.
notes_fr: Contactez le support et demandez la suppression de vore compte.
notes_it: Contatta il supporto e richiedi la cancellazione del tuo account.
notes_de: Kontaktiere den Support und sie löschen deinen Account.
notes_pt-BR: Contate o suporte e peça que eles excluam sua conta.
notes_ca: Contacti amb l'assistència al client i demani que li esborrrin el compte.
notes_es: Contacta con asistencia al cliente y pide que te borren la cuenta.

name: Gearbest
notes: You will need to open a ticket. In the first field, select "Account Management ⮕ Advanced Account Information" and then send your message requesting the deletion of the account. Within 48 hours, the customer support will return your message asking if you confirm the deletion of the account. You can also contact them [via email](mailto:support@gearbest.com).
notes_tr: Bir destek talebi açmanız gerekecek. İlk alanda, "Hesap Yönetimi" "Gelişmiş Hesap Bilgisi" seçeneğini seçin ve ardından hesabın silinmesini belirtin. 48 saat içinde müşteri desteği, hesabın silinmesini onaylayıp onaylamadığınızı soran mesajınızı geri verecektir. Onlarla e-posta yoluyla da iletişime geçebilirsiniz.
notes_pt-BR: Você precisará abrir um ticket. No primeiro campo, selecione "Account Management ⮕ Advanced Account Information" e em seguida, envie sua mensagem solicitando a exclusão da conta. Em até 48 horas um atendente irá retornar sua mensagem perguntando se você confirma a exclusão da conta. Você também pode contatá-los [via e-mail](mailto:support@gearbest.com).

name: Geni
notes: Delete any of the information you would like removed from the site. Then select 'Account Settings' and 'Close Account'
notes_tr: Siteden kaldırılmasını istediğiniz tüm bilgileri silin. Ardından, "Hesap Ayarları" ve "Hesabı Kapat" seçeneği seçin
notes_fr: Supprimez toutes les informations que vous voulez enlever du site. Puis, cliquer sur « Account Settings » et puis « Close Account ».
notes_de: Lösche die Informationen, die du entfernt haben möchtest, von der Seite. Dann wähle 'Account Settings' und 'Close Account'
notes_it: Elimina qualsiasi informazione che desideri sia rimossa. Quindi seleziona 'Account Settings' e 'Close Account'
notes_pt-BR: Delete qualquer informação que você deseja ser removida do site. Então selecione 'Account Settings' e 'Close Account'
notes_ca: Elimini qualsevol informació que vulgui que no apareixi al lloc web. Després seleccioni 'Account Settings' i 'Close Account'
notes_es: Elimina cualquier información que no quieras que aparezca en el sitio web. Luego selecciona 'Account Settings' y 'Close Account'

name: Genius
notes: Visit the linked page to submit a ticket. Select 'Account Deletion/Data Erasure Request' from the drop down and fill out the form. You will be sent an email that asks you to reply with 'Confirm Account Deletion' to process your request. You also won't be notified when your account is deleted.

name: Gentoo Forums
notes: Send an email to forum-mods@gentoo.org requesting account deletion. However, all your forum posts and comments will still be shown, and your account will only be anonymized as detailed [here](https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Project:Forums#Account_removal_requests).
email_body: I request for my Gentoo Forums account to be deleted. My username is XXXXXXXXX

name: Genymotion Cloud (SaaS)
notes: First, log in to your account and go to the Administration Panel, cancel your plan and remove all credit cards. After doing that, you can submit a support ticket requesting the account deletion.

name: Genymotion Desktop
notes: Log in, and on the "Account Info" tab, scroll to the bottom and click "Delete account". There should then be a confirmation box, where you can delete your account.

name: Geocaching
notes: Click "Delete your account" at the bottom of the page, then click "Yes, delete my account".

name: GeoGebra
notes: Scroll down to the bottom of the linked page and click the button to delete your account.

name: GeoGuessr
notes: Just click delete account at the bottom of the page and confirm account deletion.

name: GermanTechJobs
notes: Click on the 'Log in' button. Then, go to 'Account' and 'Delete Account'. You will be redirected to write to the support email. Account gets deleted within 48 hours.

name: get.tech
notes: Contact the following email from the registered email to remove your account.
notes_pt-BR: Entre em contato com o e-mail abaixo, a partir do e-mail da sua conta, solicitando a remoção.
notes_de: Kontaktiere die folgende E-Mail von der registrierten E-Mail Adresse um dein Account zu löschen.

name: GetContact
notes: You need to login on the website via WhatsApp, Telegram or SMS and then proceed to deletion.

name: GetCreditScore
notes: Select the Delete My Account option on the preferences page and click submit.
notes_tr: Tercihler sayfasında "Hesabımı Sil" seçeneğini seçin ve "Gönder" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: GG2U
notes: You need to email them for them to erase your account.

name: GHash.IO
notes: You can't delete your account without contacting them. You must set the subject to 'Delete Account'
notes_tr: Onlarla iletişim kurmadan hesabınızı silemezsiniz. E-posta gönderirken e-posta konusunu "Hesabı Sil" olarak ayarlayın
notes_de: Sie können Ihren Account nicht löschen ohne den Support zu kontaktieren. Sie müssen den Betreff auf 'Delete Account' setzen.

name: Giant Bomb
notes: You can delete your account by contacting support.
notes_tr: Müşteri desteğine iletişime geçerek hesabınızı silebilirsiniz.

name: Giphy
notes: Click the "Delete Your Account" button at the bottom of the page.

name: GitBook
notes: Scroll to the bottom of your account settings and click "Delete Account"

name: GitHub
notes: Click on 'Delete account' near the bottom of the page and follow the instructions. Some user content will continue to exist anonymously on the website.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altındaki "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın ve yönergeleri takip edin. Bazı kullanıcı içerikleri web sitesinde anonim olarak bulunmaya devam edecek.

name: GitKraken
notes: Type in the verification message "Delete My Account" as required and confirm deletion.
notes_tr: Gerektiği şekilde "Hesabımı Sil" doğrulama mesajını yazın ve silme işlemini onaylayın.

name: GitLab
notes: Click on 'Delete account' near the bottom of the page. Some user content will continue to exist anonymously on the website.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altındaki "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Bazı kullanıcı içerikleri web sitesinde anonim olarak bulunmaya devam edecek.

name: GitPod
notes: Click on 'Delete account' near the bottom of the page.

name: Gizmodo
notes: Fill out the form using the email address of your account and click on the verification link that is sent.

name: Glassdoor
notes: Fill out the form on the linked page. Under the field "What is your personal data request?", select "Delete my personal data". You will be asked to verify your email and then your account will be deleted within 30 days.

name: Glide (UK)
email_body: Please delete my account and data registered with this email address.

name: Glitch
notes: Log in first, go to the url, scroll down and press delete account.
notes_tr: İlk olarak giriş yapın, bağlantıya girip aşağı kaydırın ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Glorious Forums
notes: Select your account in the top right, select the bottom-most yellow button (contact icon), and select "Delete My Account". Confirm your selection, and it is done.

name: Glovo
notes: It is also possible to file an account deletion request via the "Contact Us" section at the bottom of the page.

name: Glyph / Trion Worlds / Gamigo
notes: In order to delete your account, you have to log in, go to "Security and Privacy" and press "Delete my account" and enter a code that has been sent to you with email.
notes_de: Um Ihr Konto zu löschen, müssen Sie sich einloggen, zu "Sicherheit und Datenschutz" gehen und auf "Mein Konto löschen" drücken und einen Code eingeben, der Ihnen per E-Mail zugesandt wurde
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için oturum açmanız, "Security and Privacy" menüsüne gitmeniz ve "Delete my account" butonuna basmanız ve size e-posta ile gönderilen bir kodu girmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte, vous devez vous connecter, aller sur "Sécurité et intimité", cliquer sur "Supprimer mon compte" et entrer un code qui vous a été envoyé par e-mail.
notes_es: Para eliminar su cuenta, tiene que iniciar sesión, ir a "Security and Privacy" y pulsar "Delete my account" e introducir un código que se le ha enviado por correo electrónico.
notes_ru: Для того чтобы удалить ваш аккаунт, вам необходимо войти в существующую учетную запись, перейти в раздел "Security and Privacy" в настройках, нажать "Delete my account" и ввести код, который был выслан вам по электронной почте.

name: Gmail
notes:
Click the trash can next to gmail, enter your new email address, and confirm the verification email. You can request a copy of your data, before you delete it.
If you want to delete your entire google account, use the instructions for [Google](https://justdeleteme.xyz/#google).
notes_tr: Gmail'in yanındaki çöp kutusunu tıklayın, yeni e-posta adresinizi girin ve doğrulama e-postasını onaylayın

name: GMX
notes: You can delete your account, by following the steps provided here: 'https://hilfe.gmx.net/account/verwalten/loeschen.html'
notes_tr: Verilen bağlantıdaki adımları uygulayarak hesabınızı silebilirsiniz.

name: GNC
notes: Open a live chat ⮕ Ask for agent ⮕ Request account deletion. Put a random phone number if you need to. It will take 7-10 days for it to be processed.

name: GNOME
notes: In the section Account removal, you need to accept the option delete your account, and input your password.

name: Gocatch
notes: Either submit a request via the Gocatch support site or send an email to them and ask for your account to be permanently deleted (specify that you do not want it to be able to be reactivated at a later date). Although the information on the support page only mentions account 'deactivation', the company appears to honour requests for deletion.

name: GoDaddy
notes: Navigate to account preferences, select to "Close Account" and confirm.
notes_tr: Hesap seçeneklerine ilerleyin, "Hesabı Kapat" tuşuna tıklayın ve onaylayın.
notes_ru: Перейдите к настройкам учетных записей, выберите «Закрыть учетную запись» и подтвердите.

name: GoFundMe
notes: Log in first, go to the url, scroll down and press delete account.
notes_tr: İlk olarak giriş yapın, bağlantıya girip aşağı kaydırın ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: GOG
notes: Email privacy@gog.com and ask to have your account deleted.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesini talep etmek için onlara e-posta gönderin.

name: Goggles4u
notes: Email steve@goggles4u.com and ask to have your account deleted.

name: Gogo
notes: Select "Delete My Data" on the form for the request type.

name: GoJek
notes: Email customer service to request deletion.
notes_tr: Silmeyi talep etmek için müşteri hizmetlerine e-posta gönderin.

name: Golf GameBook Scorecard & GPS
notes: You can delete profile from account settings in the app.

name: Good Food
notes: It is impossible to close your account. You can contact the customer service just for them to suspend your account (and payments).
notes_fr: Il est impossible de fermer le compte. Vous devez contacter le support à la clientèle pour suspendre votre compte (et les paiements).

name: Good Noows
notes: On the top bar, click on 'Your name', then click on the 'Delete Account' button at the bottom of the dialog.
notes_tr: Üst çubukta, "Adınız" öğesini ve ardından pencerenin altındaki "Hesabı Sil" düğmesini tıklayın.
notes_fr: Dans le menu en haut, cliquez sur votre nom, puis cliquez sur « Delete Account » au bas du dialogue.
notes_it: Sul menu in alto, clicca sul tuo nome, quindi clicca sul pulsante 'Delete Account' che è posizionato in fondo.
notes_pt-BR: Na barra superior, clique em 'seu nome', então clique no botão 'Delete Account' no final do diálogo.
notes_ca: A la barra superior, cliqui al 'seu nom', després cliqui a 'Delete Account' al final del quadre de diàleg.
notes_es: En la barra superior, haz clic en 'tu nombre', después haz clic en 'Delete Account', al final del cuadro de diálogo.

name: Goodlord
notes: You must send an e-mail to the privacy team.

name: Google One
notes:
Click the trash can next to Google One and confirm the verification email. You can request a copy of your data, before you delete it.
If you want to delete your entire google account, use the instructions for [Google](https://justdeleteme.xyz/#google).

name: Google Pay
notes:
Click the trash can next to Google Pay and confirm the verification email. You can request a copy of your data, before you delete it.
If you want to delete your entire google account, use the instructions for [Google](https://justdeleteme.xyz/#google).

name: GoPetition
notes: Enter a reason for closing and your password and click delete, however this is more like a deactivation as you can contact them to undelete it
notes_tr: Kapatmak için bir neden ve şifrenizi girin ve sil tuşuna tıklayın, ancak bu daha çok bir devre dışı bırakma gibidir çünkü silmeyi geri almak için onlarla iletişime geçebilirsiniz
notes_fr: Saisissez une raison pour fermer et votre mot de passe et cliquez sur supprimer, mais cela est plus comme une désactivation que vous pouvez les contacter pour annuler la suppression
notes_de: Geben Sie einen Grund für die Schließung und Ihr Passwort ein und klicken Sie auf löschen, was jedoch eher wie eine Deaktivierung ist, wie Sie sie es undelete kontaktieren
