notes_it: Inserisci un motivo per la chiusura e la password e fare clic su Elimina, tuttavia questo è più simile a una disattivazione, come si può contattarli per annullare l'eliminazione
notes_pt-BR: Entre com um motivo para o fechamento e sua senha e clique em excluir, no entanto, este é mais como uma desativação como você pode contatá-los para anular a eliminação
notes_ca: Introduir un motiu per al tancament i la contrasenya i feu clic a Suprimeix, però, això s'assembla més a una desactivació com es pot contactar amb ells per restituir-lo de
notes_es: Introducir un motivo para el cierre y su contraseña y haga clic en Eliminar, sin embargo, esto se parece más a una desactivación como se puede contactar con ellos para deshacer el borrado

name: Gorila
notes: Login, go to your account configuration and click delete account
notes_pt-BR: Faça o login, vá para as configurações da sua conta e clique em excluir conta

name: GoSquared
notes: Select a reason for closing and it'll take 2 clicks.
notes_tr: Kapatmak için bir neden seçin ve sadece 2 tıklama sürecek.
notes_de: Wähle einen Grund für die Löschung. Es braucht nur 2 clicks.
notes_fr: Choisissez la raison de la suppression et cela se fait en 2 cliques.
notes_it: Logga il tuo account, quindi clicca su 'My Profile'. Vedrai un link 'Close my account'. Cliccaci e segui le istruzioni.
notes_pt-BR: Selecione um motivo para fechar a conta e irá levar dois cliques.
notes_ca: Seleccioni un motiu per tancar el compte, només seran 2 clics
notes_es: Seleccione un motivo para cerrar la cuenta, sólo serán 2 clics

name: Gov.br
notes: According to help page, there's no way, nor necessity, to exclude account because it's the way to access public service.
notes_pt-BR: De acordo com a página de ajuda, não há jeito, nem necessidade, de se excluir a conta pois ela é a forma de ser acessar vários serviços públicos.

name: gPodder
notes: Go to account, select Delete Account at bottom of page, and click the red button labeled Delete Account.
notes_tr: Hesaba gidin, sayfanın altındaki "Hesabı Sil" öğesini seçin ve "Hesabı Sil" etiketli kırmızı düğmeyi tıklayın.

name: Grab
notes: Swipe left to right from the edge of screen, tap the profile picture, scroll down until you see delete account.
notes_tr: Ekranın kenarından soldan sağa kaydırın, profil resmine dokunun, hesabı sil tuşunu görene kadar aşağı kaydırın.

name: Gradcracker
notes: Visit the linked page, scroll to the bottom of the page, click "Delete my account" and confirm.

name: Graduate-Jobs.com
notes: Click your name on the top right, click "Settings", scroll down and then click "Delete Account". You will be prompted to enter your password.

name: Grailed
notes: Send an email to arun@grailed.com and request deletion.
notes_tr: Silmeyi talep etmek için e-posta gönderin.
notes_fr: Envoyez un e-mail à arun@grailed.com pour demander la suppression de votre compte.

name: Gravatar
notes: You can't delete your Gravatar Account without deleting your entire WordPress Account.
notes_tr: WordPress hesabınızın tamamını silmeden Gravatar hesabınızı silemezsiniz.
notes_fr: Gravatar appartient à WordPress, ce qui veut dire que vous ne pouvez pas supprimer votre compte.
notes_ca: No es pot esborrar el seu compte de Gravatar sense borrar tot el compte de WordPress.
notes_es: No puedes borrar tu cuenta de Gravatar sin borrar toda tu cuenta de WordPress.
notes_pl: Nie ma możliwości usunięcia konta Gravatar bez usunięcia całego konta WordPress.
notes_bg: Не можете да изтриете акаунта без да изтриете и WordPress акаунта си.

name: GreasyFork
notes: Use the link provided to request account deletion. An e-mail will be sent to confirm it and then you're done.

name: Grindr
notes: Submit an account deletion request via their web form, including all requested account details.
notes_tr: Web formları aracılığıyla, istenen tüm hesap ayrıntılarını içeren bir hesap silme isteği gönderin.

name: GroupMe
notes: Go to the GroupMe profile page, then click 'Delete GroupMe Account'. If you are the owner of any groups, you must transfer them to someone else first.
notes_tr: GroupMe profil sayfasına gidin, ve ardından "GroupMe Hesabını Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Eğer herhangi bir grubun sahibi iseniz, ilk önce onları başka birisine transfer etmeniz gerekir.

name: Groupon (USA)
notes: Select "Delete all my data" and verify your identity.

name: Groupon (Worldwide)
notes: Select "Delete all my data" and verify your identity.

name: GrubHub
notes: Privacy Policy Letter D: Account e-mail addresses cannot be deleted. However, an Account may be closed and GrubHub will cause the corresponding e-mail address to be scrambled.
notes_tr: Gizlilik Politikası Madde D: Hesap e-posta adresleri silinemez. Ancak, bir Hesap kapatılabilir ve GrubHub ilgili e-posta adresinin karıştırılmasına neden olur.
notes_fr: Aucune page n'explique comment supprimer votre compte. Vous devez contacter le support et ils le feront pour vous.
notes_it: Nessuna pagina spiega come eliminare l'account. Devi contattare il supporto direttamente (il link si trova in fondo alla pagina) e lo faranno al posto tuo.
notes_pt-BR: Não há uma página explicando como deletar sua conta. Você terá de contatar o suporte diretamente (link no final da página) e eles irão deletá-la para você.
notes_ca: No s'explica com eliminar el compte. Haurà de contactar directament amb el servei d'assistència (link al final de la pàgina) i ells li borraran el compte.
notes_es: No hay una explicación en como eliminar las cuentas. Deberás contactar directamente con el servicio de asistencia (enlance al final de la página) y ellos borrarán la cuenta.

name: GTmetrix
notes: Login to your account and click on 'Request Account Deletion' or follow the link, Answer questions and click on 'Continue', Confirm deletion via entering password and click 'Delete Account'.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın ve "Hesap Silmeyi Talep Et" tuşuna tıklayın ya da verilen bağlantıya girin, soruları cevapladıktan sonra "Devam Et" tuşuna tıklayın, şifrenizi yazıp "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna basarak onaylayın.

name: The Guardian
notes: Scroll to the bottom of the linked page, enter your password and confirm by clicking the "Delete your account" button. Deleting your account does not cancel subscriptions, see further information in the linked page.

name: Guild Wars
notes: You need to create a support ticket and request for them to delete your account. Before your account gets deleted you need to answer why you want the account to be deleted.
notes_tr: Bir destek talebi oluşturmanız ve onlardan hesabınızı silmelerini istemeniz gerekir. Hesabınız silinmeden önce, neden silinmesini istediğinizi yanıtlamanız gerekir.
notes_de: Über ein Support-Ticket kann eine Löschung des Accounts beantragt werden. Bevor der Account gelöscht wird, muss zuerst angegeben werden, warum der Account gelöscht werden soll.

name: Guilded
notes: In account settings under Overview select 'Edit account', then 'Delete account', confirm your password and choose a deletion reason.

name: Guildtag
notes: Navigate to your profile editor and click 'Delete Account'. If you want your posts deleted, you must remove them invidivially beforehand.

name: Gule Sider (Norwegian Yellow Pages)
notes: In order to change your information on Gule Sider you'll have to find your profile by searching it in the search box from the link above, and sign in using BankID. You will be able to edit your information. You can't fully remove yourself (remove your name), but you can remove your address and phone number. Some people don't have BankID, for example minors. If you are a minor without BankID, try asking your parents for help. If you're an adult/teen without BankID you're probably screwed. Their [help page](https://www.gulesider.no/hjelp/mine-opplysninger) about changing your details seems to be out of date.

name: Gumroad
notes: There is a link at the bottom of the Settings page to delete your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için "Ayarlar" sayfasının altında bir bağlantı vardır.

name: gutefrage
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Gyazo
notes: Scroll to the bottom of the webpage, and click the red "Delete Account" button
notes_tr: Sayfanın altına doğru kaydırın ve kırmızı "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın

name: Habbo
notes: Log in on the respective site and submit a request to delete your account.
notes_tr: İlgili sitede oturum açın ve hesabınızı silmek için bir istek gönderin.
notes_de: Melden Sie sich auf der jeweiligen Website an und reichen Sie eine Anfrage zum Löschen Ihres Kontos ein.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous sur le site correspondant et envoyez une demande pour supprimer votre compte.
notes_it: Accedi al rispettivo sito e invia una richiesta per eliminare il tuo account.
notes_nl: Log in op de betreffende site en dien een aanvraag in om uw account te verwijderen.

name: Habitica
notes: Log in to your account, click the User icon in the top-right corner, click Settings in the drop-down menu, and click the red Delete Account button at the bottom of the page.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, sağ üst köşedeki "Kullanıcı Simgesi" öğesine tıklayın, açılır menüden "Ayarlar" tuşuna tıklayın ve sayfanın altındaki kırmızı "Hesabı Sil" düğmesini tıklayın.

name: Hack The Box
notes: On the page, click 'Delete Account'.

name: Hack This Site
notes: On the page, click 'CONFIRM MY ACCOUNT DELETION'.

name: Hackaday.io
notes: Login to your account, go to 'Edit my Account', then 'Delete your account'. You will then be prompted to enter your password. Then click delete.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, "Hesabımı Düzenle" kısmına girin. "Hesabınızı Silin" tuşuna tıklayın. Şifrenizi girdikten sonra "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Hacker News
notes: You can remove your account's data, including your email, but removal of your posts should be negotiated with the staff, as it may harm the project.

name: Hacker One
notes: Deleting your account requires you to first create an account on their support platform, you can then request account deletion by creating a ticket.

name: Hackerrank
notes: According to the site you must go to the profile settings url and there will be a button called 'delete account' which will delete the account if it is wished to.
notes_tr: Siteye göre profil ayarları bağlantısına gitmelisiniz ve hesabı silmeye yarayan "Hesabı Sil" adlı bir düğme olacaktır.

name: Happy Scribe
notes: Go to "Settings ⮕ Delete Account ⮕ Delete my account".
notes_tr: "Ayarlar" "Hesabı Sil" "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna basın.
notes_pt-BR: Vá para "Settings ⮕ Delete Account ⮕ Delete my account".

name: Hark Audio
email_body: Please delete my Hark Audio account which is registered under this email address.
notes: Email hello@harkaudio.com and ask to have your account deleted

name: Harney & Sons Fine Teas
notes: Contact them through email or phone and ask for account to be deleted

name: HBO Max
notes: It is also possible to file an account deletion request in the iOS app (account settings ⮕ subscription)

name: hCaptcha
notes: You must send an email to delete your account.
email_body: Please delete my hCaptcha account which is registered under this email address.

name: Headliner
notes: You have to send an email to support@headliner.app
notes_tr: E-posta göndermelisiniz.
notes_fr: Vous devez envoyer un mail à support@headliner.app

name: HeadshotGenerator
notes: You have to send an email.
notes_fr: Vous devez envoyer un mail.

name: Headspace
notes: Click "Delete my account" and follow the instructions that appear.
notes_tr: "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın ve gelen talimatları takip edin.

name: HelloFax
notes: Click "Delete my account" and follow the instructions that appear.
notes_tr: "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın ve gelen talimatları takip edin.

name: HelloFresh
notes: Click "Chat" and request that the agent delete your account. Your e-mail must be provided.

name: HelloWallet
notes: Login, go to setting, click 'Cancel My Membership' and confirm.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, ayarlara girin ve "Üyeliğimi İptal Et" tuşuna tıklayın ve onaylayın.

name: HelpScout
notes: Login, go to Account and click on Cancel Account
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, "Hesap" yerine girin ve "Hesabı İptal Et" tuşuna tıklayın

name: Hemingway Editor
notes: Since there is no button, you must contact them through E-Mail. Thankfully, the wait time for their response is brief; however, this may differ from one to another.
notes_cs: Protože není k dispozici žádné tlačítko, musíte je kontaktovat prostřednictvím e-mailu. Čekací doba na jejich odpověď je naštěstí krátká, může se však u každého lišit.
notes_sk: Keďže tu nie je žiadne tlačidlo, musíte ich kontaktovať prostredníctvom e-mailu. Našťastie je doba čakania na ich odpoveď krátka, môže sa však líšiť od jednej osoby k druhej.

name: Hepsiburada
notes: You have to fill out a request form in order to get your account deleted.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı kapatmak için destek talebi oluşturmanız gerekiyor.

name: Heroes and Generals
notes: You need to fill the form and submit it. There is a 30 days period in which you can reverse your decision. After that your account will be deleted.
notes_it: Devi compilare il modulo e inviarlo. C'è un periodo di 30 giorni in cui puoi annullare la tua decisione. Successivamente il tuo account verrà eliminato.

name: Heroku
notes: “Close your account...” link at the bottom of the page.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altındaki "Hesabını Kapat" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_fr: Lien 'Fermez mon compte...' en bas de la page.
notes_it: “Close your account...” link in fondo alla pagina
notes_pt-BR: Link “Close your account...” no final da página.
notes_ca: Clica a l'enllaç “Close your account...” al final de la pàgina.
notes_es: Haz clic en el enlace "Close your account..." al final de la página.
notes_pl: Na dole strony kliknij 'Close your account', podaj hasło i zatwierdź przyciskiem.

name: HeroX
notes: Account deletion button can be found at the bottom of the profile edit page.

name: Hetzner
notes: Enter Hetzner account managment, find user deletion seciton and click Delete User Account.

name: Hi-Rez Studios
notes: Go to the link provided, make sure the email address is verified and on the Security Tab click "CLICK HERE TO REQUEST AN ACCOUNT DELETION OR MAKE AN ACCOUNT DATA REQUEST" and follow the steps on the screen.

name: hide.me
notes: Click "Account settings" and then the red button "Delete my account" at the bottom of the page.
notes_pt-BR: Clique em "Configurações da conta" e no botão vermelho "Remover minha conta" que está no fim da página.

name: HigherMe
notes: Select "Delete Account," confirm your email, then select "Yes, delete account." You have 30 days to recover the account.

name: HiNative
notes: Click "Settings", then "My Account", then "Delete my account", and finally click the red "Delete my account" button.

name: Histats
notes: Click the red 'Delete Account'.

name: HitBTC
notes: Contact the customer support using the contact form and request the deletion of your account. After receiving a response from support, confirm the deletion by replying to that email. Note: Your balance must be empty before doing this process.
notes_tr: İletişim formunu kullanarak müşteri desteği ile iletişime geçin ve hesabınızın silinmesini talep edin. Destek ekibinden bir yanıt aldıktan sonra, bu e-postayı yanıtlayarak silme işlemini onaylayın. Not: Bu işlemi yapmadan önce bakiyeniz boş olmalıdır.
notes_pt-BR: Entre em contato com o suporte ao cliente usando o formulário de contato e solicite a exclusão da sua conta. Após receber uma resposta do suporte, confirme a exclusão respondendo ao email. Note: Seu saldo deve estar vazio antes de fazer este processo.

name: HitFilm
notes: Must email them in order to get personal data deleted.

name: Hive Social
notes: Email their support with username and associated Email address to delete your account.

name: HOL Virtual Hogwarts
notes: You can remove information and manually quit HOL, but your account stays forever.
notes_tr: Bilgileri kaldırabilir ve HOL'den manuel olarak çıkabilirsiniz, ancak hesabınız sonsuza kadar kalır.
notes_fr: Vous pouvez enlever vos infos perso. mais votre compte restera à vie.
notes_it: Puoi rimuovere le tue informazioni e effettuare il logout, ma il tuo account resterà li.
notes_pt-BR: Você pode remover as informações e manualmente sair do HOL, mas sua conta é permanente.
notes_ca: Pot esborrar la seva informaciò i manualment sortir d'HOL, però el seu compte es permanent.
notes_es: Puedes borrar tu información y manualmente salir de HOL, pero tu cuenta es permanente.
notes_de: Sie können Ihre daten manuell löschen und HOL schließen, aber Ihre Daten bleiben gespeichert

name: Holiday Pirates
notes: "Delete" button at the bottom of the page.

name: Holopin
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Honey
notes: Visit the linked and page, click "DeleteAccount" and confirm. For more details see this [help article](https://help.joinhoney.com/article/53-how-do-i-delete-my-honey-account).

name: Honeypot.io
notes: Go to the profile page, click the cog icon, click 'delete your account' and then 'yes delete'

name: Hooked (Deals)
notes: Hooked's privacy policy contains no provisions for deleting personal information once that information has been given, unless that information is inaccurate or the user is less than eighteen years of age. Falsely representing your age to get an account deleted is not recommended. The best that you can do is to forget your login credentials. If you re-used your account password elsewhere, be sure to change your password on those sites. (Changing your Hooked account password is also impossible.)

name: Hoop
notes: Navigate to 'Account' ⮕ 'gear icon' ⮕ 'delete account' ⮕ 'delete'. This will remove some of your account data, but not all. There is no way to remove all data, despite their privacy policy claiming it is.

name: Hostelsclub
notes: You can remove every information from your account or if you signed up using a social network disconnect it.
notes_tr: Her bilgiyi hesabınızdan kaldırabilir veya bir sosyal ağ kullanarak kaydolduysanız bağlantısını kesebilirsiniz.
notes_de: Du kannst persönliche Daten Löschen. Wenn du Soziale Netzwerke zum Anmelden benutzt hast kannst du die Verbindung zu diesen trennen.

name: Hostinger
notes: Click on 'Delete account' at the bottom of the page, click on continue and then confirm you'd like to delete your account.

name: Hot or Not
notes: Sign in to your account, go to the 'Account' options in your settings and delete your profile. See also ['Can I deactivate or delete my Profile?'](https://hotornot.com/privacy/)
notes_tr: Hesabınızda oturum açın, ayarlarınızdaki "Hesap" seçeneklerine ve "Profilinizi silin" seçeneğine gidin. Ayrıca aşağıdaki makaleye bakın.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous, allez dans les paramatres du compte et supprimez votre profil. Voyez aussi l'article [« Can I deactivate or delete my Profile? »](https://hotornot.com/privacy/)

name: Hotspot Shield
notes: If you're a paid user, you can contact support. If you're a free user, it's only possible if you have regulations that require deletion.

name: Hotstar
notes: Select account related, then delete my account and write your issue.

name: Houzz
notes: Your Houzz ⮕ Edit Profile and Settings ⮕ Advanced Settings ⮕ Deactivate Houzz Account (at the bottom of the page)

name: Hover
notes: First Cancel your service with Hover.com. Then proceeed to contact Customer support to submit a request for account deletion.

name: HowLongToBeat
notes: Go to 'My Account' ⮕ 'Options', click 'Delete Profile & Data' and confirm.

name: HoYoverse
notes: Log in to your HoYoverse account, navigate to the 'Requesting Account Deletion' button at the bottom of the page, then follow the steps given. Afterwards, your account will be permanently deleted after 30 days.

name: HP
notes: Select language ⮕ Fill submission ⮕ Submit
notes_tr: Dil seçin ⮕ Gönderimi doldurun ⮕ Gönderin

name: HRK Game
notes: Delete Account ⮕ proceed ⮕ confirm ⮕ enter password and click ok.

name: HUAWEI ID
notes: On mobile, go to Settings ⮕ HUAWEI ID ⮕ Account Security ⮕ More ⮕ Security Center ⮕ Delete account. On the desktop, id.cloud.huawei.com ⮕ Account Security ⮕ Security Center ⮕ Delete account.

name: Huggingface
notes: Log in to your account, visit your [account settings](https://huggingface.co/settings/account), scroll to the bottom and click "Delete my account", and confirm.

name: Human Benchmark
notes: Click "Confirm delete account".

name: Humata
notes: Go to your account settings, scroll down to the end and click the 'Delete account' button.
notes_es: Ve a los ajustes de tu cuenta, desplázate hasta el final y haz clic en el botón 'Delete account'.

name: Humble Bundle
notes: The easiest method is to submit a Data Subject Access Request at their [DSAR Privacy Portal](https://dsar.humblebundle.com/) to request account deletion. Alternatively, you can also [submit a support request](https://support.humblebundle.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for account deletion. In the linked page under "What can we help you with?" select "Humble Bundle Account" ⮕ "Delete Account", fill in your email, enter "Account deletion" as subject, add your honest reason for account deletion in the message, and submit. Someone from support should contact you and guide you further.

name: Hype
notes: First of all, you must meet the requirements written in the linked page. From the app, click on the profile icon, then go to settings, click on the button to close the account and follow the instructions.
notes_it: Innanzitutto, devi soddisfare i requisiti scritti nella pagina collegata. Dall'applicazione, clicca sull'icona del profilo, quindi vai sulle impostazioni, clicca sul pulsante per chiudere l'account e segui le istruzioni.

name: Hypixel Forums
notes: Complete the form on the linked page. They require some PII such as name, address, and a government-issued ID.

name: IBMid
notes: Contact your relevant help desk, and an email should be sent back with confirmation of deletion. You need to contact ibmidsupportuk@ibm.com, if you live in one if the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland or UK. Else you should contact ibmidsupport@ibm.com.

name: ICANN
notes: On the account settings, click 'delete my data'.

name: Icedrive
notes: Visit the linked page. Select the 'Privacy' tab, scroll down, click "Delete Account, Files, and Data" then confirm your password.

name: iFixit
notes: Visit the linked page and complete the form. In addition to a confirmation email, you may be required to submit further proof of identity.

name: IFTTT
notes: Visit the linked page and follow the instructions. For good measure you might want to disconnect [your services](https://ifttt.com/my_services).

name: iHeart
notes: You must use the mobile app to delete your account without contacting support.

name: IKEA

name: Incogni
notes: Must email Customer Support to delete account. No official help documentation exists for account deletion.
email_body:
Hello,

I am requesting the deletion of my Incogni account and information associated with this email. I would also like to withdraw the consent given in the Authorization Form.

I understand that by terminating my account I will lose any remaining time on my current subscription and I wish to proceed anyway.

Thanks.

name: Indeed
notes: You must login, go to your account settings and then click on the 'Close my account'.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, "Hesap Ayarları" yerine girin ve "Hesabımı Kapat" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: IndieGala
notes: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, make the request through the same email address that you have used to create your IndieGala account.
notes_tr: Müşteri desteği ile e-posta yoluyla iletişime geçin ve hesabınızın silinmesini isteyin. Hesabınızı tanımlamaları için, IndieGala hesabınızı oluştururken kullandığınız e-posta adresiyle istekte bulunun.
notes_pt-BR: Entre em contato com o suporte via e-mail e solicite que sua conta seja excluída. Para que eles possam identificar sua conta, faça a requisição a partir da mesma conta de e-mail que você usou para criar sua conta IndieGala.
email_body: I have no further interest in using the services provided by IndieGala, so I would like my account to be permanently deleted.

notes_tr: "Ayarlarım" kısmına girin ve aşağı doğru kaydırın, ardından "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Infinite Story
notes: Click "Delete Infinite Story Account" at the bottom of the page.

name: Infinity Free
notes: Visit the URL. Click on 'Edit Profile'. Scroll down to 'Delete Profile' section, enter current password then click 'Delete Profile'. Note that it can take up to 30 days for all data to be fully removed.

name: InfoCasas
notes: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, make the request through the same email address that you have used to create your account.
notes_tr: Müşteri desteği ile e-posta yoluyla iletişime geçin ve hesabınızın silinmesini isteyin. Hesabınızı tanımlamaları için, hesabınızı oluştururken kullandığınız e-posta adresiyle istekte bulunun.

name: Ingress
notes: You need to fill in the form linked in the support article by clicking "contact us". Fill in your email address, agent name, device you play on and submit the form.

notes_de: Gehe zu 'Zurücksetzen oder Abbrechen' in den Einstellungen und wähle 'Konto auflösen'.

name: insights
notes: Delete all of your teams, click on Delete Account and type 'DELETE'
notes_it: Elimina tutti i tuoi team, clicca su Delete Account e scrivi 'DELETE'

name: Instructables
notes: Click your profile icon in the top right, click settings, and click 'Delete' under 'Delete Your Account'. You will be prompted for your password again before deleting.

name: Intel
notes: Navigate to your profile settings, click the pencil icon on the top right corner and then "Request personal data deletion". The account will be immediately deleted and you'll get a e-mai confirming the action.

name: Intelius People Finder
notes: While Intellius will not delete your account login, you can request to have your records removed. Send an email to Intelius support to request deletion. A support representative will eventually respond with instructions on how to delete your account. Follow these directions CAREFULLY, as they describe a process that is VERY similar to a Public Records Opt Out, which does not necessarily involve data deletion. Note: The request process may include selecting your public records from a list. If your records do not appear, scroll to the bottom of the list and click the link to "continue with your CCPA request". Click the link in the resulting email confirmation. Within 24 hours, your records should no longer appear on Intelius, barring extenuating circumstances. To permanently close your account, the best option is to change and forget your login credentials.

name: Intelligence X
notes: Click "Delete Account" button and check the "I want to permanently delete my Intelligence X account." box

name: Interactive Brokers
notes: In order to delete your account, you have to fill out the PDF linked and send it to the email linked below.

name: Intercity
notes: After signing in go to "My data", scroll down, click "To remove account click here", and provide password. If you bought any ticket on this account, it will be deleted 15 months after the last purchase (account will be locked, and you won't have any option to buy tickets), otherwise it will be deleted immediately.

name: Internet Archive / Open Library
notes: Click on your screen name in the top right-hand corner. Click on Account setting, enter your password to unlock modifying settings, click “Delete Account”. Your library pages will remain unless you remove them manually before deleting your account. Alternatively, you can send them an [email](mailto:info@archive.org) to remove pages from their side.

name: Internetometer
notes: Site provides no user account management interface or account deletion options. Email sent to internets@technoized.com was never replied to.
notes_tr: Site, kullanıcı hesabı yönetimi arayüzü veya hesap silme seçenekleri sağlamıyor. Gönderilen e-posta hiçbir zaman yanıtlanmadı.
notes_fr: Le site n'offre pas d'option de suppresion des comptes. Un e-mail envoyé à internets@technoized.com n'a jamais réçu une réponse.

name: Interrail
notes: Send an email to the email linked below and ask to delete your Interrail account. You will get an automatic reply as a confirmation that they're processing your request to remove your personal data. If there are legal grounds preventing them from (immediately) processing your request they will send you an email.
notes_nl: Stuur een e-mail naar het e-mailadres dat hieronder is vermeld en vraag om je Interrail-account te verwijderen. Je krijgt een automatisch antwoord als bevestiging dat ze je verzoek om je persoonlijke gegevens te verwijderen in behandeling hebben genomen. Als er wettelijke redenen zijn om je verzoek niet (meteen) te kunnen verwerken, sturen ze je een e-mail.
email_body: Please delete my Interrail account.

name: Intigriti
notes: You must send an email requesting account deletion and confirm it in a second email.

notes_tr: "Profil Ayarları" seçeneğine girerseniz, hesabı "Devre dışı bırak" seçeneği vardır, ancak "Google Drive" verilerini silseniz bile her zaman yeniden etkinleştirmek için bir seçenek bulunuyor

notes: Follow the link, select reason for deleting, and click 'Delete Account'. Kahoots set to public won’t be deleted along with your account. If you’d like to delete them, you’ll need to do it manually.

name: Kakao
notes: Click the 'Settings' button on the KakaoTalk app, enter 'General Settings', 'Privacy', and 'Manage My Personal Info' in the drop-down menu, and click the 'Unregister Form KakaoTalk' menu to delete account. Note: If you don't use other Kakao linked services, you will immediately switch to delete your Kakao account. If you were using some services, delete all of them, and then click the provided link to delete your Kakao account.
notes_ko: 카카오톡 앱에서 '설정' 버튼을 탭합니다, 그리고 드롭다운에서 '전체설정', '개인/보안', '개인정보 관리' 순으로 메뉴를 진입한 후 '카카오톡 탈퇴' 메뉴를 탭하여 탈퇴합니다. 참고: 다른 카카오 연계 서비스를 사용하지 않을 경우 바로 카카오 계정 탈퇴로 전환됩니다. 만약 일부 서비스를 사용하고 있었다면 해당 서비스를 모두 탈퇴한 후, 제공된 링크를 클릭하여 카카오 계정을 탈퇴하여 주세요.

name: Kaleido (remove.bg, unscreen, designify)

name: Kaspersky

name: KBDfans

name: KBin

name: KDE Bugtracking System
notes: You'll have to send an e-mail to them
notes_es: Tendrás que enviar un correo a ellos

name: Keepa
notes: Login to your account. Click on 'Settings', then 'Account'. Click 'Yes, delete my account', enter your password and click 'Delete account'.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, "Ayarlar" kısmına girin. "Hesap" menüsünden "Evet, hesabımı sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Şifrenizi girdikten sonra "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Keeper
notes: You may deactivate your Keeper Security account and delete your personally identifiable information at any time by contacting their support at support@keepersecurity.com clearly indicating that you wish to delete your account.

name: Kendall County History
notes: You can also use the google form in contact us page and ask them to remove your profile.

name: Keybase.io
notes: Account is deleted instantly, though username might be kept to keep service functioning properly and avoiding impersonation.
notes_tr: Hesap anında silinir, ancak kullanıcı adı hizmetin düzgün çalışmasını sağlamak ve kimliğe bürünmekten kaçınmak için saklanabilir.

name: Kick Streaming
notes: To permanently deactivate your account, you need to send an email to Kick support.

name: Kijiji
notes: Must contact customer service using the online form. Once completed, wait for e-mail from them. You will need you to reply to this e-mail confirming that the account you e-mailed from should be closed.

name: Kik
notes: To permanently deactivate your account, go to the link provided, enter your information and you will receive a link to permanently deactivate your account.

name: Killstar
notes: Visit the url and choose from the drop down menu: 1) What can we help you with? (Choose 'Something else'), 2) How can we help? (Choose 'Website error'), 3) Choose your region (Choose which region), 4) Fill out your name, 5) Fill out your email address and confirm it, 6) What should our team know so they can help? ('Please delete my account and all associated information'), 6) Submit. Then you will receive an email and have to confirm the following information: 1) Name on the account, 2) Shipping address on the account, 3) Email address on the account, 4) Phone number on the account, 5) Which store? US, UK, or EU. Then, you will be emailed again stating that in 15 days the data will be removed from their system.

name: Kinguin
notes: Have to contact them, they first will try to convince you not to delete your account, but if you keep trying, they can delete your account
notes_es: Tienes que ponerte en contacto con ellos, al principio intentarán convencerte de que no borres tu cuenta, pero si continuas intentándolo, pueden borrártela.

name: Kinja
notes: Fill out the form using the email address of your account and click on the verification link that is sent.

notes_pt-BR: Clique na roda dentada no canto superior esquerdo ⮕ Em Segurança da Conta ⮕ "Deletar minha conta" no rodapé ⮕ Selecione o motivo e clique no botão "Excluir Minha Conta". notes_fr: Sur votre espace client, cliquez sur l’icône "Mon profil" en haut à droite puis tout en bas sur "Suppression de votre Identité Numérique". Vous devrez entrer les 4 derniers chiffres de la carte d'identité utilisée lors de l'inscription.

name: La Poste
notes: Send a request on the GDPR form. Delete all other services linked to it (Digiposte, Identité Numérique, etc) before sending the request.
notes_fr: Envoyez une demande sur le formulaire RGPD. Supprimez les autres services associés (Digiposte, Identité Numérique, etc) avant d'envoyer la demande.

name: Lampyre
notes: Go to Account settings and click Delete account.

name: Langfuse
notes: Contact them via e-mail and ask for your account to be deleted.

name: LanguageTool
notes: At the bottom of the linked page, click 'Delete my account'.

name: LaptopKeyReplacements
notes: Account deletion request hasn't been fulfilled several months after contacting support.

name: Last.fm
notes: Scroll to the bottom of the page and click delete user account. On the following page, enter your password. Your account will then be deleted after 14 days.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altına gidin ve "Kullanıcı Hesabını Sil" seçeneğini tıklayın. Sonraki sayfada şifrenizi girin. Hesabınız daha sonra 14 gün sonra silinecektir.

name: Lazada
notes: No way to delete your account on this website, even if you ask on their customer support, they only give you instructions on how to uninstall the application.
notes_id: Kamu tidak bisa menghapus sama sekali akunmu, bahkan jika bertanya kepada CS, mereka hanyak akan mengarahkan untuk menguninstall aplikasi.

name: LBRY / Odysee
notes: Only way to delete your account is sending them an e-mail.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmenin tek yolu onlara bir e-posta göndermektir.
email_body: I have an account on XXX@XXX.XXX and i want that account to be deleted because of XXXXXX.

name: League of Legends
notes: Go to the linked page, scroll down, click on "LOG IN" and confirm your deletion.

name: League of Legends: Wild Rift
notes: Go to the linked page, scroll down, click on "LOG IN" and confirm your deletion.

name: Legends of Runeterra
notes: Go to the linked page, scroll down, click on "LOG IN" and confirm your deletion.

name: Lenovo ID
notes: Click Yes at the bottom when asked if you want to delete your Lenovo account.

name: Lenstore
notes: Have to contact them, using the contact us form. They require date of birth and phone number linked to account.

name: Letgo
notes: To delete your account you have to go to "I have a question about my account"⮕"Delete" and write your request. You will get a return later on.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için formda "Hesabım hakkında sorum var"⮕"Sil" ve dilekçenizi yazmanız gerekiyor. Biraz zaman geçtikten sonra cevap alacaksınız.
notes_es: Para eliminar tu cuenta tienes que ir a "Tengo una pregunta sobre mi cuenta" ⮕ "Eliminar" y escribir tu solicitud. Más adelante recibirás una respuesta.

name: Letudiant
notes: Click 'Paramètres du compte', scroll drown and click the little link in black 'Supprimer définitivement mon compt' then validate and confirm the link sent to you by mail
notes_fr: Cliquez sur votre avatar, puis 'paramètres du comptes', allez tout en bas et cliquez sur le petit lien en noir 'Supprimer définitivement mon compte', confirmez puis cliquez sur le lien reçu par mail.

name: LG Account
notes: Log in, open the account administration tab, and press 'Delete Account'. Note that you might need to repeat going to the administration tab and pressing delete a couple times depending on the services you've got connected to LG Account. Once there's no more to delete, you should be logged out automatically (for good measure, verify you cannot login again).

name: Liberland
notes: You can only disable the account, but never delete it.
notes_tr: Hesabı yalnızca devre dışı bırakabilirsiniz, ancak asla silemezsiniz.

name: Liberty Lines
notes: Go to the customer area and delete your account. Your tickets will be anonymized.
notes_it: Vai all'area clienti ed elimina il tuo account. I tuoi biglietti saranno resi anonimi.

name: Libre.fm
notes: Click 'Profile', then 'Edit', then 'Show advanced settings', and finally check the 'Delete my account' checkbox.
notes_tr: "Profil", ardından "Düzenle", ardından "Gelişmiş Ayarları Göster" öğesini tıklayın ve son olarak "Hesabımı Sil" onay kutusunu işaretleyin.
notes_fr: Cliquez sur « Profile », puis « Edit », puis « Show advanced settings », et enfin cochez la case « Delete my account ».
notes_it: Clicca 'Profile', quindi 'Edit', quindi 'Show advanced settings', e per ultimo fai un tick su 'Delete my account'
notes_pt-BR: Clique em 'Profile', então 'Edit', então 'Show advanced settings', e finalmente marque a caixa 'Delete my account'.
notes_ca: Cliqui a 'Profile', després 'Edit', 'Show advanced settings', i finalment marqui 'Delete my account'.
notes_es: Haz clic en 'Profile', después 'Edit', 'Show advanced settings', y finalmente marca 'Delete my account'.

name: Lieferando
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Life360
notes: Go into Settings, Tap Account, Tap Delete Account, Select Delete My Account

name: Lifehacker
notes: Fill out the form using the email address of your account and click on the verification link that is sent.

name: Lifesum
notes: On you account page, go to the 'Close Account & Delete Data' tab.

name: Lil'bots
notes: You must contact support and request the account deletion per the privacy policy.

name: Lime
notes: You must contact support via your Lime's contact form to request deletion.
notes_tr: Silme talebinde bulunmak için Lime iletişim formu aracılığıyla destek ile iletişime geçmelisiniz.

name: Lingualeo
notes: Go to the linked page, scroll to the bottom and click "Delete account". You'll have to confirm the deletion by clicking the link from the confirmation email.
notes_ru: Перейдите на указанную страницу, пролистайте в самый низ и нажмите "Удалить аккаунт". Вам придётся подтвердить удаление, перейдя по ссылки из письма подтверждения.

name: Lingvano
notes: Make sure you canceled your subscription! You can delete your account via the web or mobile app.

name: Lingvist
notes: You can delete your account via the web or mobile app.

name: LinkedIn
notes: There are reports that LinkedIn continues to email people with a closed account. You may need to contact customer services to delete account instead of just closing it.
notes_tr: LinkedIn'in kapalı hesabı olan kişilere e-posta göndermeye devam ettiğine dair raporlar var. Hesabı kapatmak yerine silmek için müşteri hizmetlerine başvurmanız gerekebilir.
notes_fr: Il y a des rapports que LinkedIn continue d'envoyer des e-mails aux gens qui ferment leur compte. Il est bien possible qu'il faudra contactez le support du site pour demander la suppresion de votre compte.
notes_ca: Alguns informes indiquen que LinkedIn segueix enviant missatges a les persones que ja han tancat el compte. Pot ser necessari posar-se en contacte amb el servei de suport per esborrar el compte en lloc de tancar-lo.
notes_es: Hay informes que dicen que LinkedIn sigue enviando correo electrónico a las personas con cuentas cerradas. Podría ser necesario ponerte en contacto con el servicio al cliente para eliminar la cuenta en lugar de cerrarla.
notes_cs: Existují zprávy o tom, že LinkedIn pokračuje v posílání emailů i lidem se smazaným účtem. Možná budete potřebovat kontaktovat podpoře, aby vám účet smazali místo jeho uzavření.
notes_ru: Есть сообщения, которые LinkedIn продолжают присылать по электронной почте людям с закрытой учетной записью. Возможно, вам придется связаться с службой поддержки для удаления учетной записи вместо закрытия.

name: Linktree
notes: Go to your account details, scroll down to the 'Danger Zone' and click 'Delete Account'.

name: Linkvertise
notes: You must specify in the email whether you want to delete a premium or a publisher account.

name: Linode
notes: At the bottom of the linked page select 'Close Account' and confirm your username.

name: Linsensuppe
notes: One cannot even change the password
notes_tr: Şifre bile değiştirilemez

name: Linus Tech Tips Store
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Litmus
notes: They offer a "simple deletion" where your account will be dissociated with your email address, and a ["full data deletion"](https://trust.litmus.com/?itemUid=af8eb7bc-d4b7-4e13-a4b7-6f05e2744c22) for complete data deletion.

name: Live Nation
notes: Select "Delete My Information" and enter the email address used on your account.

name: LiveJournal
notes: Once you delete your journal you have 30 days to undelete it, in case you change your mind. After 30 days, the journal will be permanently deleted and there will be no way to recover it.
notes_tr: Günlüğünüzü sildikten sonra, fikrinizi değiştirirseniz diye geri almak için 30 gününüz vardır. 30 gün sonra, günlük kalıcı olarak silinecek ve onu kurtarmanın hiçbir yolu olmayacaktır.
notes_fr: Quand vous supprimez votre Journal vous avez 30 jours pour le restaurer, au cas où vous changez votre avis. Après les 30 jours, le Journal est supprimé définitivement.
notes_it: Una volta eliminato il tuo Journal hai 30 giorni per recuperarlo, nel caso cambiassi idea. Dopo 30 giorni, il tuo Journal sarà permanentemente cancellato e non ci sarà modo di recuperarlo.
notes_pt-BR: Uma vez que você tenha deletado seu jornal você tem 30 dias para desfazer a remoção, caso você mude de ideia. Após 30 dias, o seu jornal permanecerá deletado e não haverá como recuperá-lo.
notes_ca: Una vegada que hagi eliminat el seu Journal, tindrà 30 dies per tirar enderrera la decisiò. Després de 30 dies el seu contingut serà borrat permanentment i no es podrà recuperar.
notes_es: Cuando has eliminado tu Journal, tendrás 30 días para cancelar la decisión. Después de 30 días tu contenido será borrado permanentemente y no será posible de recuperarlo.

name: Lnk.Bio
notes: Log in and request deletion via the chat service using the button on the lower right corner.
notes_pt-BR: Inicie a sessão e solicite deleção da conta através do serviço de bate-papo, disponível através do botão no canto inferior direito.

name: LOBSTR
notes: Visit the linked page and click 'Delete LOBSTR account' under the 'Profile' tab. You will be sent an email with a link to delete your account.

name: Login.gov
notes: Sometimes the login page won't redirect properly, click the "Delete Account" link on the side if this happens.

name: Logitech
notes: Open a ticket on their customer service requesting the deletion of the account and provide a country, reason and your name

name: LogMeIn / Hamachi
notes: Submit a request on the linked form. It can take up to 15 days for them to comply.

name: Logo Maker
notes: According to their privacy policy, you need to directly contact them.

name: LogRocket
notes: According to their security documentation, contact customer support via email and request the deletion of your account.

name: Lolja
notes: Contact the customer support via email and request the deletion of your account. In order for them to identify your account, make the request through the same email address that you have used to create your Lolja account.
notes_tr: Müşteri desteği ile e-posta yoluyla iletişime geçin ve hesabınızın silinmesini isteyin. Hesabınızı tanımlamaları için, Lolja hesabınızı oluştururken kullandığınız e-posta adresiyle istekte bulunun.
notes_pt-BR: Envie um e-mail para o suporte ao cliente e solicite que sua conta seja excluída. Para que eles possam identificar sua conta, faça a requisição a partir da mesma conta de e-mail que você usou para criar sua conta Lolja.

name: Lookout
notes: log into your account, in the middle right.
notes_tr: Sağ ortada, hesabınıza giriş yapın.

name: LoseIt
notes: Go to the Settings page of your account, then account information and click “Close account”.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın "Ayarlar" sayfasına gidin, ardından hesap bilgileri ve "Hesabı Kapat" öğesini tıklayın.

name: Love My Credit Union Rewards
notes: Scroll all the way down on the website and find a little button with a picture of an envelope to contact customer support to have your account deleted.

name: Lucidchart
notes: Click in the top right corner on your Username, then "Account settings" and at the tab "Close Account"
notes_tr: Sağ üst köşedeki kullanıcı adınıza tıklayın, "Hesap Ayarları" kısmından "Hesabı Kapat" sekmesine girin

name: Lucky Patcher Forum
notes: The website does not offer any options that allow the account to be deleted.
notes_tr: Bu web sitesi hesabınızın silinmesi için herhangi bir seçenek sunmuyor.
notes_pt-BR: O website não disponibiliza nenhuma opção que possibilite a exclusão da conta.

name: Ludum Dare
notes: You can't even change your username, email, or delete your posts.

name: LuminPDF
notes: Go to profile settings and under Account click 'Delete My Account' button

name: Luno
notes: Fill the form on the site to request data deletion. The support team will confirm the request by email.
notes_id: Isi form di situs tersebut untuk mangajukan penghapusan data. Tim bantuan akan mengonfirmasi ajuan melalui email.

name: Lush
notes: Conctact customer service and request account deletion

name: Lutris
notes: Log in to Lutris, then click on the linked page and scroll down to the 'Delete my account.' button.

name: Lyconet
notes: Send an email requesting account deletion.
notes_it: Invia un'email richiedendo l'eliminazione dell'account.

name: Lyft
notes: Log-in to your Lyft account on the website and request for deletion. Cannot be done via the app
notes_tr: Web sitesinde Lyft hesabınıza giriş yapın ve silme talebinde bulunun. Uygulama üzerinden yapılamaz.

name: M Réso / Appli M
notes: From your profile page, click on "Clôturer mon compte M"
notes_fr: Sur votre page de profil, cliquez sur "Clôturer mon compte M"

name: Macrumors
notes: There is no account deletion process offered. Remove your account's Personal Details (Location, About You, etc.), your forum signature, and any social media names in the Contact Details section and leave the account dormant.

name: MacTrade
notes: In your user account go to 'Delete Account' and confirm the deletion via the 'Delete account now' button.
notes_tr: Kullanıcı hesabınızda "Hesabı Sil" kısmına girin ve "Hesabınızı Şimdi Silin" tuşuna tıklayarak silmeyi onaylayın.
notes_de: Wähle 'Konto löschen' in deinem Benutzerkonto und bestätige die Löschung mit dem Button 'Benutzerkonto jetzt löschen'.

name: MacUpdate
notes: In your account preferences select 'Delete all my personal data' in the bottom left. 14 days after your request all your data will be deleted. During the 14 days the delete request may be cancelled.
notes_tr: Hesap tercihlerinizde sol alttaki "Tüm kişisel verilerimi sil" öğesini seçin. Talebinizden 14 gün sonra tüm verileriniz silinecektir. 14 gün boyunca silme talebi iptal edilebilir.
notes_de: In den Account-Einstellungen kann der Account links unten mit 'Delete all my personal data' gelöscht werden. Die Daten werden erst nach einer 14 tägigen Frist gelöscht. Während der 14 Tage kann der Löschvorgang abgebrochen werden.

name: Magasin
notes: Go to your profile, press 'Rediger' and then 'Slet profil'.

name: Magicflow
notes: On your account page, click in 'Delete Account' then confirm.
notes_pt-BR: Nas preferências do seu perfil, clique em 'Delete Account' e depois confirme.

name: MAGIX
notes: Since there is no button, you must contact them through E-Mail. Subsequently, after inclusion in their ticket system, they will resolve the matter soon; however, this may differ from one to another.
notes_cs: Protože není k dispozici žádné tlačítko, musíte je kontaktovat prostřednictvím e-mailu. Následně, po zařazení do jejich ticketového systému, záležitost brzy vyřeší, což se však může lišit od jedné osoby k druhé.
notes_sk: Keďže tu nie je žiadne tlačidlo, musíte ich kontaktovať prostredníctvom e-mailu. Následne, po zaradení do ich ticketového systému, záležitosť čoskoro vyriešia, čo sa však môže líšiť od jednej osoby k druhej.

name: Magoosh
notes: Send an email to help@magoosh.com with the subject line, 'Need to delete my account'. Might need to send another email for the deletion to finally go through.
notes_tr: Bir e-posta gönderin. Sonunda silme işleminin tamamlanması için başka bir e-posta daha göndermeniz gerekebilir.

name: Mail.ru
notes_ru: Войдите в аккаунт, который хотите удалить. Перейдите к форме удаления. Введите имя ящика и пароль. Укажите причину удаления, пароль и код с картинки. Нажмите кнопку "Удалить".
notes: Login into your account. Go to the deletion form. Enter the mailbox name and password. Specify the reason for the deletion, your account's password and the captcha code. Click the "Delete" button.

name: mailbox.org
notes: Account Settings ⮕ Delete Account.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" "Hesabı Sil".

name: MailChimp
notes: Account Settings ⮕ Account Settings Drop-down ⮕ Close my account ⮕ Type DELETE and press Delete Account button.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" "Hesap Ayarları" "Hesabımı Kapat" kısmına gidin. 'DELETE' yazın ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pl: Account Settings ⮕ Account Settings Drop-down ⮕ Close my account ⮕ Wpisz DELETE i kliknij Delete Account.
notes_fr: « Account Settings » ⮕ menu déroulant « Account Settings » ⮕ « Close my account » ⮕ Tapez « DELETE » et appuyez sur « Delete Account ».
notes_it: Account Settings ⮕ Account Settings Drop-down ⮕ Close my account ⮕ Digita DELETE e premi il pulsante Delete Account.
notes_pt-BR: Account Settings ⮕ Account Settings Drop-down ⮕ Close my account ⮕ Digite DELETE e pressione o botão Delete Account.
notes_ca: Account Settings ⮕ Account Settings Drop-down ⮕ Close my account ⮕ Marca DELETE i presioni el botó 'Delete Account'.
notes_es: Account Settings ⮕ Account Settings Drop-down ⮕ Close my account ⮕ Marca DELETE y presiona el botón 'Delete Account'.

name: Mailfence
notes: Go to 'Settings'⮕'General'⮕'Delete Account'.
notes_tr: "Ayarlar" "Genel" "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna basın.

name: Mailspring
notes: Sign in ⮕ Click the 'Delete your Mailspring ID' button ⮕ Confirm
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, "Mailspring Kimliğinizi Silin" "Onayla" tuşuna tıklayın
notes_de: Anmelden ⮕ Auf 'Löschen Sie alle Daten, die Ihrer Mailspring-ID zugeordnet sind' klicken ⮕ Bestätigen

name: Major League Hacking (MLH)
notes: Go to the linked page, scroll to the bottom, click "Cancel Account" and confirm.

name: MakeMyTrip
notes: App ⮕ Menu ⮕ Account ⮕ Settings ⮕ Delete.

name: Mangadex
notes: Sign in ⮕ Click the 'Delete' button ⮕ You will receive an email with a confirm button ⮕ Enter 'CONFIRM' in the text box.
notes_it: Accedi ⮕ Clicca sul pulsante 'Delete' ⮕ Riceverai un'email con un pulsante di conferma ⮕ Inserisci 'COFIRM' nella casella di testo.

name: Mangools
notes: On 'Delete account' section, click the red 'Understand, delete my account'

name: Mapbox
notes: Enter Password ⮕ Scroll to bottom ⮕ Click 'Delete Account'
notes_tr: Şifrenizi girin, alta kaydırın ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın
notes_de: Passwort eingeben ⮕ An das Ende der Seite scrollen ⮕ 'Delete Account' klicken

name: MapMyFitness
notes: This will also delete the profiles for MapMyRun, MapMyWalk, and/or MapMyFitness that are associated with the same email
notes_ru: Это также удалит профили для MapMyRun, MapMyWalk и / или MapMyFitness, связанные с одним и тем же адресом электронной почты.

name: MapMyRun
notes: This will also delete the profiles for MapMyRun, MapMyWalk, and/or MapMyFitness that are associated with the same email
notes_ru: Это также удалит профили для MapMyRun, MapMyWalk и / или MapMyFitness, связанные с одним и тем же адресом электронной почты.

name: MapMyWalk
notes: This will also delete the profiles for MapMyRun, MapMyWalk, and/or MapMyFitness that are associated with the same email
notes_ru: Это также удалит профили для MapMyRun, MapMyWalk и / или MapMyFitness, связанные с одним и тем же адресом электронной почты.

name: Mapstr
notes: Log in to your account in the app, then got to the "Profile" tab and open settings. After that, find the "Data Management" section and click "Delete my account".

name: Marktplaats
notes: Log in to Marktplaats. Go to the linked URL or in Marktplaats click on your name at the top right, choose 'Mijn Profiel' and go to your contact information. On this page, click 'Account verwijderen' at the bottom. Indicate why you want to delete your account and click 'Bevestigen'. Your account will be deleted and you will receive a confirmation email.
notes_nl: Log in op Marktplaats. Ga naar de gekoppelde URL of klik in Marktplaats rechtsboven op de naam, kies voor 'Mijn Profiel' en ga naar je contactgegevens. Op deze pagina klik je onderaan op 'Account verwijderen'. Geef aan waarom je je account wilt verwijderen en klik op 'Bevestigen'. Je account wordt verwijdert en je ontvangt een e-mail ter bevestiging.

name: Marq
notes: Account can be deleted from the account settings. If you have an active subscription, then this needs to be cancelled first.

name: Marvel
notes: Log into your account ⮕ My Account ⮕ click on Delete Account at the bottom of page.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, ve sayfanın altındaki "Hesabım" "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Mashable
notes: Contact customer support using the link here to fill out a request for account deletion

name: MasterClass
notes: It's not possible to delete your account, but you can send a request to delete your personal data by making a Privacy Request.

name: Mastodon.social
notes: Login ⮕ Account Settings ⮕ Security ⮕ Delete Account
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, "Hesap Ayarları" "Güvenlik" "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın

name: Match
notes: Only possible within the mobile app, otherwise can only be done via [contacting support](https://help.match.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

name: Mathpix
notes: Use the link to navigate to your account settings page. Log in with your email and password then click 'Delete your account'. You will be asked to confirm with your email and a simple captcha. Your email will be blacklisted from creating new accounts.
notes_de: Nutze den Link um zu deinen Kontoeinstellungen zu gelangen. Logge dich mit deiner E-Mail und deinem Passwort ein und klicke dann auf "Delete your account". Du wirst gebeten, dies mit deiner E-Mail und einem einfachen Captcha zu bestätigen. Deine E-Mail wird für die Erstellung neuer Konten gesperrt.

name: Mathway
notes: Use the link to navigate to your account settings page. Click account, type your password and click delete.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfanıza gitmek için bağlantıyı kullanın. "Hesap" seçeneğine tıklayın, şifrenizi yazın ve "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Mathworks
notes: Follow the link and use the form to request the deletion of your personal data. Subsequent identity verification may be required. The deletion process should complete within 30 days.

name: Maxdome
notes: Contact support via the live chat and request the deletion of your account. This is also possible via the [contact form](https://faq.maxdome.de/kontakt), though it could take longer.
notes_tr: Canlı sohbet yoluyla desteğe başvurun ve hesabınızın silinmesini isteyin. Bu, daha uzun sürebilmesine rağmen iletişim formu aracılığıyla da mümkündür.
notes_de: Kontaktiere den Support über den Live Chat und fordere die Löschung deines Kontos. Dies ist auch über das [Kontaktformular](https://faq.maxdome.de/kontakt) möglich, dauert aber ggf. länger.

name: MaxMind
notes: You must stop all services and cease downloading any databases before contacting support. State that you wish to delete your account and use your registered email on the contact form.

name: McAfee
notes: You must call McAfee customer support and unsubscribe, which cancels your account. Be sure to have your state ID or driver's license available, as you will be asked questions to verify your identity.

name: McVIP
notes: Click on 'Edit profile', scroll down to 'You want to delete your profile?', type in your password, click on 'Delete' and then 'Yes, delete it'.
notes_tr: "Profili Düzenle" tuşuna tıklayın, "Profilinizi silmek istiyor musunuz?" kısmına doğru aşağı kaydırın, şifrenizi yazın, "Sil" tuşuna tıklayıp ardından "Evet, sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_de: Klick auf 'Profil bearbeiten, hinunter zu 'Du willst dein Profil löschen?' scrollen, Passwort eintippen, dann auf 'Löschen' und 'Ja, Profil löschen' klicken.

name: Mealpal
notes: You can only delete your account by emailing them.

name: Medal
notes: Scroll down to the bottom of the linked page and click on 'Delete Account'.

name: MediaFire
notes: Scroll to the bottom of the page and click 'Delete my Account', make sure you're logged in and follow the steps.
notes_es: Abajo del todo encontrarás un botón que dice 'Delete my Account', asegúrate de tener una sesión iniciada primero y sigue los pasos.

name: Mediapart
email_body: Please delete all information and data associated with my account. My username is XXXXXX.
notes: No information is clearly provided how to delete account. You have to send an email to explicitly ask for deletion of every information related to your account otherwise they will only disable it.
notes_tr: Hesabın nasıl silineceği açıkça belirtilmemiştir. Hesabınızla ilgili her bilginin silinmesini açıkça istemek için bir e-posta göndermelisiniz, aksi takdirde yalnızca devre dışı bırakırlar.

name: MeetFrank
notes: Send the team/company/email of the account you want to delete. No verification (not even from the same sender e-mail) required.
notes_tr: Silmek istediğiniz hesabın ekibini/şirketi/e-postasını gönderin. Hesabı oluştururken kullandığınız aynı e-posta adresinden gönderip doğrulamanız bile gerekmiyor.

name: Meetup
notes: Meetup accounts can only be deactivated, not deleted. To deactivate your account visit the linked page and follow the appropriate instructions for the method you used to sign up.

name: MEGA
notes: In the bottom right corner of the linked page, click 'Delete account'. Click the confirmation link sent to your email, then select a reason why you want to leave MEGA.

name: Megaknihy
notes: You must call their phone (as of writing +420 222 703 143) and request deletion. They ignored my e-mail.
notes_cs: Musíte zavolat na jejich číslo (v době psaní +420 222 703 143) а požádat o vymazání. Ignorovali můj e-mail.

name: Melodics
notes: It might be possible to delete your account via the contact form, but the support team is known to be unresponsive.
notes_tr: İletişim formu aracılığıyla hesabınızı silmeniz mümkün olabilir, ancak destek ekibinin yanıt vermediği biliniyor.

name: Memrise
notes: A 'Delete my account' button is available from your account settings page.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfasının altında "Hesabımı Sil" tuşu bulunuyor.

name: Mendeley
notes: Get to Mendeley and request for account to be closed at the privacy settings. Then contact Elsevier support asking for a deletion there too.
notes_tr: Mendeley'e gidin ve "Gizlilik Ayarları" adresinden hesabın kapatılmasını talep edin. Ardından, oradan da silinmesini istemek için Elsevier desteğiyle iletişime geçin.

name: Mercado Libre Argentina
notes:
To cancel/delete your account, access the account deletion link specified above and log in to your account. In the options, select a reason why you want to cancel your account, click in the checkbox "Estoy de acuerdo", and confirm your action by clinking "Aceptar".

Warning: You may cancel your account only if there is no limitation, partial and/or total blockage applied to it. You will also be unable to cancel your account if you have outstanding payments and/or purchases. Mercado Libre and Mercado Pago are services associated with the same type of account. If you choose to delete your Mercado Libre account, your Mercado Pago account will be deleted too.
notes_pt-BR:
Para cancelar/excluir sua conta, acesse o link de exclusão especificado acima e faça login em sua conta. Nos opções de exclusão, selecione um motivo pelo qual você quer cancelar sua conta, marque a opção "Estoy de acuerdo" e clique em "Aceptar".

Aviso: Você poderá cancelar sua conta apenas se não houver nenhuma limitação, bloqueio parcial e/ou total aplicado aplicado à ela. Você também não poderá cancelar sua conta caso você tenha pagamentos e/ou compras pendentes. O Mercado Libre e o Mercado Pago são serviços associados ao mesmo tipo de conta, se você optar por excluir sua conta do Mercado Libre, sua conta do Mercado Pago também será excluída.

name: Mes Services Étudiant
notes: You can request the deletion of your account via the assistance form.
notes_fr: Vous pouvez faire une demande de suppression de votre compte via le formulaire d'assistance.

name: MetalPay
notes: Contact customer support to delete your account.

name: Metropolis
notes: Account Settings ⮕ Terms and Privacy ⮕ Delete Account

name: Mibbit
notes: Sign in and use the 'Account' link at the top right. At the bottom of the page is a link to delete your account.

name: Milanote
notes: Enter your email, click on "Yes, delete my account", then enter your password and click on "Continue".

name: Mimo
notes: Click on 'Delete my account' then 'Delete Account' to delete your account.

name: MindMeister
notes: You have to cancel your plan first

name: Mine
notes: Click 'Delete your Mine Account' at the bottom of the page, acknowledge that you wish to proceed and click 'Delete my Account'

name: Minecraft
notes: On the linked page, chose the dropdown boxes that apply. Preferably use the email address that the account is associated with. You will be required to supply the transaction ID for the purchase of the account, or any other valid proof-of-purchase. If you have migrated to a Microsoft account, visit [this page](https://support.xbox.com/contact-us), sign in, and start a session with the virtual agent. Specify that your minecraft profile is linked to your microsoft account, and that you wish for it to be deleted. Alternatively, if you do not use your Microsoft account for anything else, you can [close your account](https://account.live.com/closeaccount.aspx) entirely.

name: Minecraft Tools
notes: The only way to contact them is by email, but no one responds.
notes_it: L'unico modo per contattarli è tramite email, ma nessuno risponde.

name: Minehut
notes: The only way to contact them is at the linked form or through [here](https://support.minehut.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

name: Miniclip
notes: Log in, click on "Delete Account" tab and then click "Delete Account".

name: MinID
notes: You need to "block" your MinID first by sending [a form](https://eid.difi.no/sites/eid/files/2021-03/sperring_av_minid_en_v_1.3.pdf). You'll need to submit [another form](https://eid.difi.no/sites/eid/files/2021-03/sletting_fra_kontaktregister_en_v_1.2.pdf) if you want your information to be deleted from the contact registry.

name: Mint
notes: Go to 'Settings', then 'Sign In & Security', then scroll down to 'Delete your Mint account'. Enter your email and password again and click 'Delete'.
notes_tr: "Ayarlar" sayfasına girin ve ardından "Giriş & Güvenlik" kısmına girin. Aşağı kaydırın ve "Mint hesabınızı silin" tuşuna tıklayın. E-posta adresinizi ve şifrenizi girin, ardından "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: mintos.com
notes: Before requesting account deletion, make sure you wait for the remaining payments to come through, and withdraw all available funds. The account balance must be 0. Then you can either use a [request form](https://help.mintos.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=1900000292453) or send an email to support directly.
email_subject: Request to delete my account from Mintos
email_body: I have an account in your database associated with the email address XXXXXX (investor id: XXXXXX). I have decided not to use the account again; therefore, I request that you kindly delete my account from your database and delete all the associated data.

name: Miro
notes: Click "Delete my profile" in the profile settings page. An e-mail with a verification code is sent to you, with which you can deactivate the account.

name: MisterWong
notes: You need to send an email to support and it may take up to 48 hours to process your request.
notes_tr: Destek ekibine bir e-posta göndermeniz gerekiyor ve talebinizin işlenmesi 48 saat kadar sürebilir.
notes_de: Sie müssen eine E-Mail an den Support senden. Es kann bis zu 48 Stunden brauchen Ihre Anfrage zu bearbeiten.

name: MixCloud
notes: Click on "Just delete my account".
notes_tr: "Sadece hesabımı sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pt-BR: Clique em "Just delete my account".

name: Mixlr
notes: Login to your account, go to account section of the settings page and choose the "delete account" option.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, "Ayarlar" sayfasının "Hesap" kısmına girin ve "Hesabı Sil" seçeneğine tıklayın.

name: Mobalytics
notes: Scroll to the bottom and click "Delete my account".

name: Mobify
notes: You have to send a message in order to remove your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı kaldırmak için bir mesaj göndermelisiniz.

name: Mobills
notes: Just click the delete button. Note that if you have made an account via Google or Facebook, you'll have to change the password first.
notes_tr: "Sil" düğmesini tıklamanız yeterlidir. Google veya Facebook aracılığıyla bir hesap açtıysanız, önce şifreyi değiştirmeniz gerekeceğini unutmayın.
notes_es: Solo haz clic en el boton de borrar cuenta. Si creaste tu cuenta con Google o Facebook, primero debes cambiar tu contraseña.

name: Mockflow
notes: Login to your account ⮕ Open the menu and choose My Account ⮕ In the Profile Details tab click on 'Delete Account' & confirm deletion by entering your password.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, menüyü açın ve "Hesabım" "Profil Detayları" "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın ve ardından şifrenizi girerek hesabınızın silinmesini onaylayın.

name: Modrinth
notes: Go to the profile icon in the top right corner and select "Settings", then "Account", click "Delete account" at the bottom of the page, type your username and confirm. Your projects will not be deleted.
notes_it: Vai sull'icona del profilo nell'angolo in alto a destra e seleziona "Settings", quindi "Account", fai clic su "Delete account" nella parte inferiore della pagina, digita il tuo nome utente e conferma. I tuoi progetti non verranno eliminati.

name: Mojang
notes: If you have registered a Mojang account and would like to delete your account, please visit your account settings page. Please be aware that if your account is deleted, you will no longer be able to log into Mojang services, and will not be able to purchase future Mojang games.
notes_tr: Bir Mojang hesabı kaydettiyseniz ve hesabınızı silmek istiyorsanız, lütfen "Hesap Ayarları" sayfanızı ziyaret edin. Lütfen hesabınız silinirse, artık Mojang hizmetlerine giriş yapamayacağınızı ve gelecekteki Mojang oyunlarını satın alamayacağınızı unutmayın.
notes_fr: Si vous avez créé un compte Mojang et vous voulez le supprimer, veuillez visitez vos parametres. Sachez que si vous supprimez votre compte, vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter aux services Mojang, et vous ne pourrez plus acheter les jeux de Mojang à l'avenir.
notes_it: Se desideri cancellare il tuo account, visita la pagina impostazioni. Se elimini il tuo account, non potrai piu loggare nei servizi Mojang, e non potrai piu acquistare dei giochi Mojang in futuro.
notes_pt-BR: Se você registrou uma conta Mojango e gostaria de deletá-la, visite a página de configurações da conta. Lembre-se de que se sua conta for deletada, você não poderá mais fazer login nos serviços Mojang, e não poderá adquirir futuros jogos da Mojang.
notes_ca: Si vostè es va registrar a Mojang i ara vol esborrar el seu compte, visiti la página de configuració del compte. Tingui en compte que si l'elimina no podrà entrar més amb els serveis de Mojang i no podrà adquirir futurs jocs de Mojang.
notes_es: Si te habías registrado en Mojang y ahora quieres borrar tu cuenta, visita la página de configuración de la cuenta. Te comunicas que si lo eliminaras, no podrás usar los servicios de Mojang y no podrás comprar juegos de Mojang en el futuro.

name: Molotov
notes: Log in, go to your profile settings, finally find at the bottom of the page (Delete my account).
notes_fr: Connectez-vous, allez dans vos paramètre de profil, enfin trouver en bas de page (Supprimer mon compte).

name: Mon Compte Formation
notes: On the "My Account" page, click on "Unregister"
notes_fr: Sur la page "Mon Compte", cliquez sur "Me Désinscrire"

name: Mon Espace Santé
notes: Login to your account, click on your profile, then on "Paramètres". Then click on "Clôture du profil"
notes_fr: Connectez vous à l'aide de vos identifiants puis cliquez sur votre profil situé en haut à droite de l'écran puis sur "Paramètres". Cliquez ensuite sur "Clôture du profil"

name: Money Dashboard
notes: If you wish to delete your account and its belonging data and bank accounts held within it, you have to submit a request to the user support (or send an e-mail to support@moneydashboard.com). Make it clear that you require the full deletion of your account, not simply the deletion of one of your bank accounts. If you only want to delete/remove a bank account, but keep your Money Dashboard account open, please visit [https://help.moneydashboard.com/entries/21936798](https://help.moneydashboard.com/entries/21936798)
notes_tr: Hesabınızı ve ona ait verileri ve içinde tutulan banka hesaplarını silmek isterseniz, kullanıcı desteğine bir talep göndermeniz (veya bir e-posta göndermeniz) gerekir. Yalnızca banka hesaplarınızdan birinin silinmesini değil, hesabınızın tamamen silinmesini istediğinizi açıkça belirtin. Yalnızca bir banka hesabını silmek / kaldırmak, ancak Money Dashboard hesabınızı açık tutmak istiyorsanız, lütfen banka hesabını silme bağlantısını ziyaret edin.

name: Money Lover
notes: Go to the menu on the top left corner, click 'My Account' then 'Delete Account' on the bottom of the dialog and confirm.

name: Money Saving Expert
notes: Just login to your account, select 'My Account', scroll to the bottom, select 'Settings' and click 'Close Account'

name: MongoDB Atlas
notes: To delete your MongoDB account you first need to delete all active clusters, projects and organizations linked with your account. Then click your name in the top right corner, click "Manage your MongoDB Account", and click "Profile Info" in the left panel. Click "Delete Account" and proceed with the presented steps.

name: Monkeytype
notes: Scroll to the bottom of the linked page and click the 'delete account' button.

name: Monoprice
notes: Use the contact form to ask customer service to delete your account.

name: Monster
notes: On the linked page, complete the form and ask for your account to be deleted.

name: MonTCL
notes: Go to your account settings, scroll down and click on "Delete my account".
notes_fr: Allez sur les paramètres de votre compte, descendez et cliquez sur "Supprimer mon compte".

name: Moodle
notes: After you place a request, you need to wait until the account is manually deleted by the administrator.
notes_ru: После подачи заявки вам нужно подождать, пока аккаунт не удалит администратор.
notes_uk: Після подачі заявки вам треба зачекати, поки акаунт не видалить адміністратор.

name: Moonpig
notes: Contact customer services and they'll respond in 24-48 hours. Not to mention the ways they try to hide you removing your card details. If you want to remove your card details, do the following: The easiest way to do this would be to go to the My Account page then click on the ‘Add Moonpig Prepay Credit’ link, click on the Buy link and your saved card details will be shown onscreen. Click on the ‘Remove Card’ option.
notes_tr: Müşteri hizmetleriyle iletişime geçin, 24-48 saat içinde yanıt verirler. Kart bilgilerinizi kaldırma yöntemini gizlemeye çalıştıkları yollardan bahsetmiyorum bile. Kart bilgilerinizi de kaldırmak istiyorsanız, şunu yapın: Bunu yapmanın en kolay yolu, "Hesabım" sayfasına gidip "Moonpig ön ödeme kredisi ekle" "Satın Al" bağlantısına gitmek ve kayıtlı kart bilgilerine tıklamaktır. Daha sonrasında "Kartı Sil" seçeneğine tıklayın.

name: Moovit
notes: In the app, go to "Help & Support", then "My Accounts and Personal Information", "Deleting my Accounts and Personal Information", scroll to the bottom of the page and click "Give us feedback", and fill out the form requesting cancellation of the account. For "Feedback Type" choose "Edit or delete personal information", under "Privacy and Security". If you also want to delete the Moovit Editor account you will have to explicitly ask for it.
notes_it: Nell'app, vai su "Aiuto & Supporto", poi "I miei account e informazioni personali", "Cancellazione dei miei account e delle informazioni personali", scorri in fondo alla pagina e clicca su "Lasciaci il tuo feedback", e compila il modulo richiedendo la cancellazione dell'account. Per "Tipo di commento" scegli "Modifica o elimina informazioni personali", sotto "Privacy e sicurezza". Se vuoi eliminare anche l'account dell'Editor Moovit dovrai chiederlo esplicitamente.

name: Morningstar
notes: Fill out the feedback form, asking them to delete your account. Be sure to specify that you’re not just unsubscribing from e-mail but that you want your account deleted entirely.
notes_tr: Geri bildirim formunu doldurarak hesabınızı silmelerini isteyin. Sadece e-posta aboneliğinizi iptal etmediğinizi değil, hesabınızın tamamen silinmesini istediğinizi de belirttiğinizden emin olun.
notes_fr: Completez le formulaire d'opinion en les demandant de supprimer votre compte. Soyez sûr que vous supprime votre compte totalement.

name: Mote
notes: Email them from the account you wish to delete.

name: Mouser
notes: Visit the privacy policy page and scroll down to section Right to erasure (Right to have your data deleted). Enter your email address into the form. A link to the account deletion form will then be sent to your registered email address. To delete your account you have to fill out the form with details such as your full name and address. Once completed you will receive a confirmation email informing you that your account will be deleted within 30 days. Alternatively you can contact the data protection officer using the email address provided in the privacy policy.

name: Mozilla Developer Network (MDN)
notes: Log in to Bugzilla and create a bug report to request the deletion of your account (see examples: [#1576401](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1576401)and [#1353345](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1353345)).</br></br>If you have made contributions to the MDN Web Docs, you will also need to specify what you would like to happen with them after deleting your account.
notes_tr: Bugzilla'da oturum açın ve hesabınızın silinmesini istemek için bir hata raporu oluşturun, aşağıdaki örneklere bakın. MDN Web Belgelerine katkıda bulunduysanız, hesabınızı sildikten sonra bunlara ne olmasını istediğinizi de belirtmeniz gerekecektir.
notes_pt-BR: Faça login na Bugzilla e crie um bug report para solicitar a exclusão da sua conta. (veja os exemplos: [#1576401](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1576401) e [#1353345](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1353345))</br></br>Caso você tenha feito contribuições ao MDN Web Docs, você também precisará especificar o que gostaria que acontecesse com elas após a exclusão da sua conta.

name: MSI
notes: On your account page, in Account section, go to Login Management, and in DELETE ACCOUNT click Delete.

name: Muambator
notes: On your account page, scroll to the bottom and click on the red button to delete it.
notes_pt-BR: Na página da sua conta, vá até o final e clique no botão vermelho 'Excluir'

name: Mullvad
notes: Contact support via email to request deletion of your account.

name: MultCloud
notes: Login to your account, click in the account icon ⮕ Settings ⮕ Delete Account and write the password and a note (optionally).
notes_pt-BR: Ao se logar, clique no ícone da conta ⮕ Settings ⮕ Delete Account e digite a senha e uma observação (este último não é obrigatório).
notes_pt-PT: Ao se logar, clique no ícone da conta ⮕ Settings ⮕ Delete Account e digite a senha e uma observação (este último não é obrigatório).

name: Multiplayer Game Hacking MPGH
