notes: Accounts can not be deleted, but admins offer an 'account purge' per request. It is wise to manually strip your account from any personal data.
notes_nl: Accounts kunnen niet verwijderd worden, maar op aanvraag zijn admins bereid een 'account purge' uit te voeren. Het is verstandig om handmatig persoonlijke gegevens van je account te verwijderen.

name: MuniMobile (San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency)
notes: If you mail them asking for deletion, you will get that "MuniMobile accounts cannot be deleted as we are required to retain the transaction information for financial audit purposes". They say they do deactivate the account, though.

name: Munzee
notes: Send an e-mail to privacy@freezetag.com. This email should include your first name, last name, e-mail address and, if applicable, your social network ID for the social network from which you access these services. (for example, your Facebook user ID)
notes_tr: Bir e-posta gönderin. Bu e-posta adınızı, soyadınızı, e-posta adresinizi ve (varsa) bu hizmetlere eriştiğiniz sosyal ağ için sosyal ağ kimliğinizi içermelidir. (örneğin, Facebook kullanıcı kimliğiniz)

name: Musescore
notes: Click on 'Delete account' at the left of the page.
notes_tr: Sayfanın solundaki "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: MusicBrainz
notes: Click on the 'Delete account' tab, then confirm with the 'Delete my account' button

name: Mutant Mail
notes: Re-verify intent with your password at the bottom of the settings page and click 'Delete Account'.

name: My Calendar
notes: Contact support using the linked form or by email and request account deletion.

name: My Fitness Pal
notes: Just login and head to the account settings to click on delete account.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın ve hesabınızı silmek için "Hesap Ayarları" kısmına girin.

name: My Invisalign
notes: Login and select 'Delete Account' in the sidebar in your account settings

name: My Lands
notes: Contact the customer support via email and ask to delete your account. You should use the email of the country where you are registered: it's in the contacts, at the bottom of the website.
notes_it: Contatta l'assistenza clienti via email e chiedi di eliminare il tuo account. Dovresti utilizzare l'email della nazione in cui sei registrato: è nei contatti, in fondo al sito web.

name: MyAnimeList
notes:
Enter your email address in the "Enter your registered email address" field and click "Confirmation" to request the deletion of your account. After that, confirm your request by clicking on the confirmation link that will be sent to you by email.

If your account has been banned for any reason or you are an MAL Supporter, request the deletion of your account through [this](https://myanimelist.net/about.php?go=contact) contact form instead of using the method explained above.
notes_tr:
E-posta adresinizi "Kayıtlı e-posta adresinizi girin" alanına girin ve hesabınızın silinmesini istemek için "Onay" tuşuna tıklayın. Bundan sonra, size e-posta ile gönderilecek olan onay bağlantısına tıklayarak talebinizi onaylayın.

Hesabınız herhangi bir nedenle yasaklandıysa veya MAL Destekçisiyseniz, hesabınızın silinmesini şu adresten talep edin: Yukarıda açıklanan yöntemi kullanmak yerine [bu iletişim formunu kullanın.](https://myanimelist.net/about.php?go=contact)
notes_pt-BR:
Insira seu endereço de e-mail no campo "Enter your registered email address" e clique em "Confirmation" para solicitar a exclusão da sua conta. Após isso, confirme sua solicitação clicando no link de confirmação que será lhe enviado via e-mail.

Caso sua conta tenha sido banida por algum motivo ou então você seja um MAL Supporter, solicite a exclusão da sua conta através [deste](https://myanimelist.net/about.php?go=contact) formulário de contato em vez de usar o método explicado acima.

name: myESET
notes: At the bottom of the account page there is a Delete account button

name: MyFigureCollection
notes: At the bottom of the account settings page, click on "Delete my account"

name: MyFonts
notes: At the bottom of the linked page select 'Delete your MyFonts account' and confirm your password.

name: MyFRITZ!
notes: Login and select 'Delete Account' in the sidebar in your account settings
notes_tr: Giriş yapın ve "Hesap Ayarları" kısmından kenar çubuğundaki "Hesabı Sil" seçeneğine tıklayın
notes_de: Einloggen und in den Kontoeinstellungen 'Konto löschen' aus der Seitenleiste wählen.

name: Myfxbook
notes: Account deletion can be achieved from within the profile settings.

name: MyJDownloader
notes: Go to your account settings (top right, click on your E-Mail-Adress) and select 'Delete Account'
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" kısmına (sağ üst, e-posta adresinize tıklayın) girin ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın
notes_de: Gehe zu deinen Account-Einstellungen (oben rechts, klicke auf deine E-Mail-Adresse) und wähle 'Delete Account' aus.

name: MyMaxon
notes: Visit the linked page and submit a support ticket asking for your account to be deleted. Under "How can we help", select the option "I need customer service", then change "Request type" to "GDPR".

name: MyPlate
notes: Send a request to the customer service team, including your account username or email address.

name: MyScript
notes: Accessing the URL triggers a confirmation mail containing a deletion link. Click this link and your account will be deleted immediately.
notes_tr: Verilen bağlantıya gittiğinizde, silme bağlantısı içeren bir onay e-postasını tetikler. Bu bağlantıya tıklayın ve hesabınız hemen silinecektir.
notes_de: Die URL sendet eine E-Mail mit einem Löschen-Link. Wird dieser Link angeklickt, wird das Konto sofort gelöscht.

name: myWorld
notes: Send an email requesting account deletion.
notes_it: Invia un'email richiedendo l'eliminazione dell'account.

name: Namecheap
notes: You have to contact Customer Support to delete your account, and provide your account username, support pin and reason why you would like to close your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için Müşteri Desteği ile iletişime geçmeniz ve hesabınızın kullanıcı adını, destek kodunuzu ve hesabınızı neden kapatmak istediğinizi belirtmeniz gerekir.

name: NameMC
notes: All of your followers, favorite servers, and social media information will be removed from all of your linked Minecraft profiles if you delete your NameMC account.

name: Nandos
notes: Contact Customer support to delete your account, referencing GDPR in the subject or body. After 14 days, your account will be deleted permanently.

name: NaNoWriMo
notes: At the bottom of the Account Settings page is a "Delete My Account" button. Your account will be "disabled and scheduled for permanent deletion." After 30 days, "your past novels, author profile, and unique account info will be permanently deleted." It is unclear if forum posts will be deleted.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfasının altında bir "Hesabımı Sil" düğmesi bulunuyor. Hesabınız 'devre dışı bırakılacak ve kalıcı olarak silinmek üzere planlanacaktır.' 30 gün sonra, 'geçmiş romanlarınız, yazar profiliniz ve benzersiz hesap bilgileriniz kalıcı olarak silinecek.' Forum yayınlarının silinip silinmeyeceği belli değil.

name: Napster
notes: Start a chat and ask for your account to be deleted. You can delete anyone's account like this! Just "I'd like my account to be deleted." -"What email?" -"email@email.email" -"Ok, I have gone ahead and deleted it."
notes_tr: Bir sohbet başlatın ve hesabınızın silinmesini isteyin. Herhangi birinin hesabını böyle silebilirsiniz! Sadece şunu söyleyin: 'Hesabımın silinmesini istiyorum.' - 'Hangi e-posta için?' - 'ornek@ornek.ornek' - 'Tamamdır, hesabı sildim.'

name: National Express
notes: No on-site way to delete an account, also does not reply to emails sent to email in the privacy policy for the data controller.

name: NationStates
notes: Stay logged out of your nation for 28 or 60 days, depending on your settings. However, your nation will be merely deactivated. The only way to have your nation truly deleted is to not have the nation long enough to reach a population of over 1 billion, and for someone else to create a nation with the same name at least 5 years after it was deactivated.

name: Native
notes: Fill out the contact form. They will email you to verify your request via email, and will then ask for two pieces of personal information from the account. They will then delete the account but retain information relevant to any orders made.

name: Native Instruments
notes: Fill the ticket form and wait for response.
notes_tr: Destek talebi formunu doldurun ve yanıt vermelerini bekleyin.

name: Natural Readers
notes: Login first, then on the left menu click 'account' then 'edit' under your email address. A popup will appear where you can delete your account.

name: NAVER
notes: Re-registration is not possible with a deleted ID, and posts written on the bulletin board are not automatically deleted. So, make delete or make them private before you terminate your account.
notes_ko: 아이디는 재사용이 불가하며, 게시판에 글을 작성했던 경우 탈퇴 시 자동으로 삭제되지 않으므로 비공개 처리하거나 삭제한 후 탈퇴하시기 바랍니다.

name: NCBI
notes: Accounts will be deleted after 2 years of inactivity
notes_tr: Hesaplar 2 yıl hareketsiz kaldıktan sonra silinecek
notes_es: La cuenta será borrada después de dos años de inactividad

name: Nearpod
notes: Requires to fill out contact form. Will still get Promotional emails until you also unsubscribe from them
notes_tr: İletişim formunun doldurulması gerekir. Aynı zamanda e-posta aboneliğinizi iptal edene kadar promosyon e-postaları almaya devam edeceksiniz

name: Neon Pagamentos
notes: Neon accounts cannot be deleted, only canceled.
notes_tr: Neon hesapları silinemez, sadece iptal edilebilir.
notes_pt-BR: Contas Neon não podem ser excluídas, apenas canceladas.

name: Neopets
notes: Send an email to the support@neopets.com stating you wish to delete your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek istediğinizi belirten bir e-posta gönderin.
notes_fr: Envoyez un e-mail à support@neopets.com, en déclarant que vous voulez supprimer votre compte.

name: Netdata
notes: In your profile preferences, click 'Delete account' then confirm.

name: Netflix
notes: Cancel your membership, then contact support if you want immediate deletion, otherwise your account will be automatically deleted in 10 months.
notes_tr: Üyeliğinizi iptal edin, ardından derhal silinmesini istiyorsanız destek ile iletişime geçin, aksi takdirde hesabınız 10 ay içinde otomatik olarak silinecektir.
notes_fr: Annulez votre abonnement, puis contactez le support si vous souhaitez une suppression immédiate. Sinon, votre compte sera conservé pendant 10 mois.
notes_ca: Cancel·leu la vostra subscripció i, a continuació, poseu-vos en contacte amb el servei d'assistència si voleu suprimir-lo immediatament. En cas contrari, el vostre compte se suprimirà automàticament en deu mesos.
notes_ru: Отмените свое членство, затем обратитесь в службу поддержки, если вы хотите немедленное удаление, в ином случае ваша учетная запись будет автоматически удалена через 10 месяцев.

name: Netgate
notes: You need to send an email. If you have placed any orders (even for $0) in the last 7 years, support will refuse to delete your account.
email_body: Please delete my account, my email address is XXXXXX

name: Netlify
notes: Press the 'delete' button and then enter your name to confirm.
notes_tr: "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın ve isminizi girerek onaylayın.

name: Netology
notes: It is not possible to delete your account.  The best you can do is delete any personal information that you have stored on their website.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmeniz mümkün değildir. Yapabileceğiniz en iyi şey, sitede bulunan kişisel verileri silmektir.
notes_ru: Никаких пунктов для удаления профиля нет. И похоже, обращение в техподдержку ничего не даст. Проще потереть все персональные данные с сайта

name: New Relic
notes: From the New Relic menu bar, select (account) ⮕ Upgrade subscription ⮕ Cancel account. Select the confirmation prompt.
notes_tr: New Relic menü çubuğundan, "Hesap" "Aboneliği Yükselt" "Hesabı İptal Et" tuşuna tıklayın. Ardından onaylayın.

name: New York Times
notes: Use the form to request deletion of all of your personal data, they will only do it if law mandates like GDPR (Europe), otherwise account will just be deactivated. You might be required to confirm the request by mail or another form of contact.

name: Newegg
notes: Deleting your account is only possible if an applicable government policy gives you the right to delete your account.
notes_de: Du kannst deinen Account nur löschen, wenn die Gesetze deines Landes dir das Recht dazu geben.

name: Newgrounds
notes: Go to your account settings and select "Request Account Deletion." It can take up to 30 days for your account to be completely deleted.
notes_pt-BR: Vá para as suas configurações de conta e selecione "Request Account Deletion." Pode demorar até 30 dias para que a sua conta seja apagada completamente.

name: Newspipe
notes: There is a  "delete your account" button, but it was not working. Mailing them does.
notes_tr: Bir "Hesabınızı Silin" düğmesi var, ancak çalışmıyordu. Fakat onlara e-posta göndermek işe yarıyor.

name: Nexo
notes: Login to your account, go to 'Account ⮕ Security' and enable 2FA. Go to the URL and then close your account.

name: Nexon
notes: Open a ticket to ask for account deletion

name: NextDNS
notes: Navigate to account settings and click the delete account button.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" yerine girin ve hesabı sil tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pt-BR: Vá para as configurações da conta e clique no botão de deletar a conta.

name: Nextdoor
notes: Accounts can only be deleted by contacting their support team.
notes_tr: Sadece müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçilerek hesap silinebilir.

name: Ngan Luong
notes:
Enter your current password and click "Continue". Notification: After requesting to close the account, NganLuong will proceed to approve:
 - If the account is being disputed, Ngan Luong will ask you to resolve the dispute before closing the account.
 - If the account still has a balance, Ngan Luong will guide you to pay off the balance before closing.
 Accounts cannot be reopened once closed, you should consider before closing.

name: ngrok
notes: Enter your email and click "Delete". You will get a popup, where you must click "Delete User"

name: Nike+
notes: At the bottom of the account form, there is a 'Deactivate Account' button. Upon clicking, there will be a set of information that explains the process of account deactivation. All account information will be deleted.
notes_tr: Hesap formunun alt kısmında bir "Hesabı Devre Dışı bırak" düğmesi bulunuyor. Tıkladıktan sonra, hesabın devre dışı bırakılma sürecini açıklayan bir dizi bilgi olacaktır. Tüm hesap bilgileri silinecektir.
notes_fr: Au bas du formulaire du compte, il y a un lien « Deactivate Account ». En le cliquant, il y aura une liste des informations qui expliquent le processus de la désactivation du compte. Toutes les informations seront supprimées.

name: Ninox
notes: Contact Support via the online contact form and request your account to be deleted. Alternatively you can use the support E-Mail address.
notes_tr: Çevrim içi iletişim formu aracılığıyla destek ile iletişime geçin ve hesabınızın silinmesini isteyin. Alternatif olarak, destek e-posta adresini kullanabilirsiniz.
notes_de: Über das Online-Kontaktformular kann der Support gebeten werden, den Account zu löschen. Alternativ lässt sich auch per E-Mail Kontakt aufnehmen.

name: Nintendo
notes: Scroll down and press deactive and delete, it will be deactived for 30 days and then permanently deleted, if a Nintendo Network ID is linked to the account, it will not be deleted in this process
notes_tr: Aşağı kaydırın ve devre dışı bırak ve sil tuşuna basın, 30 gün boyunca devre dışı bırakılacak ve ardından kalıcı olarak silinecektir. Hesaba bir Nintendo Network Kimliği bağlanırsa, bu işlem süresince silinmeyecektir

name: Nitrous Networks
notes: You need to login in order to request the removal.

name: Njalla
notes: Type your password and confirm your action by clicking "Delete Account".
notes_tr: Şifrenizi girin ve işleminizi onaylamak için "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_pt-BR: Digite sua senha e clique em "Delete Account" para confirmar a exclusão da sua conta.

name: NodeChef
notes: In the dashboard, go to the "Account" tab, scroll down to "Delete Account" section, follow the instructions and then click "Delete my account".

name: NoIP
notes: At the bottom of the linked page, click the 'Delete Account' button. Check the 'I understand' box, then click 'Confirm'.
notes_tr: Onay kutusunu işaretleyerek onaylayın ve "Değiştir" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_fr: Cochez la case pour confirmer, puis cliquez « Change ».

name: Nomad
notes: You have to clear the account before requesting the account deletion on the app. And after 15 or 20 days of email confirmation, the account is finally deleted.
notes_pt-BR: Antes de pedir para encerrar a conta no aplicativo, você precisa zerar sua conta. E após 15 ou 20 dias depois de responder o e-mail confirmando a remoção da conta, ela é finalmente apagada.

name: NordPass
notes: "If you’d like to delete your account or data, please contact us at support@nordpass.com"
notes_tr: Hesabınızı veya verilerinizi silmek isterseniz, lütfen bizimle iletişime geçin.

name: NordVPN
notes: Fill the form on the site to request deletion. Alternatively, use the Live Chat service to request deletion, located at the bottom right of the form.

name: Norton
notes: You must cancel all active subscriptions before deleting your account. They will send a code to your email address to verify your identity.

name: Notesnook
notes: Log in to your account via the app or website, go to the settings, click on "Profile" and then "Delete account".

name: Notion
notes: Go to "Settings & members", then "My account", and click "Delete my account", type your email address and confirm.
notes_it: Vai su "Settings & members", quindi su "My account", quindi fai clic su "Delete my account", digita il tuo indirizzo email e conferma.

name: The Noun Project
notes: 'Email us at info@thenounproject.com and we'll deactivate your account.'
notes_tr: Bize e-posta gönderin, hesabınızı devre dışı bırakalım.

name: Novation Music
notes: 'Users have the right, under certain circumstances, to obtain the erasure of their Data from the Owner.'
notes_tr: 'Kullanıcılar, belirli koşullar altında Verilerinin Sahibinden silinmesini sağlama hakkına sahiptir.'

name: NovelAI
notes: Log into your account, and press your account icon in the top left corner of the screen. Under the User Settings column, select 'Account'. Next to 'Delete Account', click the 'Request' button. Submit your email address, then check your inbox for an account deletion confirmation. Follow the included link, then click 'Delete Account'. Your data will be deleted within 24 hours.

name: NovoEd
notes: Create a new request titled "Please delete my account" using your e-mail address and the topic "Course Not Listed/Not Course Related".

name: NOW TV
notes: You must first cancel any active passes under 'My Account' ⮕ 'My Passes'. After this, you can contact the live chat and ask for your billing information to be removed. Your account must remain inactive for an indeterminate amount of time before the remaining data will be removed 'in accordance with our group data retention and deletion policies'.
notes_tr: Öncelikle "Hesabım" "Geçişlerim" sayfası altından tüm aktif abonelikleri iptal etmelisiniz. Bundan sonra, canlı sohbete başvurabilir ve ödeme bilgilerinizin kaldırılmasını isteyebilirsiniz. Geri kalan veriler ise 'toplu veri saklama ve silme politikalarımıza uygun olması için' kaldırılmadan önce hesabınız belirsiz bir süre boyunca pasif kalmalıdır.

name: npm
notes: Go to your account settings and press 'Delete your account'.

name: NS (Nederlandse Spoorwegen)
notes: Login to your NS (Nederlandse Spoorwegen) account and click on the linked URL. On this page you can click "Delete NS-account" in order to delete your account.
notes_nl: Log in op je NS (Nederlandse Spoorwegen) account en klik op de gekoppelde URL. Op deze pagina kun je klikken op "Verwijder NS-account" om je account te verwijderen.

name: NS1
notes: Email support and request account deletion. They will process your request and email you when it has been deleted.
notes_tr: E-posta desteği ve hesap silme talebinde bulunun. İsteğinizi işleme alacaklar ve silindiğinde size e-posta gönderecekler.

name: nTask
notes: To delete your nTask account, follow this simple procedure: Using your registered email for nTask, send a request titled "Account Deletion" to "support@ntaskmanager.com" mentioning your name and email address. Once the request is received, it will take 24 hours to process your request
notes_tr: nTask hesabınızı silmek için, şu basit prosedürü izleyin: nTask için kayıtlı e-postanızı kullanarak bir destek talebi gönderin. Talep alındıktan sonra talebinizin işlenmesi 24 saat sürecektir
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte nTask voici la procédure: Avec l'adresse e-mail utilisée pour le compte nTask, envoyer une demande intitulée "Account Deletion" à "support@ntaskmanager.com" mentionnant votre nom et adresse email. Une fois la demande reçue, il faudra 24 heures pour effectuer la demande

name: Nubank
notes: Nubank accounts cannot be deleted, only canceled.
notes_tr: Nubank hesapları silinemez, sadece iptal edilebilir.
notes_pt-BR: Contas Nubank não podem ser excluídas, apenas canceladas.

name: Nube
notes: According to the privacy policy, accounts cannot be deleted, only deactivated (and reactivated later).
notes_pt-BR: De acordo com a política de privacidade, as contas não podem ser excluídas, apenas desativadas (e reativadas mais para frente).

name: Nulled
notes: They DO NOT delete accounts, just log out.

name: Nutaku
notes: Click the Delete Account Button

name: NutraCheck
notes: Have to email customer care to ask for account to be deleted

name: Nvidia
notes: Open the link, sign in, click 'Delete my data', click the confirmation link sent to your email, type in DELETE and press ok.
notes_tr: Bağlantıyı açın, giriş yapın ve "Verilerimi Sil" tuşuna tıklayın, ardından e-posta adresinize gelecek olan onaylama bağlantısına tıklayın. 'DELETE' yazın ve "Tamam" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: O'Reilly
notes: The only way to delete an account is to send an e-mail to privacy mail as instructed on their privacy policy section 6.2 (https://www.oreilly.com/privacy.html).
email_body: I want my account linked to this email be deleted. I request and authorize you to remove my profile from oreilly.com and delete all my information with your company across all platforms.

name: OceanHero
notes: You need to [open a support ticket](https://oceanhero.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

name: Octopus
notes: Hit the button with the user icon in the top-right. Navigate to the 'Settings' tab and pick 'Delete my account'.
notes_tr: Sağ üstteki kullanıcı simgeli düğmeye basın. "Ayarlar" sekmesine gidin ve "Hesabımı sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Odeon
notes: You must submit a request to support. Live chat also works. The process takes 30 days to complete.

name: The Odin Project
notes: Account deletion requires contacting Customer Support.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesi için müşteri hizmetleri ile iletişime geçmeniz gerekir.
notes_fr: Pour supprimer votre compte contactez le support.
notes_it: La cancellazione account richiede di contattare il servizio clienti.
notes_de: Account-Löschung erfordert es, den Kundensupport zu kontaktieren
notes_pt-BR: Para deletar a sua conta contate a assistência ao cliente
notes_ca: Per esborrar el seu compte contacti amb l'assistència al client
notes_es: Para borrar tu cuenta contacta con asistencia al cliente

name: Odnoklassniki
notes: Login to your account, scroll License Agreement down, click Delete profile, check any boxes you want, enter password and press Remove button.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, Lisans Sözleşmesini aşağı kaydırın, "Profili Sil" seçeneğini tıklayın, istediğiniz kutuları işaretleyin, şifreyi girin ve "Sil" düğmesine basın.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous, faites défiler le contrat, cliquez sur « Delete profile », cochez les cases que vous voulez, entrez votre mot de passe et cliquez sur « Remove ».
notes_it: Fai il login, scorri il contratto, premi Delete profile, fai il tick sulle caselle che vuoi, inserisci la password e premi il pulsante Remove.
notes_pt-BR: Faça login em sua conta, vá até o License Agreement, clique em Delete profile, marque as caixas que você quiser, digite sua senha e pressione o botão Remove.
notes_ca: Entri al seu compte, baixi fins a 'License Agreement', cliqui a 'Delete profile', marqui les caselles que desitgi, entri la seva clau i faci clic a 'Remove'.
notes_es: Entra en tu cuenta, desplázate hasta 'License Agreement', pulsa 'Delete profile', marca las casillas que desees, entra tu contraseña y haz clic en 'Remove'.
notes_ru: Войдите в ваш аккаунт, прокрутите Лицензионное Соглашение вниз, кликните 'Удалить профиль', поставьте галочки по желанию и жмите кнопку 'Удалить'.

name: OfferUp
notes: Login to your account, click Delete Account, provide reason for deletion, confirm and complete. Very simple.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, "Hesabı Sil" öğesini tıklayın, silme nedenini belirtin, "Onayla" tuşuna tıklayın ve tamamlayın. Oldukça basit.

name: OfficeDepot
notes: Note that while their privacy policy states that California residents may have their information deleted permanently, it does not specify whether they delete other accounts also. Go to the URL and fill out the form with the information pertaining to your account. Open the 'Delete My Information' section and check the box next to 'Delete my consumer data'. Submit the form and wait for an email to arrive. Click the link in the email. If after 24 hours your account is not deleted, you might have to reach out to their customer support and present their Privacy Policy to have them act.

name: OGLoot
notes: Need to write a ticket for the app. Once the account is deleted, it is impossible to create a new account with the same login information.

name: OK
notes: Visit the linked page and click the "Delete profile" button at the bottom of the page.

name: OkCupid
notes: Visit your settings page, and select 'Delete Account'
notes_tr: Ayarlar sayfanıza girin ve "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın
notes_fr: Visitez vos paramatres et selectionnez « Delete Account ».
notes_it: Visita la pagina impostazioni, quindi seleziona 'Delete Account'
notes_pt-BR: Visite a sua página de configurações, e selecione 'Delete Account'
notes_ca: Visiti la pàgina de paràmetres, i seleccioni 'Delete Account'
notes_es: Visita la página de parámetros, y selecciona 'Delete Account'

name: Olo
notes: Click the link in the email sent to you

name: OLX
notes: Click in the profile link, privacy and security and at the very bottom of the page, click in the Delete Account link and enter the password.
notes_pt-BR: Clique no link do perfil, em segurança e privacidade e no fim da página, cliquem em Remover conta e insira a senha.

name: OmaPosti
notes: In the bottom of the page, click 'Stop using Posti’s electronic services'.

name: Omnipilot
notes: On your account page, click on 'Delete Account' then confirm.
notes_pt-BR: Nas preferências do seu perfil, clique em 'Delete Account' e depois confirme.

name: One Month
notes: Email support@honeybadger.io asking to close your account.

name: OneCompiler
notes: Click your profile image in the top right corner of the page and open 'My account'. Select the 'Settings' tab, then click 'Account', and press the 'Delete My Account' button. Submit the code sent your email.

name: OneFootball
notes: You need to contact OneFootball support by e-mail.
notes_es: Debes contactar con el soporte de OneFootball a través de un correo electrónico.

name: OneSky
notes: Contact Support.
notes_tr: Destek ekibiyle iletişime geçin.

name: Onet
notes: You just need to click 'Delete account', then enter your account password and tick the checkbox
notes_tr: "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın, hesap şifrenizi girin ve onay kutusunu işaretleyin

name: The Onion
notes: Fill out the form using the email address of your account and click on the verification link that is sent.

name: Online.net
notes: The french law forces them to keep your account because it's linked to your bills.
notes_tr: Fransız yasaları, faturalarınızla bağlantılı olduğu için hesabınızı tutmaya zorluyor.

name: OnlineTVRecorder.com
notes: You can deactivate your account with the link. But the data isn't deleted. Even if you contact the support they don't delete your data.
notes_tr: Verilen bağlantı ile hesabınızı devre dışı bırakabilirsiniz. Ancak veriler silinmez. Desteğe başvursanız bile verilerinizi silmezler.
notes_fr: Vous pouvez désactiver votre compte avec le lien. Cependant, les données ne sont pas supprimées. Même si vous contactez le support du site, il ne supprime pas vos données.
notes_it: Puoi disattivare il tuo account. Ma i dati non saranno cancellati neanche se contatti il supporto.
notes_de: Du kannst deinen Account mit dem Link deaktivieren, aber deine Daten werden nicht gelöscht. Auch wenn du den Support kontaktierst, können sie deine Daten nicht löschen.
notes_pt-BR: Você pode desativar sua conta neste link. Mas os dados não são deletados. Mesmo se você contatar o suporte eles não irão apagar seus dados.
notes_ca: Pot desactivar el seu compte amb l'enllaç. Però les dades no poden ser esborrades. Encara que contacti amb Atenció al client no esborraran les seves dades.
notes_es: Puedes desactivar tu cuenta con el enlace. Pero los datos no pueden ser borrados, aunque contacta con atención al cliente no borrarán sus datos.

name: OnlyFans
notes: On settings tab, select the option 'Delete Account' and enter the captcha. After that, you'll receive an e-mail with the confirmation.
notes_pt-BR: Na aba de configurações, selecione a opção 'Delete Account' e digite o captcha. Após isso, você receberá um e-mail com a confirmação da exclusão.

name: OpenAI / ChatGPT
notes: Follow the link and under "Delete account" click "Delete".

name: OpenCores
notes: They recommend e-mailing to request for deletion, but the e-mail is never answered.

name: Opendesktop
notes: E-mail their support to get the account deleted.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesini talep etmek için destek ekibine e-posta gönderin.

name: OpenDNS
notes: You can delete the account by visiting the delete account page.
notes_tr: Hesabı silme sayfasını ziyaret ederek hesabı silebilirsiniz.

name: OpenFoodFacts
notes: In order to delete your OpenFoodFacts account, you need to fill out the form and send an email. Though there is a form to delete your OpenFoodFacts account, it seems no one is tending to it.

name: OpenGuessr
notes: Log in, click on your username at the top of the page, select 'Delete Acccount' under 'Account Management'.

name: OpenInvest
notes: Email them telling them you want to delete your account. They will retain some information as necessary to "comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes and enforce our agreements" (from their TOS and Privacy Policy), but most data will be deleted within 30 days.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek istediğinizi onlara e-posta ile bildirin. "Yasal yükümlülüklerimize uymak, anlaşmazlıkları çözmek ve sözleşmelerimizi uygulamak" için (Hizmet Şartları ve Gizlilik Politikalarından) gerekli olan bazı bilgileri saklayacaklar, ancak çoğu veri 30 gün içinde silinecek.

name: OpenPhone
email_body: I request a deletion of my OpenPhone account associated with this email address.
notes: You need to contact OpenPhone support.

name: OpenSea
notes: Deleting your account is only possible if an applicable government policy gives you the right to delete your account.

name: OpenStreetMap
notes: Log In, go to the linked page and confirm the deletion

name: OpenTable
notes: If you are using the iOS app, you can delete your account via Account Settings ⮕ Your details ⮕ Delete my account. Otherwise, you will need to contact OpenTable on their help page or via email

name: OpenWeather
notes: Main website may still show you logged in after deletion (compared to the account management site). In that case, cookies need to cleared.

name: Opera
notes: On the linked page select 'Delete my account'.

name: Optum
notes: On the linked page select "Deactivate Account" and provide the code sent to the account's email address.

name: Oracle
notes: You have to send a privacy inquiry to get your data deleted. (It can take a few days)

name: ORCID
notes: Visit the linked page and click "Deactivate you ORCID account". Deactivation deletes identifiable information associated with the ID and cryptographically hashes your email address to ensure reactivation of the ID only being possible from your email.

name: OSBuddy
notes: You must contact support via your account's registered email address to request deletion.
notes_tr: Silme talebinde bulunmak için hesabınızın kayıtlı e-posta adresi aracılığıyla destek ile iletişime geçmelisiniz.

name: Osu!
notes: You can only request account deletion by sending an email.

name: otter.ai
notes: Account deletion can be achieved from within the account settings. Simply go to 'Account settings' and press 'Delete account'. Then confirm by entering your password.

name: Outdooractive
notes: Follow the instructions provided to navigate to your profile and find the delete account button.

name: OV-chipkaart
notes: You have the right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') with ov-chipkaart.nl, only you have to send an email and exercise your right to erasure to do so. Send an email to the email address provided requesting to delete your account and personal information.
notes_nl: Je hebt het recht op vergetelheid bij ov-chipkaart.nl, alleen moet je hiervoor een e-mail sturen en jouw recht op vergetelheid uitoefenen. Stuur een e-mail naar het toegevoegde e-mailadres en vraag of jouw account en persoonlijke gegevens te laten verwijderen.

name: Overleaf
notes: Select 'Delete your account' at the bottom of the account settings page.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfasının altındaki "Hesabınızı Silin" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Overstock
notes: You must contact support directly and ask them to invalidate your account.  However, your transaction data may not be deleted from their records.
notes_tr: Doğrudan destek ile iletişime geçmeli ve onlardan hesabınızı geçersiz kılmalarını istemelisiniz. Ancak işlem verileriniz kayıtlardan silinemez.
notes_fr: Vous devez contactez le support directement pour leur demander d'invalider votre compte. Cependant, vos donnéés des transcations ne peuvent pas être supprimées.

name: Overwolf
notes: Follow the instructions on the linked page to delete your account within the Overwolf app. Alternatively, you may email support and request account deletion.

name: OVHcloud UK
notes: This is for UK account holders only. Ensure that you have terminated all products and services before filling the form and deleting your account. You need to provide proof of identity.

name: Oxford Dictionaries API
notes: Contact the customer support using the contact form and request the deletion of your account.

name: Oùra - Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
notes: You have to send a request via the contact page with your account information. You will recieve an email a few days after asking for your birth date to prove it's your account. Give them and they will delete your account a few days later.
notes_fr: Vous devrz envoyer une requète via la page de contact avec les informations de votre compte. Vous recevrez un email quelques jours après demandant votre date de naissance pour prouver que c'est bien votre compte. Donnez leur et ils supprimeront votre compte peu de temps après.

name: Packagist
notes: Visit the linked page and click 'Delete Account Permanently'.

name: Packt
notes: Send an email to them requesting deletion. If you have a subscription plan or free trial be sure to cancel it.

name: PAGBET
notes: According to privacy policy (item 8), you have to send an e-mail to them requesting the account removal.
notes_pt-BR: De acordo com a política de privacidade (item 8), você tem de enviar um e-mail para eles, solicitando a remoção da conta.
notes_pt-PT: De acordo com a política de privacidade (item 8), você tem de enviar um e-mail para eles, solicitando a remoção da conta.

name: Pandora
notes: Scroll down to delete my account and click it, click delete account, type in your password, then hit submit. If you have Pandora Plus or Premium, cancel your subscription, wait for it to expire, then delete.
notes_tr: Aşağı kaydırarak "Hesabımı Sil" seçeneğine gidin ve tıklayın, sonrasında hesabı sil seçeneğine tıklayıp şifrenizi yazın ve son olarak "Gönder" tuşuna basın. Pandora Plus veya Premium'a sahipseniz, aboneliğinizi iptal edin, süresinin dolmasını bekleyin, ardından silin.

name: Pantheon
notes: In order to delete an account, you first have to delete all active Sites, or transfer the ownership.
notes_tr: Bir hesabı silmek için önce tüm aktif siteleri silmeniz veya sahipliği aktarmanız gerekir.
notes_de: Um den Account löschen zu können, müssen Sie zunächst alle aktiven Webseiten löschen, oder diese an jemand anderen übertragen.

name: Papara
notes: You need to call the customer support in order to get your account deleted.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı kapatmak için müşteri hizmetleriyle telefon ile iletişime geçin.

name: PaperKarma
notes: Send an email to human@paperkarma.com requesting deletion. If you have a subscription plan through the App Store or Google Play, be sure to cancel your subscription in the proper store.
notes_tr: Silme talebinde bulunmak için bir e-posta gönderin. App Store veya Google Play üzerinden bir aboneliğiniz varsa, uygun mağazadan aboneliğinizi iptal ettiğinizden emin olun.

name: PaperNodes
notes: Hover over 'More Pages' then click on 'login' ⮕'account settings' and scroll down to see 'Delete my account' and press it. After confirming your password, all the data asociated to your account will be deleted in 48 hours.

name: Paradox Plaza
notes: You need to select "GDPR - Request for Account Deletion" in the form and fill in your details.
notes_de: Sie müssen "GDPR - Request for Account Deletion" im Formular auswählen und dann Ihre Daten eingeben.
notes_tr: Destek formunda "GDPR - Request for Account Deletion" seçeneğine basıp bilgilerinizi doldurmanız gerekiyor.
notes_ru: Вам необходимо выбрать "GDPR - Request for Account Deletion" в форме и заполнить свои данные.
notes_fr: Vous devez sélectionner "GDPR - Request for Account Deletion" dans le formulaire et remplir vos coordonnées.
notes_es: Debe seleccionar "GDPR - Request for Account Deletion" en el formulario y rellenar sus datos

name: Parallels
notes: Need to login, click the delete button, confirm in the email, and confirm on the site again.

name: Paramount Plus
notes: You may also use the [contact us](https://help.paramountplus.com/s/article/PD-How-do-I-delete-my-Paramount-account) link, but it doesn't work on every country.

name: Parcello
notes: Go to settings, click 'Delete account' underneath 'Miscellaneous'. Confirm this process in the modal. Works within the app as well.
notes_tr: Ayarlara gidin, "Çeşitli" altındaki "Hesabı Sil" öğesini tıklayın. Ardından işlemi onaylayın. Uygulama içinde de çalışır.
notes_de: Einstellungen öffnen ⮕ Auf 'Account löschen' unter 'Sonstiges' klicken ⮕ Mit 'Ja, Löschen!' bestätigen. Geht auch über die App.

name: Parkmobile
notes: To cancel your account, send an e-mail message request to the Parkmobile Help Desk at helpdesk@parkmobileglobal.com and include your name, mobile number, license plate number, and/or the last 4 digits of the card we have on file for you. After the Help Desk cancels your account, you will receive a confirmation e-mail message.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı iptal etmek için, Parkmobile Yardım Masasına bir e-posta mesajı isteği gönderin ve adınızı, cep telefonu numaranızı, plaka numaranızı ve/veya kartın son 4 hanesini ekleyin. Yardım Masası hesabınızı iptal ettikten sonra, bir onay e-posta mesajı alacaksınız.

name: Parsec
notes: At the bottom of the linked page select 'Delete Account' and confirm your username.

name: pass Culture
notes: Go to your profile, then "Informations personelles", and click on "Supprimer mon compte".
notes_fr: Allez sur votre profil, sur "Informations personelles" puis cliquez sur "Supprimer mon compte".

name: PassDock
notes: Select 'Delete account' at the bottom of your account info page.
notes_tr: Hesap bilgileri sayfanızın altındaki "Hesabı Sil" öğesini seçin.
notes_de: Klicke 'Account löschen' unten auf der Account-Info-Seite.

name: Passpack
notes: Sign into your Passpack account. Click on your ’Account’ tab then click the ’delete your account’ link in the lower left hand corner of the page. You will then be asked to insert your Packing Key to confirm that you are sure. Click 'Delete' to permanently delete your account.

name: Pastebin
notes: Password is required for deletion. Pastes will be removed and the username cannot be used again. No Recovery after deletion.
notes_tr: Silmek için şifre gereklidir. Oluşturulan içerik kaldırılacak ve kullanıcı adı tekrar kullanılamayacak. Silme sonrası kurtarma yoktur.

name: Patreon
notes: Log in, and open the link. Click 'Erase', and proceed to press buttons. Deletion is delayed by 14 days. Data about the deletion is shared with Transcend Inc.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın ve bağlantıyı açın. "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın ve düğmelere basmaya devam edin. Silme işlemi 14 gün ertelenir. Silme ile ilgili veriler Transcend Inc. ile paylaşılır.

name: Payback
notes: According to their help page, you need to contanct their Service-Center

name: Payoneer
notes: According to their Support Center, you need to contact them via email, live chat, or phone.

name: PayPal
notes: You must resolve any account limitations and outstanding payments or balance before closing.

name: PaySafeCard
notes: You can only delete an account on the computer. Go to account settings, then click "Delete account".

name: PaySera
notes: Quote from the support staff: If you want to delete your Paysera account completely, please write us an email (support@paysera.com) with a request and indicate why you want to delete your account. This email has to be sent from the email address that you use to log in to your Paysera account. Please be informed that if you delete your account, you will not be able to create a new account in the future. Paysera account is free of charge and we recommend not to delete it, but close the account, and you will be able to activate it in the future yourself by logging in to your Paysera account.
notes_tr: Destek ekibinden alıntı: Paysera hesabınızı tamamen silmek istiyorsanız, lütfen bize bir istek içeren bir e-posta yazın ve hesabınızı neden silmek istediğinizi belirtin. Bu e-posta, Paysera hesabınıza giriş yapmak için kullandığınız e-posta adresinden gönderilmelidir. Hesabınızı silerseniz, gelecekte yeni bir hesap oluşturamayacağınızı lütfen unutmayın. Paysera hesabı ücretsizdir ve onu silmemenizi tavsiye ederiz, ancak hesabı kapatırsanız, ileride Paysera hesabınıza giriş yaparak aktif hale getirebilirsiniz.
notes_de: Um den Account komplett zu löschen muss von der für die Registrierung verwendeten E-Mail-Adresse eine E-Mail an support@paysera.com in Englisch geschrieben werden. Hier dann darum bitten, dass der Account komplett gelöscht werden soll. Laut Support kann dann in Zukunft kein neuer Account angelegt werden.

name: PCBWay
notes: You need to contact support through built-in chat or you can comment on the linked thread

name: pCloud
notes: Go to Settings ⮕ Account ⮕ Delete Your Account and confirm the e-mail. The data will be deleted within three months.
notes_it: Vai su Impostazioni ⮕ Account ⮕ Elimina Account e conferma l'e-mail. I dati saranno cancellati entro tre mesi.

name: PCPartPicker
notes: Click the delete account on your account preferences.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfanızdaki "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: pdfFiller
notes: Log in to your account, then go to 'Settings' tab and click 'Delete Account'.
notes_pl: Zaloguj się na swoje konto, potem przejdź do 'Settings' i kliknij 'Delete Account'.

name: Peacock
notes: If you live in the U.S., fill out the form, select Peacock under applicable brands, and your account will be automatically deleted after some time. You may still receive a human response later however. Users outside of the U.S. should send an email to the privacy contact listed at the top of the form.

name: Peak
notes: You must send an e-mail to support@peak.net requesting deletion. You will then receive a response from support asking for feedback and to confirm the deletion. The next e-mail you receive from support will notify you that your account has been deleted.
notes_tr: Silme talebinde bulunmak için bir e-posta göndermelisiniz. Ardından, destek ekibinden geri bildirim isteyen ve silme işlemini onaylayan bir yanıt alacaksınız. Destek biriminden alacağınız bir sonraki e-posta, hesabınızın silindiğini size bildirecektir.
notes_fr: Il faut que vous demandez la suppression de votre compte dans un e-mail que vous envoyez à support@peak.net. Vous recevrez une réponse qui demande à la fois vos impressions de l'appli et une confirmation de la suppression. L'e-mail prochain que vous recevrez vous notifiera la suppression de votre compte.

name: Peloton
notes: To permanently delete your Peloton Account, please fill out the Privacy Request Form. Once the form is completed, the Peloton Privacy Team will begin processing your request.

name: Pennsylvania Turnpike (Toll By Plate)
notes: NOT FOR EZPASS ACCOUNTS. Fill out the form using the same information that is associated to your account. Alternatively, the account can be closed by calling 877-736-6727.

name: Penpot
notes: Go to your profile settings and click on "Want to remove your account?"

name: Penzu
notes: Click on 'Delete Penzu Account'. Confirm the deletion through the link sent to your email address.
notes_tr: "Penzu Hesabını Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. E-posta adresinize gönderilen bağlantı ile silme işlemini onaylayın.

name: peopleperhour
notes: Profile ⮕ settings ⮕ account ⮕ edit ⮕ select a reason ⮕ deactivate
notes_tr: "Profil" "Ayarlar" "Hesap" "Düzenle" "Sebep seçin" "Devre dışı bırak"

name: The Perfect Shave
notes: Click on 'Konto löschen' and then on 'Mein Konto jetzt unwiederruflich löschen'
notes_tr: "Hesabı Sil" ve ardından "Hesabımı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın
notes_de: Klicke auf 'Konto löschen' und dann auf 'Mein Konto jetzt unwiederruflich löschen

name: Perplexity
notes: In the "System" field, select "Delete Account" and confirm the action. All data will be permanently deleted 30 days after the account is deleted.

name: Personal Capital
notes: Click 'DELETE USER ACCOUNT' at the bottom of the settings page.
notes_tr: Ayarlar sayfasının altındaki "Kullanıcı Hesabını Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Personello Germany
notes: It is necessary to contact the support, for example through 'Mein Konto' ⮕ 'Meinung abgeben'.
notes_tr: Örneğin, "Hesabım" "Gönder" aracılığıyla destekle iletişim kurmak gerekir.
notes_de: Es ist nötig den Support zu kontaktieren oder über das Webinterface seine Meinung abzugeben unter 'Mein Konto' ⮕ 'Meinung abgeben'

name: Pexels
notes: Follow the instructions on the help article to delete your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için yardım makalesindeki talimatları izleyin.

name: Philips Hue
notes: Click 'Delete Account' on your account page.
notes_tr: Hesap sayfanızda "Hesabı Sil" öğesini tıklayın.
notes_de: Klicke auf 'Konto löschen' in den Kontoeinstellungen.

name: Phind
notes: Сlick on your email at the top of the page, then in the "Danger zone" field select delete acccount

name: PhishTank
notes: Select "Phishtank" under "Account(s) or Service(s) of interest" and specify in request details that you wish to delete your account.

name: Pholder
notes: It is not possible to delete your account. The email address from the TOS (abuse@pholder.com) does not respond to any emails.

name: Photobucket
notes: First cancel any subscriptions. Then after logging in, click [here](https://my.photobucket.com/photobucket-account-deletion-step1) and click through the multiple confirmations to start the account deletion process. Deletion can take up to 30 days, but there isn't any type of notification confirming a successful deletion. Second method is to open a support ticket and provide account username, email address, full name, the postal code and country from where you registered for verification. This method allows immediate deletion upon request.

name: Photomath
notes: Open the menu and sign in ⮕ 'Security and Privacy' ⮕ 'Edit profile' ⮕ 'Delete profile'

name: phplist
notes: Write an email requesting all data to be deleted.
notes_it: Scrivere un’email chiedendo che tutti i dati siano eliminati.

name: Piazza
notes: E-mail them and ask to close your account. They will reply asking you to confirm, after which point you can acknowledge and it will be removed.

name: PicPay
notes: PicPay accounts can be reactivated within 25 days of the request.
notes_pt-BR: Contas do PicPay podem ser reativadas até 25 dias após o pedido de encerramento.

name: Pillpack
notes: Will need to contact customer support and confirm your name and information before they'll delete.

name: Pinboard
notes: Visit your account page and click the "close account" link under your username. Your account will be suspended for 30 days, and then permanently deleted.

name: Pinterest
notes: On the Account Settings, click 'Delete Account', state reason and click 'Next', then 'Send email'. You need to check the e-mail and confirm the deletion.
notes_tr: "Hesap Ayarları" sayfasında "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın, nedeni belirtin ve "Sonraki" "E-posta Gönder" tuşuna tıklayın. E-posta kutunuzu kontrol etmeniz ve silme işlemini onaylamanız gerekir.
notes_ru: В настройках учетной записи нажмите «Удалить учетную запись», выберите причину и нажмите «Далее», затем «отправить электронную почту». Вам нужно будет проверить электронную почту и подтвердить удаление.

name: Pionex
notes: Inside your account (at the top), within the user space go to the 'Security' option, scroll to the bottom where you will find the 'Account Management' option. Under it, there is a 'Delete Account' button.

name: Pivot Interactives
notes: You must send an email to remove your account. This service "may still retain certain information associated with your account" for any of the reasons outlined in section 7 of their [privacy policy](https://www.discoveryeducation.com/privacy-policy/).

name: PivotalTracker
notes: You can delete your account using the website, but it is only fully deleted after e-mailing
notes_tr: Hesabınızı, web sitesini kullanarak silebilirsiniz, ancak yalnızca e-postayla iletişime geçtikten sonra tamamen silinir

name: Pix
notes: You can request that your account be deleted by making a request through their contact form
notes_tr: Pour supprimer votre compte Pix, faites-en la demande en complétant le formulaire de contact du support Pix, en renseignant le motif adéquat.

name: Pixabay
notes: In your account setting choose 'Delete account'.
notes_tr: Hesap ayarınızda "Hesabı Sil" öğesini seçin.
notes_de: Wähle 'Konto Löschen' in den Kontoeinstellungen.

name: Pixel Starships
notes: According to Privacy Policy, "To request the correction or deletion of any personally identifiable information that you have provided to us, send an email to mail@savysoda.com with "ACCESS AND CORRECT INFORMATION" in the subject line."
email_body: Please delete my Pixel Starships account registered under this email address.

name: Pixilart
notes: Fairly simple process, just follow the link.

name: pixiv
notes: It takes 2 weeks to delete an account. You will be unable to re-use the same e-mail during that period. They won't delete "pixiv ID". If you have other accounts created from your Pixiv account, you have to delete them before you can delete your Pixiv account

name: Pixlr
notes: Click on 'Delete account' under your profile settings, state why you want it to be delete and enter your password.

name: Pixum
notes: Contact support via email and request your account to be deleted.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesini talep etmek için onlara e-posta gönderin.
notes_de: Schreibe dem Support per E-Mail und bitte um eine Löschung des Accounts

name: Pizza Hut
notes: Download the Pizza Hut app. Sign-in with account information, click on the 'account' tab and tap on profile. On the close my account section, tap on the close my account. Fill in your information (name, address, phone, email,) and click submit.

name: Placeit
notes: Scroll down to the bottom of the linked page and click on the 'Delete my account' button.

name: PlanetMinecraft
notes: Sends a verification email with a confirmation button before submitting the deletion request.

name: PlantSnap
notes: To delete your account, open the app on your mobile device and click the "More" option button. Then click your profile name, from there you will be able to delete your account. If you require additional help, use the contact form provided on their website.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için mobil cihazınızda uygulamayı açın ve "Daha Fazla" düğmesine tıklayın. Ardından profil adınızı tıklayın, oradan hesabınızı silebilirsiniz. Ek yardıma ihtiyacınız varsa, web sitelerinde verilen iletişim formunu kullanın.

name: Player FM
notes: In upper right, click the settings button and select "Help/FAQ". Select option "How do I delete my account and leave Player FM?" - link will be below. Type "delete" in the box and click the button to finalize.
notes_tr: Sağ üstte, ayarlar düğmesini tıklayın ve "Yardım/SSS" seçeneğini seçin. "Hesabımı nasıl silerim ve Player FM'den ayrılırım?" seçeneğini seçin - bağlantı aşağıda olacaktır. Kutuya "Sil" yazın ve sonlandırmak için düğmeyi tıklayın.

name: PlayPosit
notes: Click your username in the upper right and select Profile, then Delete Account
notes_tr: Sağ üstteki kullanıcı adınızı tıklayın ve "Profil" "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın

name: PlayStation Network
notes:
You have to contact customer support or send them an email, and supply the email address associated with the account, along with the online ID, and one of the following information:
the first four and last four digits of the bank card associated with the account,
or the details of a recent transaction made using the account,
or the serial number of the original console associated with the account.
Alternatively, if you don't have this information, you can supply a proof of identity (identity document) and a proof of address. If your account is linked to another account of the Sony group, you will have to delete it first. After closure, your online ID will not be reusable.
notes_it:
Devi contattare l'assistenza clienti o inviare loro un'email, e fornire l'indirizzo email associato all'account, insieme all'ID online e una delle seguenti informazioni:
le prime quattro e le ultime quattro cifre della carta bancaria associata all'account,
o i dettagli di una transazione recente effettuata utilizzando l'account,
o il numero di serie della console originale associata all'account.
In alternativa, se non disponi di queste informazioni, puoi fornire una prova di identità (documento di identità) e una prova di indirizzo. Se il tuo account è collegato a un altro account del gruppo Sony, dovrai prima eliminarlo. Dopo la chiusura, il tuo ID online non sarà riutilizzabile.

name: Plenty of Fish
notes: Fill out the deletion form
notes_tr: Silme formunu doldurun
notes_fr: Completez le formulaire de suppression
notes_it: Completa il form per l'eliminazione.
notes_pt-BR: Preencha o formulário de remoção
notes_ca: Completi el formulari d'eliminació del compte
notes_es: Completa el formulario de eliminación de la cuenta

name: Plex.tv
notes: Under 'Danger Zone', click 'Delete your account'.
notes_tr: "Tehlikeli Bölge" "Hesabınızı Silin" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Plexus
notes: In the app, go into the menu, then under "My account", click on "Delete account".

name: Plugin Boutique
notes: Fill out the ticket form to request deletion, using the same email of the account.

name: Pluralsight
notes: Follow the instructions provided in the article. If you prefer, you can also request deletion of your account via email. NOTE: If you have outstanding payments or disputes or if you aren't comfortable with sharing personal data to confirm deletion, it might be harder
notes_tr: Makalede verilen talimatları izleyin. İsterseniz, e-posta yoluyla da hesabınızın silinmesini talep edebilirsiniz. NOT: Ödenmemiş ödemeleriniz veya ihtilaflarınız varsa veya silme işlemini onaylamak için kişisel verilerinizi paylaşmaktan memnun değilseniz, bu daha zor olabilir
notes_pt-BR: Siga as instruções fornecidas no artigo. Caso prefira, também poderá solicitar a exclusão da sua conta via e-mail. NOTA: Se você tiver pagamentos ou reclamações pendentes ou se não estiver confortável em compartilhar dados pessoais para confirmar a deleção, pode ser mais difícil

name: Plus500
notes: You have to fill the 'Personal Data Requests' form to delete your account: provide your e-mail address, and under 'Request Type' select 'Right of erasure'.
notes_it: Devi compilare il modulo 'Personal Data Requests' per eliminare il tuo account: fornisci il tuo indirizzo e-mail e in 'Request Type' seleziona 'Right of erasure'.

name: Pocket Casts
notes: On your phone: Open the Pocket Casts app, click on the "Profile" tab and then on your account, finally scroll down and click on "Delete Account" at the bottom of the screen. On your browser: Log in to the Pocket Casts web player, click on the profile icon in the top right-hand corner, click on your email address then scroll down and click on the "Delete Account" link. A confirmation pop-up will appear asking if you're sure you want to delete your account. Click "Delete" to confirm

name: Pocketbook
notes: Click on 'Remove Pocketbook Account' under account settings. Select an option from dropdown and type random feedback. Click Submit button. Type CONFIRM into text box and proceed to delete account.

name: Podio
notes: Log in to your account, press the delete button and type the phrase asked.
notes_tr: Hesabınızda oturum açın, "Sil" düğmesine basın ve sorulan ifadeyi yazın.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous, appuyez le bouton « delete », et tapez la phrase demandée.

name: Points.com
notes: Must contact support through Contanct form or online chat.
notes_tr: İletişim formu veya çevrim içi sohbet yoluyla destek ile iletişime geçmelisiniz.
notes_fr: Il faut contacter le support via le formulaire de contact ou le tchat en ligne.

name: Pokémon GO
notes: Sign in to the app with the game account you want to delete, then navigate to the Pokémon GO app 'Settings' ⮕ 'Advanced Settings' ⮕ 'Delete Account' and confirm.

name: Pokémon Trainer Club
notes: Go to https://club.pokemon.com/us/pokemon-trainer-club/edit-profile/ scroll down to the bottom and click 'Request Data Deletion', enter the required fields and you'll then get a confirmation email.

name: Polar
notes: Select the account deletion option from the site.

name: pon
notes: Open the app ⮕ Open Settings ⮕ Click on your Account's information ⮕ Initiate deletion
notes_tr: Uygulamayı açın ve "Ayarlar" "Hesap Bilgisi" "Silmeyi Başlat" yolunu izleyin
notes_de: App öffnen ⮕ Einstellungen öffnen ⮕ Auf das eigene Profil klicken ⮕ Benutzerkonto schließen

name: Porkbun
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Click the link ⮕ Click the Delete Account button and follow instructions.
notes_tr: Hesabınızda oturum açın, bağlantıyı tıklayın, ardından "Hesabı Sil" düğmesini tıklayın ve talimatları izleyin.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous ⮕ Appuyez le lien ⮕ Cliquez sur le bouton Delete Account et suivez les instructions.

name: postale.io
notes: Click on the 'Delete account' red button at the bottom of the page. Only administrator accounts can delete an account though.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altındaki kırmızı "Hesabı Sil" düğmesini tıklayın. Ancak yalnızca yönetici hesapları bir hesabı silebilir.

name: Postcrossing
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Click the link (data fully deleted, not possible to revert this).
notes_tr: Hesabınızda oturum açın, bağlantıya tıklayın (veriler tamamen silinir, bunu geri almak mümkün değildir).
notes_fr: Connectez-vous ⮕ Appuyez le lien (toutes les données sont supprimées définitivement).
notes_it: Entra nel tuo account ⮕ Clicca il link (informazioni completamente eliminate, operazione non reversibile).
notes_pt-BR: Faça login em sua conta ⮕ Clique no link (dados totalmente apagados, não é possível reverter).
notes_ca: Entri al seu compte ⮕ Cliqui a l'enllaç (les dades s'eliminen permanentment, no es pot revertir).
notes_es: Entra en tu cuenta ⮕ Haz clic en el enlace (los datos se eliminan permanentmente, no es posible de deshacerlo).

name: postimage
notes: Log in, go to the linked website, enter your password and confirm

name: Postman
notes: Log into your account, then click the 'Delete Account' button on your profile page.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, ve profil sayfanızdaki "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Postmates
notes: Fill in account information and click 'Report Issue'. Reply to the email sent to you to confirm deletion.
notes_tr: Hesap bilgilerini doldurun ve "Sorun Bildir" tuşuna tıklayın. Silme işlemini onaylamak için size gönderilen e-postayı yanıtlayın.

name: Pottermore
notes: Fill out form and submit. Non-USA form entries will receive an email to confirm the deletion request. If you are from the USA, use [this form](https://privacy.wizardingworld.com/delete-data-request/) instead.

name: PowToon
notes: Click on the contact link of the linked page and fill out the form.

name: Premera
notes: Email Premera's support team to request account deletion.
notes_tr: Hesap silme talebinde bulunmak için Premera'nın destek ekibine e-posta gönderin.

name: Premiumize.me
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Click the link ⮕ Click on Send verification code ⮕ Paste the code you got on your email and click Delete Account.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, verilen bağlantıya tıklayın, "Onay kodu gönder" seçeneğine tıklayın ve ardından e-postanıza aldığınız kodu yapıştırarak "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Previewed
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Go to account settings ⮕ Scroll down to the bottom of the page ⮕ Click Delete Account.

name: Prey
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Click 'Need to close your account?' near the bottom of the page ⮕ Confirm deletion
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, sayfanın altındaki "Hesabınızı kapatmanız mı gerekiyor?" seçeneğini tıklayın, ardından "Silmeyi Onayla" tuşuna tıklayın
notes_fr: Connectez-vous ⮕ Cliquez sur « Need to close your account? » au bas de la page ⮕ Confirmez la suppression de votre compte

name: Prezi
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Click the link ⮕ Enter your password and click on Delete Account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızda oturum açın, bağlantıyı tıklayın, şifrenizi girin ve "Hesabı Sil" seçeneğini tıklayın.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous ⮕ Cliquez sur le lien ⮕ Entrez votre mot de passe et cliquez sur « Delete Account ».

name: Privacy
notes: Click on the submit request button and click the request type to Close Account and fill out the form.

name: ProductHunt
notes: Go to the account setting, click 'Continue' under 'Delete my Account' and follow from there.
notes_tr: Hesap ayarına gidin, "Hesabımı Sil" altında "Devam Et" seçeneğini tıklayın ve oradan devam edin.

name: Progate
notes: Visit the linked page and click 'Delete Account'

name: Programiz PRO
notes: Login to the website and tap on your profile icon. Click on 'My Profile' and navigate to the 'Account' section. Hit the 'Delete My Account' button.

name: ProMods
notes: Contact via Discord or forum asking to delete account.

name: Prosper
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Click the link ⮕ Click on Close My Account Now.
notes_tr: Hesabınıza giriş yapın, verilen bağlantıyı tıklayın ve "Hesabımı şimdi kapat" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Proto.io
notes: You can either close your account temporary or delete it permanently. Log into your account ⮕ Click Settings ⮕ Manage Subscription ⮕ NEED TO CLOSE YOUR ACCOUNT? click Yes, Close Account
notes_tr: Hesabınızı geçici olarak kapatabilir veya kalıcı olarak silebilirsiniz. Hesabınıza giriş yapın, "Ayarlar" "Aboneliği Yönet" "Hesabınızı kapatmanız mı gerekiyor?" "Evet, hesabı kapat" yolunu izleyin

name: Proton
notes: Open your account settings, go to 'Account' ⮕ 'Account and password' ⮕ 'Delete your account'. You need to select a reason for deleting your account and give some feedback.

name: Prott
notes: Log into your account ⮕ Click Settings ⮕ in General tab scroll down and find 'Click here if you want to cancel your account' ⮕ Choose why you are leaving and click 'Continue' ⮕ Click 'Yes Cancel My Account'
notes_tr: Hesabınızda oturum açın, "Ayarlar" "Genel" "Hesabınızı iptal etmek istiyorsanız buraya tıklayın" öğesini tıklayın, neden ayrıldığınızı seçin ve "Devam Et" "Evet, hesabımı iptal et" düğmesini tıklayın

name: ProWritingAid
notes: Visit the linked page and press 'Delete Account'.

name: Proxer
notes: The account deletion page can be found by hovering the logo ⮕ Impressum ⮕ FAQ/Kontakt ⮕ Zur Accountlöschung. When logged in, the linked page should present a pop-up dialogue to confirm account deletion.
notes_de: Die Accountlöschung findet man unter dem Logo-Dropdown ⮕ Impressum ⮕ FAQ/Kontakt ⮕ Zur Accountlöschung. Man bekommt noch ein Pop-Up zur Bestätigung.

name: Prusa
notes: Prusa does not offer a way to delete your account.

name: PTC (MathCad, Vuforia Chalk Community)
notes: Log into your account to check the current state of the help page for any updates. If you cannot log in to your account anymore, use this [link](https://support.ptc.com/support/feedback/web-account.htm) and fill out the form to request the deletion of a personal accounts data. A support agent should reach out to reconfirm your choice via email. This process may differ for education or business accounts.
notes_de: Logge dich in deinen Account ein, um die aktuellste Version des Hilfsartikels einzusehen. Falls du dich nicht mehr mit deinem Account anmelden kannst, verwende diesen [Link](https://support.ptc.com/support/feedback/web-account.htm) und fülle das Formular aus, um die Löschung eines persönlichen Accounts auf Englisch zu beantragen. Supportmitarbeiter sollten sich einige Tage später per Mail melden und eine Bestätigung verlangen. Der Prozess für Geschäfts- und Bildungskonten kann abweichen.

name: Public Lab
notes: It is currently not possible to delete an account on Public Lab.
notes_tr: Şu anda Public Lab'de bir hesabı silmek mümkün değildir.

name: Pulse.red
notes: Hit the button with the user name in the top-right. Navigate to the 'Settings' tab and pick 'Delete account'. Confirm by clicking 'Yes, delete'.

name: Pulseway
notes: At the bottom of the page click 'Delete Account'. You will need a code sent to the 'Work E-Mail' listed on the same page (can be changed without confirmation).
notes_tr: Sayfanın altında "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın. Aynı sayfada listelenen 'İş E-postası'na gönderilen bir koda ihtiyacınız olacak (onay olmadan değiştirilebilir).

name: Pushlink
notes: Type your current password and click 'Erase all data permanently'.

name: Put.io
notes: Click Destroy my account completely, then click Delete everything.
notes_tr: "Hesabımı tamamen yok et" öğesini ve ardından "Her şeyi sil" öğesini tıklayın.

name: PxHere
notes: You must email support to delete your account.
email_body: Please delete my PxHere account registered under this email address.

name: Python Morsels
notes: Visit the linked page and enter your email and password

name: Python Package Index (PyPI)
notes: Go to "Delete account ⮕ Delete your PyPI account". Projects that you are the sole of owner of will be needed to have their ownership transferred to another user or to be deleted before being able to proceed.

name: PythonAnywhere
notes: You must email support to delete your account.
email_body: I request to permanently delete my PythonAnywhere account 'your-username' with all its files and data.

name: QIWI Wallet
notes: If you want to delete the wallet, then log in to your QIWI Wallet and fill out the form below, which will be available after authorization.
notes_ru: Если вы хотите удалить кошелек, то авторизуйтесь в QIWI Кошельке и заполните форму ниже, которая будет доступна после авторизации.

name: Qobuz
notes: Requires email confirmation.

name: QQ
notes: From the app: Avatar ⮕ Settings ⮕ Account Security ⮕ Account Cancellation.

name: QQTube
notes: Click 'Close account' ⮕ Enter your current password ⮕ Click 'Deactivate'.

name: Qt
notes: Go to the linked page and scroll down to the bottom. From there, click on 'Delete Account'.

name: Quantic Foundry
notes: Email their support team asking for account deletion.

name: QuillBot
notes: Visit the linked page and use the form to request the deletion of your account.

name: QuintoAndar
notes: Send a message to them requesting deletion. They will reply asking for the reason and a few personal data and eventually delete. If you had rented something on their platform in the past, they won't be able to delete your personal data to comply with regulations.
notes_pt-BR: Envie uma mensagem pedindo para excluir a conta. Eles vão responder perguntando o motivo e alguns dados pessoais, e eventualmente deletar. Se tiver alugado algo na plataforma no passado, eles não poderão deletar seus dados pessoais por motivos legais.

name: Quip
notes: Email support@quip.com and ask them to delete your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın silinmesini talep etmek için onlara e-posta gönderin.

name: Quire
notes: Settings ⮕ Options ⮕ Advanced ⮕ Delete account... Type in a reason and your password.

name: Quora
notes: Log in, go to 'Settings', 'Privacy', and then 'Delete Account'. Your account will be deactivated, then permanently deleted after 14 days. If you log in during that time, your account will be reactivated and deletion will be canceled.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, "Ayarlar" "Gizlilik" "Hesabı Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: radio.fr
notes: Login, go to profile page, it's in tab 'my data' and click 'delete my account'.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, "Profil" sayfasına gidin, "Verim" sekmesinde "Hesabımı Sil" öğesini tıklayın.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous, allez à la page du profil, c'est dans l'onglet 'mes données' et cliquez sur 'supprimer mon compte.'

name: Radiooooo
notes: Account removal must be requested directly by email.
notes_tr: Hesabın kaldırılması doğrudan e-posta ile talep edilmelidir.
notes_pt-BR: A remoção da conta deve ser solicitada diretamente por email.

name: Rail Europe
notes: Go to account settings and click the 'Delete my account' button at the top right corner. This will open a ticket for them to delete your account and it will eventually be processed.

name: Rainforest QA
notes: Login, go to the settings page and click 'I want to delete my account'.
notes_tr: Giriş yapın, ayarlara girin ve "Hesabımı silmek istiyorum" tuşuna tıklayın.
notes_fr: Connectez-vous, allez dans les parametres et cliquez sur « I want to delete my account ».
notes_it: Entra, recati nella pagina impostazioni e clicca 'Voglio eliminare il mio account'.
notes_pt-BR: Faça login, vá na página de configurações e clique 'I want to delete my account'.
notes_ca: Entri al seu compte, vagi a la pàgina de configuració i cliqui a 'I want to delete my account'.
notes_es: Entra en tu cuenta, ve a la página de configuración y pulsa 'I want to delete my account'.

name: Rakuten
notes: If you're on a region where privacy rights are covered by law, it's as easy as clicking a button, otherwise you have to send an e-mail.

name: RapidAPI
notes: Account can be deleted by clicking "delete" under "Delete Current User".

name: RateYourMusic
notes: After deleteing the account, it will be deactivated for 30 days before being deleted permanently. Messages, forum posts, and contributions stay on the site even after your account is deleted.
notes_tr: Hesabı sildikten sonra, kalıcı olarak silinmeden önce 30 gün boyunca devre dışı bırakılacaktır. Mesajlar, forum gönderileri ve katkılar, hesabınız silindikten sonra bile sitede kalır.

name: RayWenderlich
notes: Send an email to support@razeware.com with your account username and email address. Within a few business days, you should receive confirmation that your account was deleted.

name: Razer
notes: An account is required to access the warranty and product registration section of the website. Despite being on a different subdomain, this affects the normal Razerzone.com website and the assorted store as well.
notes_tr: Web sitesinin garanti ve ürün kayıt bölümüne erişmek için bir hesap gereklidir. Farklı bir alt alan adında olmasına rağmen, bu normal Razerzone.com web sitesini ve çeşitli mağazayı da etkiler.

name: RD Saúde (Droga Raia and Drogasil)
notes: Fill out the form and make your data deletion request.
notes_pt-BR: Preencha o formulário e faça sua solicitação de exclusão de dados.

name: Read the Docs
notes: On the linked page confirm your username and select 'Delete Account'.

name: Readernaut
notes: Go to your profile page, and use the 'Delete Your Account' button.
notes_tr: Profil sayfanıza gidin ve "Hesabınızı Silin" düğmesine tıklayın.

name: RealDebrid
notes: First, search "delete account" in the search bar in order to obtain the "I want to delete my Real-Debrid account" entry. Click on it for the instructions for users in premium state. Once your account is no longer premium, proceed to the "Contact us" button to create a support ticket requesting to delete your account.
notes_tr: Önce, "Real-Debrid hesabımı silmek istiyorum" kısmına erişmek için arama çubuğunda "hesabı sil" araması yapın. Premium durumdaki kullanıcıların talimatlari için üzerine tıklayın. Hesabınız artık premium değilse, hesabınızı silmenizi isteyen bir destek bileti oluşturmak için "Bize ulaşın" düğmesine gidin.

name: Rebelsmarket
notes: Click on URL and then choose Cancel Account. Once prompted confirm that you want to cancel your account and then you will receive a verification email. Note, you can also download your personal data on this page.

name: rebuy
notes: At the bottom of your Account/personal-data page should be a button to delete your account
notes_de: Nachdem sie auf der 'Mein Konto' ⮕ 'Persönliche Daten' Seite sind, ist ganz unten ein 'Konto löschen' Button

name: RecargaPay
notes: You can't completely delete your account. On the account closure page, you are informed that after you closing your account, most of your data will be deleted from the system, however it's not specified which data will be kept and why. Closed accounts can also be reactivated at any time by the user.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı tamamen silemezsiniz. Hesap kapatma sayfasında, hesabınızı kapattıktan sonra verilerinizin büyük bir kısmının sistemden silineceği, ancak hangi verilerin ve neden saklanacağı belirtilmemiştir. Kapatılan hesaplar da herhangi bir zamanda kullanıcı tarafından yeniden etkinleştirilebilir.
notes_pt-BR: Você não pode excluir completamente sua conta. Na página de encerramento, você é informado que, após encerrar sua conta, a maioria dos seus dados serão excluídos do sistema, no entanto, não é especificado quais dados serão mantidos e nem o porquê. Contas encerradas também podem ser reativadas a qualquer momento pelo usuário.

name: Red Hat
notes: Select "I have a redhat.com login ID and I want Red Hat to delete it."

name: Red Robin
notes: Select "Delete my data" as the request type.

name: Redacteur.com
notes: Login to your account. Click on "My Account" then "My connection information". Finally click "Delete my account"
notes_fr: Connectez-vous à votre compte. Allez dans "Mon compte ⮕ Mes informations de connexion". Finalement, cliquez sur "Supprimer mon compte" en bas à gauche.

name: Redbooth
notes: By deleting your account you will lose access to all your organizations and workspaces. This action is irreversible.

name: Redbubble
notes: Click the button to delete your account.
notes_tr: Hesabınızı silmek için düğmeye tıklayın.

name: Reddit
notes: If you are opted in to the redesign, scroll to the bottom and click on the Delete Account button. Your content will not be deleted (only disassociated).

name: Redfin
notes: After logging in, click the "Delete Your Account" link at the bottom of the Account Settings page.

name: Redirect.ing
notes: On the settings page, click the "Delete my account & data" button at the bottom of the page.

name: redirect.pizza
notes: In the bottom right corner of the linked page, click 'Delete my account'.

name: RedPen.io
notes: You would need to email the team by clicking feedback to have your account removed.
notes_tr: Hesabınızın kaldırılması için geri bildirimi tıklayarak ekibe e-posta göndermeniz gerekir.

name: RedShelf
notes: Brytewave users should [submit a DSAR request to Follett](https://www.follett.com/policies/).

name: Remind
notes: Scroll to the bottom of the page and click 'Delete Account'
notes_tr: Sayfanın altına gidin ve 'Hesabı Sil' tuşuna tıklayın

name: Remitly
notes: In your profile settings, scroll down and select "Close my profile". You account will remain recoverable anytime but you con contact the support to delete your data.

name: Render
notes: Go to your profile page, scroll to the bottom and click Delete Render Account.

name: Renderforest
notes: Click 'Delete account' in the middle of the page, then enter your password.

name: Replay Poker
notes: Please enter a reason for deactivating your account and then click 'Deactivate' after you're finished.
notes_tr: Lütfen hesabınızı devre dışı bırakmak için bir neden girin ve bitirdikten sonra "Devre dışı bırak" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Replit
notes: On the linked page under Account select 'Request account deletion' and then click the 'Yes, Delete my Account' button.

name: RescueTime
notes: Use the 'Delete your account' link in the lower right-hand corner.
notes_tr: Sağ alt köşedeki "Hesabınızı Silin" bağlantısını kullanın.

name: Reservio
notes: Go to the Business tab ⮕ Settings. You will find the option for the deletion of your account at the bottom of this page.

name: ResumeGenius
notes: Simply login to your resumegenius account, go to the form, click delete and you should be good to go!

name: Resy
notes: While self-deletion is possible through [their app](https://apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id866163372), it is iOS only. Everyone else must send an email.
email_body: Please delete my Resy account as I do not wish to use it any further.

name: Retrospring
notes: Use the Delete button at the bottom of the page.
notes_tr: Sayfanın altındaki "Sil" tuşuna tıklayın.

name: Rev
notes: Visit the linked page and click 'Close Account'. Type 'CLOSE' in the text box, then click 'Close Account Forever'.

name: RevenueHits
notes: In the support center it says that you can't delete your account, but if you contact them by e-mail, you should be able to get it deleted.
notes_it: Nel centro di supporto c'è scritto che non puoi eliminare il tuo account, ma se li contatti via e-mail, dovresti essere in grado di fartelo eliminare.

name: Reverso
notes: On your own, you can only disable your account in your profile settings. If you want to request its removal, you must contact support using the linked form, but they may ask you to confirm your identity.
notes_ru: Самостоятельно вы можете только отключить свой аккаунт в настройках профиля. Если вы хотите запросить его удаление, то вы должны обратиться в поддержку, используя форму ниже, но они могут попросить от вас подтверждения личности.

name: Revolt
notes: Go to your account options and click on 'Mark Account for Deletion'.
